title: HotSchedules
description:
‚ÄãHotSchedules is the industry's leading employee scheduling app because it‚Äôs the fastest and easiest way to manage your schedule and communicate with your team.  

Team members love it because they can swap, pick-up or release shifts with one click. Work-life balance is easily managed with automatic shift pick ups when you want more hours and time off requests for when you don‚Äôt.  Calendar sync and notifications keep your Schedules and the roster automatically updated to your phone with any manager-approved changes.

Managers appreciate the 75% time savings when building schedules and one-click approvals for shift changes.  The ability to monitor business performance with sales and labor snapshots from anywhere, keeps them out of the back office.  And most importantly, staying connected with broadcast and one-to-one messaging makes for a happy and productive team culture.
 
NOTE: The HotSchedules application REQUIRES a valid HotSchedules user account through your employer.  Need help?  Contact Customer Care 24x7x365

comments: Good app for employees with managers that know what they're supposed to do. Your experience may vary depending on your hardware/OS it seems. This app updates frequently which is annoying because you won't be able to log in until you update or look on the website. I find myself getting randomly logged out every other month or so as well for no reason. ALSO IF YOU DONT WANT TO BUY THIS APP JUST GO TO THE WEBSITE. THE APP IS JUST A LITTLE MORE CONVENIENT

I cannot believe they are charging for this app. Not only am I being extorted to buy the app (or it's a pain to clock in), the app I PAID FOR is barely functional. Often slow and unresponsive, and the widget will freak out if I even look at it wrong. I'm sorry that your job is using this service
This app sucks. Constantly have to update it. It only works when it wants to. So the price you pay is not worth it. It should be a free app, when it screws up all the time.

Constant bugs for important things. E.g. the calendar is one day ahead all of a sudden and claims it's Friday (it's not, it's Thursday), so it says I'm scheduled for today (when I'm scheduled for Friday). It was on time all week until just today, and now it looks like I missed my shift. Luckily I worked it out with my manager, but this is unacceptable. It's too important to be bugged like this.

I have such a difficult time logging in most of the time! Today I have to go to Google Play and update the certificate. I have uninstalled and reinstalled multiple times...extremely frustrating and wish my company didn't force us to use Hot Schedules! ***ZERO STARS!!!*** Update on 6/7/21. They "upgraded" on June 3rd and I haven't been able to log in since then! "There was an error. Please try again later." Extremely frustrating and a total junk app! I REALLY wish i wasn't forced to use it!!!

title: Easy Voice Recorder Pro
description:
Easy Voice Recorder Pro is your everyday companion to record important moments. Capture meetings, personal notes, classes, songs, and much more, without time limits or ads!

For students

Record classes and lectures with clear quality, even when the teacher is not right in front of you. Listen to these recordings as many times as you want to help you study for that next exam. Speed up or slow down playback to listen at a comfortable pace.

With no time limits and the option to choose a compressed format, it's easy to record the longest classes and lectures.

For business

Capture interviews and meetings from your phone, tablet, or smart watch, then share them with your colleagues through email or your favourite messaging app. Take advantage of powerful widgets and shortcuts to start a new recording right from the home screen.

You can even enable cloud upload to record voice notes while commuting and have them automatically sent to your laptop.

For musicians and for everyone

With many options to fine-tune the recording, the app is great for rehearsals and for capturing melodies that pop into your head. Try new ideas fast, hear the results and make adjustments on a new take.

Quickly switch between voice notes, meetings & lectures, and music & raw sound with easy to use settings and presets.

Exclusive Pro features (available on supported devices):

‚òÖ Upload new recordings automatically to your Google Drive or Dropbox.
‚òÖ Record to MP3 and AAC, in addition to all the formats available in the free version.
‚òÖ Record using a Bluetooth microphone.
‚òÖ Trim recordings and remove unwanted sections with Edit mode.
‚òÖ Manage and organize your recordings with folders, and save recordings to your SD card.
‚òÖ Control the recorder from anywhere using the notifications bar, or through our Tasker and Locale plugins.
‚òÖ Bonus features: record in stereo, import files, skip silence, volume boost, custom bitrates, and more.

Plus all the great features you find in the free version:

- Record to high-quality PCM and MP4, or use AMR to save space.
- Quickly start a new recording with widgets and shortcuts, and record in the background.
- Share recordings easily through email or your favourite app, or set one of them as a ringtone.
- Android Wear support - record from your smartwatch.
- Light and dark themes, and many other cool features.

Easy Voice Recorder is exactly what the name says: an easy to use audio recorder and sound recorder. Reliable, fast and flexible, it adapts to your needs.

Need help?

Please note that Easy Voice Recorder Pro is not a call recorder and can‚Äôt record phone calls on most phones. If there are any problems, please contact us at support@digipom.com. We are always happy to assist you.

Terms of Use

Terms of Use: http://www.digipom.com/end-user-license-agreement-for-applications/
Privacy Policy: http://www.digipom.com/privacy-policy-for-applications/

Permission details

Photos/Media/Files - Save recordings to your external storage.
Microphone - Record audio from your microphone.

comments: I have had this app for years. I did not know about the pro and when I found out about it I got it right away. I love the fact that it goes into a cloud and that way it frees up space on my phone and I don't have to worry about downloading anywhere else to protect it. You can use it for lectures, meetings etc. It will literally record for hours mine has gone as long as 22 hrs. I left it on by accident but you can edit with pro so it's great. Also you pay 1 time ot goes with your phone #.

Perfect in every way I've ever needed it, in function AND form. I've used other similar programs over the years, okay quality, but free trials end and blah blah blah... Everything is easy to use and store and share, and the quality is good. Really glad I just went ahead and paid the handful of dollars for the straight-up Pro edition, now I'm ready to grab any idea for my music anywhere, across like three of my devices

Best decision to buy this app. & no I didn't get paid for this...I'm autistic so I like to say it as I see it. It was good with the free version & I never had any glitches on my phone but when I decided to upgrade. Let's all admit that the price is not big. People spend that much money on a coffee. Anyway the free version was good but the very affordable price of the pro will be the best move ever. 1st you get a cool app with heap's (& I do mean) heap's of very cool features. Best move ever!!

A concise, flexible, easy to use recorder that I also double as a way to store my music. My only wish was that it came with a shuffling feature other than just reorganizing things by different categories like name or file size. If you need to keep separate lists, just make sure to save them in separate folders. Also, love how easy this app is on the eyes!

This is such an awesome app, well worth it! I also love that there is a counterpart app you can install on Android Watches and it syncs recordings back to your phone. The recording quality is superb, and you can also skip silence.

title: LifeUp: Gamification To-Do & Tasks List | HabitRPG
description:
LifeUp, whose name means UPGRADE YOUR LIFE, is a gamification To-Do List (Tasks List) application with many interesting gamified features.


It's designed by us, two newly graduated developers, who intend to develop A customizable and fun gamified To-Do list and Habit-forming RPG application.

LifeUp has a unique item reward and custom achievement mechanism, but it doesn't lose the utility of tools.
It allows you to record things like playing a productivity game.
And its simple and easy-to-start attribute mechanism can make light users experience the fun of life RPG.


Features: 
- No Ads, No In-App Purchase related to the features, You can enjoy all the functional modules at once.

- Beautiful Material Design UI

- Full basic To-Do Functions
Remark, Reminder, Start Time, Deadline, Repeat, Target Times, History, and List.

‚ú® Gamification Functions
6 Attributes (Including Strength, Intelligence, Charm, Endurance, Vitality and Creative), EXP, Level, Coin, Random Coin.

What's more, You can customize the Attributes Icon and Text as you like.

üé® Easy-to-Use
EXP and Coin reward can be auto calculated by Urgency and Difficulty Degree that you set up.

üèÜ Achievements
Up to 57 built-in Achievements waiting for you to unlock.
What's more, you can create your achievements which can be set up to auto calculate the progress.

üéÅ Shop
Put items you want with the price you decide on shelves. Earn the coin by finishing tasks. Purchase the items and then USE them in your Inventory.
Items can be customized with various effects, such as increasing or decreasing experience points, synthesizing other items, and starting a countdown.

‚è∞ Pomodoro
As a Pomodoro timer is completed, you can receive a virtual tomato reward.
Decide whether to eat or sell tomatoes?

üé≤ Custom item effects: loot boxes
You can customize the effect of the shop item.
For example, you can create your Loot boxes to get rewards randomly.

‚öóÔ∏è Custom item effects: synthesis
Create your synthetic formula and synthesize some items into others.
So you can realize the multi-currency function. More ways to play with loot boxes.

‚öΩ Various Ways to Gain EXP
You can even gain STRENGTH EXP by your daily steps,
or maybe get ENDURANCE EXP by eating your tomatoes gained from the Pomodoro timer.

ü§ù Community
Join the team you like, complete team tasks, submit your activity, and so on.

- Feelings
Record your feelings of completion by text and pictures.

- Widget
App Widget is available, tasks can be managed from the Home Screen.

- Theme Color
23 built-in color themes

- Dark Theme

- Lots of Settings
Such as the EXP punishment factor/coin punishment factor.
Hiding any module that you don't need.

- Local, WebDAV and Dropbox Backup/Restore
Most of the data is stored offline, you have complete control over your data.

- Network is Unneeded
Most features of LifeUp can be used without network connections.

- Keep Updating New Functions


Support
- Language: Please note that currently only English, Turkish, Portuguese, Simplified Chinese and Traditional Chinese, German, Italian, Russian, Japanese available. 
As an Indie application, we can not afford the translation fee for more languages. 
Some languages contain only partial translations. However, everyone can contribute their translation.

- Price: As the application continues to be updated and improved, and new features are added, the price may be adjusted accordingly. 

- Issues: If you have any application issues or intent to refund, you're welcome to contact us via email below.

- App Privacy Terms & Policy: http://wiki.lifeupapp.fun/en/#/introduction/privacy-terms

- Contact Email: kei.ayagi@gmail.com

recentChanges:
0. Fixed some issues of plenty tasks, pomodoro, select photos and restore data
1. Add offline sign-in method
2. Edit feelings time

comments: This app is really good. I like that you can get a shop reward on completion of a certain task without having to buy it. I also like the pomodoro feature. I wish we could edit the attribute section though. Edit: I was experimenting with the synthesis feature which is also unique to this app and it's very well done. You can choose to buy something from the store with another store item or many other items like xp, coins etc

I find this app highly effective. I first scoffed at the idea of the gamification of discipline to accomplish boring/tedious/menial/taxing/important tasks. Then I tried it. I absolutely love this app. The fact that I feel so convicted for not accomplishing my tasks makes this app amazing, because I refuse to allow to gratify myself with enjoyable activities like gaming or browsing youtube until I've earned enough coins to do so, through completing the more important tasks in my life. It takes a bit to set up your own little economy, but I think I've got it down pretty well. The widget for the home screen is good.

This app is amazing, what I was expecting was not all these features and it is almost perfect. I just wish I could add more attributes. Other than that everything is perfect, not too complex, takes a few minutes to learn but worth every penny.

A super clean app that's worth the small price. Although as of now, you are unable to customise the opacity and general theme of the widget when it's in light mode, which kinda sucks... (Fear not for you dark mode users though, since you can customise that)

I enjoy it, really holds you accountable because you want to complete tasks like a video game. I hope this continues to improve as it's a more recent app. Some more features like avatars, boss battles, other quality of life improvements, etc. will take this app to the very top in my opinion.

title: Simple Calendar Pro - Agenda & Schedule Planner
description:
Simple Calendar is a hugely customizable, offline calendar app for Android mobile phones designed to do exactly what an android personal calendar should do in 2021. No complicated features, unnecessary permissions, and no ads!

#1 Calendar Planner App
Whether you are looking for a simple mobile appointment reminder or you‚Äôre organizing single or recurring events, birthdays, need to remind anniversaries, schedule business meetings, appointments, or anything else, Simple Calendar - a unique schedule planner for android mobile phones - makes it easy to stay organized. With an incredible variety of customization options, you can customize event reminders, notification appearance, tiny calendar reminders widget, and how the calendar app looks.

Schedule Planner Pro
Remarkable and easy to use agenda planner and family organizer makes checking your upcoming agenda,  schedule business meetings, events & appointments a breeze. Remind yourself of whatever agenda that needs to be remembered. This 2021 calendar with reminders widget is a remarkably easy to use schedule planner. You can even view everything as a simple list of events rather than in typical view, so you know exactly what‚Äôs coming up in your life and how to organize and plan your agenda.

comments: I've been using the free app for so long and I've never been disappointed. So when I learned that there is a pro app, I didn't hesitate to migrate my events! It's also so cheap! I love the time zone feature since I'm a freelancer and my clients are in a different time zone. This app should cost more, really. It's simple and gets the job done.

Simple, easy to use. Reminders work well (as the developer has stated, if you have problems with them it may be a battery optimization thing). I use it for a few events every few days and it just works. Customization options are overall good.

the widget doesn't seem to be updating. i have to tap it to open the app and exit out, then the widget is updated. otherwise it remains 'stuck' on a date in the past. maybe started since one of the updates recently. G s10s, one UI 3.1, android 11.

I paid for the full version so the widge will be viewed on my home screen and I can see my schedule but it keeps on saying to upgrade to premium every time I dragged it, even if I already paid the premium. I need refund for this app.

Fairly decent calendar but the reminder function doesn't work correctly. For example, I set my reminder for 3 hours prior to the event. The reminder may work correctly or, as just now, pop up 6 hours after the event.

title: Plague Inc: Scenario Creator
description:
Enter the lab and develop your own custom scenarios for Plague Inc. with this powerful yet easy to use tool. Create new plague types, worlds, events and more and then share them with friends and over 85 million other players!

‚ñ∂ IMPORTANT - This app is a tool to create custom scenarios for Plague Inc. It is not a game! You need the original Plague Inc. game installed in order to play scenarios. To get the original game - go here: www.plagueinc.com

The Plague Inc: Scenario Creator is a powerful yet easy to use content creation tool which lets players bring their deadliest ideas to life as they develop/mod their own custom scenarios for Plague Inc. and then share them with the world

 ‚óà‚óà‚óà Push your creativity and imagination to the limit ‚óà‚óà‚óà
Want to make a cat pandemic, an infectious political meme or an alien parasite that makes people‚Äôs heads explode? How about a government that evacuates the population of Madagascar to the moon, a youtube star that turns people into zombies or a travel company that operates hundreds of flights to Greenland every day. Maybe you want to just want to accurately model how a real life disease might spread...

With the Plague Inc: Scenario Creator - you can do all this and lots more! Unleash your creativity and show the world your wonderful/twisted/weird/scary [delete as appropriate] creations.

 ‚óà‚óà‚óà Access powerful developer labs ‚óà‚óà‚óà
The creator contains five labs, each with a specific focus. Choose which of them you want to use for any given scenario:

‚óè Core lab: Edit core scenario information, write background narratives, set win conditions, edit translations and more
‚óè Disease lab: Develop a bespoke plague with unique stats and fully customised symptoms, abilities and transmissions. 
‚óè World lab: Control country attributes, such as population, climate, health care budgets, and air routes.
‚óè Government lab: Dictate actions taken by governments in response to your disease. Modify existing actions or create entirely new ones.
‚óè Events lab (advanced users): Create game-changing events and narrative pop ups for your scenario using powerful scripting tools.

 ‚óà‚óà‚óà Share your scenario to make it go viral ‚óà‚óà‚óà
Once you‚Äôve made your scenario - choose who you want to infect with it:

‚óè Share scenarios directly with friends by sending them an email (or link in Twitter/Facebook etc)
‚óè Publish your best scenarios worldwide to over 85 million players with the press of a button then see statistics on how many people play your game and what they think about it. Make your virus go viral! :P

‚óà‚óà‚óà

Like Plague Inc. on Facebook: 
http://www.facebook.com/PlagueInc 

Follow me on Twitter: 
www.twitter.com/NdemicCreations

‚ñ∂ IMPORTANT - This app is a tool to create custom scenarios for Plague Inc. It is not a game! You need the original Plague Inc. game installed in order to play scenarios. To get the original game - go here: www.plagueinc.com

recentChanges:
Plague Inc. Scenario Creator - The Creator‚Äôs Update

It‚Äôs now easier than ever to create and share your own scenarios with Plague Inc.‚Äôs 85 million+ players, with new features such as:

MORE PUBLISHING SLOTS! - You can now publish up to 14 scenarios (previously 7)
SECURE BACKUP! - Keep your unpublished scenarios safe in the cloud
CREATE ACROSS MULTIPLE DEVICES! - Start creating on your phone and then finish on your tablet (or vice versa)
Minor bug fixes

1.2.1 - fixed reported issues
comments: It's an absolutely great game. Theres plenty to keep you into the game, like scenarios and creating scenarios. I think a neat feature could be added though. Such as adding in your own sounds via MP3. It would help with certain scenarios and it would be neat.

At first, nothing worked for me. But then I realized why. When doing percents, you have to put down numbers before the decimal place as a 1 in the ones place would mean 100% and saying 33 means 3300% so say .33 instead as that'll mean 33%. What I have the most issue with are the events as I can't even get them to work for me and I'm pretty sure that I'm typing things in the right places. I just can never get one actually ready for use, but rather partly constructed if you get what I mean of.
I love it, but it is kind of confusing at first, but you get used to it. Also when I try to log into my acount, it keeps me on the logging in screen. Please fix this.
I had lots of fun before but now my scenarios arent saving and i cant work on them again. This has to be fixed!
So i give this 4 stars ita pretty good you can custom but when im finished with my scenario it keeps saying invalid email error wrong password etc after having hard work so pls fix this.

title: Noteshelf: Take Notes | Handwriting | Annotate PDF
description:
~ #1 in Korea, Mexico (Productivity Paid App Category)
~ #2 in USA, Canada, Germany (Productivity Paid App Category)
~ #3 in UK, Australia (Productivity Paid App Category)
~ Featured in Google Play

‚ÄúLet your thoughts flow with Noteshelf. Noteshelf gives you more choices in how you take notes. Whether you prefer using S Pen or typing, its fluid note-taking that feels natural as you learn or create.‚Äù 
- Samsung

Noteshelf is one of the most popular note-taking iOS apps, and it is with great excitement that we bring Noteshelf for Android. You can create beautiful handwritten notes, make checklists, annotate PDFs, and type documents all in one place.

‚úçÔ∏è Fluid Handwriting 
With Noteshelf, experience handwriting that feels just right. It is as smooth and fluid as writing with a pen on a notepad. Choose from an array of pens and highlighters in different sizes. Play around with colors, shapes, and images to create notes that are your own. So, taking your best class notes or meeting memos is now colorful and fun too! Noteshelf brings you the convenience of typing too. You can choose from many styles and formatting options. 

üñäÔ∏è Stylus
We support a variety of styli for taking beautiful handwritten notes. You will never miss using a pen and notepad again! On Samsung Galaxy Note devices, we also support a quick-erase option with the S-pen button. 

üìù Annotate PDFs, Write On Images
PDF annotations and markup is easier than ever! Import PDFs or images into Noteshelf to highlight, underline, or markup with our convenient formatting tools. You can edit school notes, grade papers, fill out forms, and sign documents too!

üîç Search & Convert Handwritten Notes/ OCR
You can search your handwritten notes and even convert handwriting to text. We provide handwriting recognition in 65 different languages.

üéôÔ∏èRecord Audio Notes
Record audio as you take notes so you never miss anything important at school or work. Add as many recordings as you want and play them back anytime, even as you take handwritten notes. Loved by students while taking lecture notes!

üíæEvernote Auto-Publish
Auto-publish your notes to Evernote and access them from just about anywhere.

üéÅNoteshelf Club Exclusive
100s of beautifully crafted paper templates and notebook covers to go with your good notes. Get them for free when you signup for the Noteshelf Club!
Find paper templates for classroom notes, meetings memos, to-do lists, shopping lists, personal health trackers, journals, and many more! 

‚ûïSOME MORE FEATURES
- We now support a wide range of Android smartphones too.
- Squares, circles or triangles, use auto-shapes to draw perfect geometrical shapes with ease.
- Auto-backup to Google Drive & Dropbox.
- Share your notes with colleagues, friends, and family over email, Google Drive, Dropbox, and other supported cloud services.
- Keep your personal and business notes separate. Drag and drop notebooks into groups or categories easily to organize them.
- Create bookmarks in Noteshelf. You can name or color your bookmarks, to organize your notes better!

Go ahead, try the app out, and start taking some amazing handwritten notes!

Join us in making Noteshelf better at note-taking. With your constant support and feedback, we will be giving you the best note-taking experience on Android too. We'd love to hear from you‚Äîwrite to us at noteshelf(at)fluidtouch.biz! 

‚ÄúNoteshelf‚ÄîDigital Note-Taking, Simplified!‚Äù

comments: Awesome app! Only thing it's missing is color fill and the magnifying box thingy. Otherwise I'm in love. My brain is kinda scattered so I'm so happy to find an app that goes with my whiteboard/mindmap approach!

I bought the paid version to get a better use of the app, however, I constantly get glitches and delays. I've messaged and sent video proof of these issues and nothing has changed in over a year. I was hoping said problema would be resolved with time in "the next update" as they constantly tell me, yet I have the exact same problem than I did last year. If there's any chance of getting a refund I would like to request it as I've tried to deal with the glitches and wait, but this is too much!

I am so sad about this app. I thought I finally found an app that would actually do what I wanted it to, unfortunatly it's crazy bugged!! I wish I had the same experience as everyone else but honestly with the bugs, its insanely hard to use and when you zoom in, the screen goes completely black. I really hope they update it and fix all of the bugs. There is so much potential here!

i see the potential in noteshelf, its a good app when it comes to notetaking and it is still getting better with updates but but but the developers at noteshelf should see the pace at which another app called "Flexcil" is moving. flexcil has a ui which feels far far smoother as to what we have seen in noteshelf... noteshelf also has good amount of bugs,the pen sometimes stops working and the app crashes when minimised for too long and the scrolling is sluggish

Overall app is satisfactory, but I'm facing one serious issue right after the new update, when exporting to pdf, the output hand written text becomes automatically too thin and on top of that it even cut down the every few strokes, which ultimately made the text unreadable. Waiting for this bug to be fixed soon. I think it has something to do with compression, because in ealier version pdf sizes were high, but no problem was there.

title: Duet Display
description:
** 50% Off For A Limited Time **

Duet turns your Android phone, tablet, or Chromebook into the most advanced extra display for both Mac & PC. Developed by a team of ex-Apple engineers, Duet offers unparalleled performance and display quality - all with zero lag.

‚Äî DO MORE ‚Äî
Be twice as productive by multitasking with two screens. And for those that travel, have a portable way to stay productive.

‚Äî INCREDIBLY SIMPLE ‚Äî
To get started, open Duet on your device and the free Duet desktop app will automatically detect your device that you can click to connect, and transform it into a high performance touchscreen display.

‚Äî TOUCHSCREEN ‚Äî
Interact with Mac & PC like never before, with touch & gestures, including two-finger scrolling, pan and zoom.

And with our latest release, you can even add a touch bar to any Android with any Mac.

‚Äî PRESS ‚Äî
TIME - "Getting Work Done Faster and More Efficiently"
Forbes - "The simple thing to note is this...Duet Display works."
Business Insider - "Zero lag and true retina resolution‚Äù
Wall Street Journal - ‚ÄúIt‚Äôs as easy as just plugging it in"

‚Äî REVIEWS ‚Äî
‚ÄúAwesome! My iPad Pro can be an extra monitor! Cool app‚Äù
~CEO of T-Mobile, John Legere

Duet Works With:
All Androids with 7.0+
All Macs with 10.14 (Mojave) and later
All PCs with Windows 10 and later


Learn more at http://www.duetdisplay.com
Terms: https://help.duetdisplay.com/duet-terms-services
Privacy Policy: https://help.duetdisplay.com/duet-privacy-policy

recentChanges: Stability Fixes
comments: It used to be the best. I had been using the wireless display option all the time. Paid the one time cost to enable pro features. Now the wireless display changed to subscription-based. This is not what I paid for. Greed has gotten this app to go from being the best to simply one of many making the money grab with subscriptions. How utterly disappointing.

This is a very cool concept, just plug your device into your computer and creates a monitor. On their website it says it can run at 60 fps, which would be awesome if it were true. With my Tab s5e, I am getting around 10-20 fps. I would say this app is a scam, but it is probably a bug, and it's at least usable despite the lag, and I contacted the support team, which were very responsive and respectful. However they could not address the issue. Until they fix the issue, I am giving them 3 stars.

Cool product, better tech support. I bought this while on vacation, had a few problems with speed. Sent an email to the dev/support and got a response very quickly. He led me through some debugging / troubleshooting steps and we finally figured out that the wi-fi where I was staying was too far away (and sub-standard). After I got home, I tried it again and it works like a charm. Thank you for getting this to work, I can see it being very helpful while traveling (to locations where I have decent internet).

I really like the idea of this app. I have all Apple products EXCEPT my Galaxy Tab S7+, simply because the Galaxy Tab is much better bang for buck, and I think just a better experience than iPad. That being said, Duet was supposed to be the app that allowed my to use my tablet as a second screen and even for drawing. But it works so poorly. I didn't even notice a difference using a wired connection. I'd pay extra to get stylus support if it worked. But it's so laggy and unreliable. Please fix.

An absolute nightmare to keep working. When it works, everything runs great besides some minor lag when drawing in apps such as photoshop. However I literally can never get it to work despite paying for the premium subscription. I got the air to connect only one single time. Half the time it won't connect be cause "my subscritpion was canceled" yet I have the money taken out of my account. I give up fighting with this app it isn't worth it.

title: QuickBend: Conduit Bending
description:
QuickBend is the quickest and most accurate conduit bending calculator app.

QuickBend is an advanced conduit bending calculator that was created to be fast and accurate while being visually appealing, innovative, and intuitive. Offering you the most accurate measurements using the centerline radius algorithm based upon the bender that you're using. 

Easily select between different types of benders and choose the size of the shoe and conduit type that you're using. The last bender that you selected will be the bender that appears when you open the app up again. See and edit your bender's information (Centerline Radius, Deduct, Gain, Setback, Travel, and Radius Adjustment) within the 'Bender Specs' section. 

Bends also include data management, which will save the last values that you've entered into the app.

QuickBend supports the following bends.

‚Ä¢ Offset
‚Ä¢ Rolling Offset
‚Ä¢ Matching Bends Offset
‚Ä¢ Matching Centers Offset
‚Ä¢ Parallel Offset
‚Ä¢ Three-Point Saddle
‚Ä¢ Four-Point Saddle
‚Ä¢ 90
‚Ä¢ QuickKick
‚Ä¢ Kick With 90
‚Ä¢ Matching Bend Kick
‚Ä¢ Matching Center Kick
‚Ä¢ Parallel Kick
‚Ä¢ Parallel Kick Forward
‚Ä¢ Compound 90 - Circle Obstruction
‚Ä¢ Compound 90 - Rectangle Obstruction
‚Ä¢ Compound 90 - Square Obstruction
‚Ä¢ Segmented 90

QuickBend Benders

‚Ä¢ Cosecant (Okay. it's not a bender, however; if you prefer the standard multiplier method with no radius. It's available.)
‚Ä¢ Current Tools: 750/751
‚Ä¢ Current Tools: 77
‚Ä¢ Current Tools: 747
‚Ä¢ Gardner Bender: Big Ben
‚Ä¢ Gardner Bender: Sidewinder
‚Ä¢ Gardner Bender: Electric Sidewinder
‚Ä¢ Gardner Bender: B2000 Cyclone
‚Ä¢ Gardner Bender: Ultra Eegor
‚Ä¢ Gardner Bender: B300 Series
‚Ä¢ Greenlee: Hand Benders
‚Ä¢ Greenlee: 1800/1801
‚Ä¢ Greenlee: 1818
‚Ä¢ Greenlee: 555
‚Ä¢ Greenlee: 854DX
‚Ä¢ Greenlee: 855GX
‚Ä¢ Greenlee: 881
‚Ä¢ Greenlee: 882
‚Ä¢ Greenlee: 884/885
‚Ä¢ Ideal: Hand Benders
‚Ä¢ Klein: Hand Benders
‚Ä¢ Milwaukee: Hand Benders

QuickBend Multiple Bends

‚Ä¢ Layout multiple bends on a single stick of conduit.
‚Ä¢ Offset to Obstruction
‚Ä¢ Offset from Obstruction
‚Ä¢ Matching Offset to Obstruction
‚Ä¢ Matching Offset from Obstruction
‚Ä¢ Three Point Saddle
‚Ä¢ Four Point Saddle
‚Ä¢ 90Àö Bend, Kick
‚Ä¢ Kick with 90
‚Ä¢ Place a cut mark for those rare occasions that you need to cut and thread the conduit before bending.
‚Ä¢ Flip bends around.
‚Ä¢ Graphic representation of where the bend/cut will layout on a stick of conduit.
‚Ä¢ Bend layouts are based on your benders centerline radius, deduct, and gain.
‚Ä¢ Toggle 'Measure to Center' to help line up conduits when working on raceways with multiple conduit sizes.

QuickBend also includes a protractor level which is easily accessible and can be Zeroed by a simple tap.

QuickBend allows you to pick between either form of measurements, imperial (inches) or metric (cm).

QuickBend's QuickCheck indicates if bends are impossible by a subtle change of turning the measurements and text red.

QuickBend's centerline radius algorithm is especially useful when bending conduit that is larger than 1 inch and bends that exceed 30 degrees.

‚Ä¢ Graphic representation of where the bend/cut will layout on a stick of conduit.
‚Ä¢ Bend layouts are based on your benders centerline radius, deduct, and gain.
‚Ä¢ Toggle 'Measure to Center' to help line up conduits when working on raceways with multiple conduit sizes.

QuickBend also includes a protractor level which is easily accessible and can be Zeroed by a simple tap.

QuickBend allows you to pick between either form of measurements, imperial (inches) or metric (cm).

QuickBend's QuickCheck indicates if bends are impossible by a subtle change of turning the measurements and text red.

QuickBend's centerline radius algorithm is especially useful when bending conduit that is larger than 1 inch and bends that exceed 30 degrees.
summary: The quickest and most accurate conduit bending calculator app.
recentChanges:
‚Ä¢ Added a way to sort benders by their types. This can be toggled within the apps settings.
‚Ä¢ Added a favorites option for benders.
‚Ä¢ Fixed a few bugs.
comments: The user interface is pretty rough.. the drag and slide can be sensitive and trying to hit the exact measurement is a bit tricky. Also, I selected rolling offset with an 3/4 ideal cast iron bender. Put in my height and roll but gave me ridiculous spacing between bends and doesn't tell you what degree.

The app works great, I was a bit hesitant to buy it at first, but it soon made me a believer. We all know that the deducts of older side winders or on any bender fades over time, this app has them all down and it has the travel measurements too!.. it also works if you have no signal.

My favorite tool in my tool box. This app is basically cheating. I've been able to make some incredible installs with this app. This app really becomes useful when you want to thread rigid straight and bend it to the right lengths "mathematically". If nothing else, I use it to reference bender specs like take up, radius and gain.

I'm an industrial electrician, I haven't had to make a segmented or consecutive bend before. I had a stick of 1" RMC and need a 180¬∞ bend 26" diameter at a height of 2'. I set up a greenlee 555 for the job and tested the bend on a stick of 3/4 IMC as a test "Didn't have many 1" sticks". Needless to say I forgot to switch to 3/4 for the greenlee so my deduct was 2" off. But the diameter was great.

This is a fantastic app. Years ago I made a chart for all the benders I've used on the job which included info about the start of bend, the centerline radius, the deductions and the minimum distance from the end of conduit to the shoe. It also had the formula for the developed length of a bend. I don't have to use that chart anymore. This app does it for me.

title: Nebo: Note-Taking & Annotation
description:
Meet Nebo, the award-winning digital notebook! Create beautiful notes, handwrite professional reports, sketch ideas on an infinite canvas and annotate existing documents. With its world-beating AI, Nebo understands every word you write.

Nebo is the ONLY note-taking app that makes handwriting as powerful and versatile as typed text. Now with added Mac M1 support - download and enjoy Nebo on Apple silicon devices!

Turn handwritten notes into professional documents thanks to the world's best handwriting recognition and write-to-text conversion. Nebo understands and accurately converts even the untidiest scribble in your choice of 66 languages. No more transcribing!

Create freely and evolve ideas on a limitless freeform page. Import PDF files or Word and PowerPoint documents as PDFs, ready to annotate. Nebo simplifies your information workflow and boosts your productivity.

** FEATURES IN DETAIL **

‚Ä¢ Empower your handwriting:
- Write¬π, type or dictate - all in the same document, sentence or even word.
- Accurately convert handwriting and math to typed text, and hand-drawn diagrams to perfect shapes.
- Add a selection of emoji and symbols with your pen.

‚Ä¢ Edit with your pen:
- Use simple gestures to edit and format without breaking your flow.
- Create¬†headings, lists and checkboxes,¬†add or remove spaces and line breaks, delete and emphasize text.
- Use the marker to highlight or color, the lasso to select, and the eraser to delete either entire strokes or precisely defined content.

‚Ä¢ A uniquely responsive experience:
- Nebo‚Äôs regular page automatically reflows your handwriting as needed.
- Make edits, adjust layout, rotate your device or split your screen without worrying about readability.

‚Ä¢ Enrich your notes:
- Add photos, sketches and smart objects like math and diagrams.
- Handwrite math equations and matrices across several lines, solve simple calculations and copy math as LaTeX or image.
- Hand-drawn diagrams stay editable when pasted into PowerPoint.

‚Ä¢ Write and draw freely:
- Nebo's freeform page is an infinite canvas that‚Äôs ideal for brainstorming.
- Pan around the page and zoom in or out to get a fresh perspective.
- Use the lasso to select and move, copy, delete or resize content.

‚Ä¢ Reuse freeform content:
- Copy content between freeform pages or sections, and into regular pages or other apps.
- Freeform content stays editable and convertible when pasted to a regular page.
- Export freeform pages as PNG, PDF or SVG.

‚Ä¢ Annotate PDFs:
- Import PDF files or Word and PowerPoint documents into your notebooks as PDFs.
- Mark up, highlight and annotate freely.
- Export to PDF with annotations in place.

‚Ä¢ Share content:
- Export regular pages as docx, PDF or text.
- Export multiple pages at once, combining them into one file as needed.
- Publish or share pages via private web link.

‚Ä¢ Digital power:
- Create unlimited notebooks.
- Train Nebo's recognition by adding custom words to your personal dictionary.
- Search your entire Nebo library, including handwriting and annotations.

‚Ä¢ Paperless management:
- Sync your Nebo library with iCloud, Google Drive or Dropbox.
- Organize your library via drag-and-drop.
- Back up your notes as needed.

** LOVE FOR NEBO **
- ‚ÄúFor note-takers with needs that go beyond the basic‚Äù (TechRadar, 2019)
- Best App 2017 (CES Mobile Apps Showdown)

Nebo respects your privacy and never stores your content on our servers without your explicit consent.

For help or to request new features, create a ticket at https://myscri.pt/support

Check the minimum and recommended requirements for Nebo: https://myscri.pt/devices

¬πYou can use any compatible active or passive pen to handwrite in Nebo. Find more details at https://myscri.pt/pens

developerAddress:
3 rue de la rainiere
44339 Nantes cedex 3
France
recentChanges:
‚Ä¢¬†You can now add highlights to¬†titles as well as colored, bold and underlined¬†text.
‚Ä¢¬†Touch and hold with the marker to change the color of¬†highlights, words, strokes, diagram shapes and math symbols.
comments: Finally a notetaking app that functions exactly how I need. The handwriting recognition is awesome, it recognizes about 99% of my cursive, which isn't the neatest writing. I'm blown away! I just wish that by purchasing it on one platform the software can be downloaded and used on another without purchasing it again. I purchased it for use on my Chromebook but when I went to download it on my Windows 10 laptop, I'll need to purchase it again.

The overall function of the app is good but it could still use a few things. Drawing straight lines and shapes would be a nice feature to have. Being able to type on freeform pages can be useful for a number of reasons(and people). I also think it would help people a lot to have a "insert recording" for recording people speaking of importing one they already have

I love this app but I wish we could scroll through PDFs using arrow keys on a bluetooth keyboard, in case we do not feel like scrolling through the PDF manually. Also, it is missing voice and adding extra space in PDFs as well as support for links to be embedded in our notes. The features it does have are done very well though. Excellent text conversion, freeform pages.

fantastic app probably the best notes app pit there. however, use the notes for field notes and after a few days of notes the app got super laggy which wasn't ideal. also wish that my handwriting in annotated pdfs could be converted to text.

Overall it's a great app. Although after an update the underlining continues even when I don't want it. For example one line under the underlined title or after an underlined word. It's kinda frustrating

title: INKredible PRO
description:
INKredible PRO includes all in-app purchase features of INKredible (a $9 value) plus free future updates.

It‚Äôs amazing how pen and paper, two inventions dating back to thousands of years ago, have been almost irreplaceable. Until now. Inheriting the best inking feature from the popular Notes Plus app, now with its own automatic palm and wrist rejection, INKredible will make writing on a tablet feel as good as, or even greater than, pen on paper. You have to try it to believe it. It‚Äôs incredible!

SIMPLE

INKredible has only ONE single mission: to create an outstanding writing experience on a tablet. It is meant to be distraction-free. In fact most of the time, you will not see any UI controls or buttons, just a blank sheet of paper to write on.

BEAUTIFUL

With more than 3 years of R&D in vector-graphics inking technology, we are confident INKredible - with a sophisticated manipulation of Bezier curves - will make your handwriting look more beautiful than on paper.

Even more specially, it will look good in any resolution, for printing or displaying purposes. Just zoom in and you will see why INKredible is unique among other handwriting apps.

‚Ä¶ and, well, PERFECT!

OK, the INKredible writing experience on a tablet might not be perfect, but it is as close to perfection as you can find.

Try it today and see for yourself.

summary: Make your handwriting beautiful, even more than pen on paper.
recentChanges: - Bug fixes (Toolbar, Share function, etc.) and improvements
comments: Great writing app. My only issue is the organization of notebooks. It seems numbers in titles are sorted by digits instead of value, so notebooks display in order as Chapter 1, Chapter 10, Chapter 2, Chapter 3, etc. If this is changed to sort by value then I would have no problems. It is great for notes and handwriting otherwise, but the current organization method is a little annoying.

This app changed the way I take notes on my phone and tablet. I was so comfortable with the old toolbar that the new one felt clunky at first, but after a few days of using the app, I can see the advantages of the new toolbar in the current app and how it will facilitate new features in the future. One feature I would absolutely love is to be able to import a PDF as a template/custom paper for new notes. I would like to create my own variant of one of the Productivity paper types for a work diary. Maybe, as an incentive for others to upgrade to the Pro version, you could create an online gallery where Pro users can create and upload their own paper types and share them with other Pro users?

Love this app for note taking. I am very excited to use it with my digital planner. Love the pens! Love that I can import my planner template. Would love to be able to use the hyperlinks set up in the planners as well as do some image editing. Specifically the ability to take an image and adjust its transparency.

More saving bugs! I think that there are auto save bug? Sometimes it kick me out and everything I previously wrote are gone! Nice apps, the best one currently in Android. But the new design updates is currently suck, it's not faster and it requires more click to change tools/color etc. Love the old design more. Also, split screen doesn't work properly any more. [mabe favorite toolbars for each tools? Cus changing color is much more harder with new designs, pls fix!]

Still great app! I feel bad though. I can see some people aren't happy with the new updated tool bar. It may be a little buggy but it does have potential. You guys really do care about the app and the quality of it, I'm sure you guys will figure it out. If I may suggest, maybe on the next update add the ability to customize the quick tools? I don't use the text tool much and I don't toggle palm rejection mode off and on but I do toggle closeup mode on and off and insert page action often. Pls x)

title: Nano Teleprompter
description:
Nano teleprompter will fulfill all your needs. with all the options that you can dream of

Now you can import and sync all your files from Google Drive, just drag and drop your files from PC, or write them directly in the browser, and they will be imported automatically to the teleprompter. supported file types are: Google Docs, MS Word, RTF, TXT, HTML. watch this video to learn more: https://youtu.be/PSWhTcaF9Fs

1- An adjustable floating widget that you can use while using the phone camera. You can resize and drag the window freely.

2- It can be used with any camera app Unlike other teleprompter apps this app can be used with any camera app in landscape and portrait mode.

3- Custom colors  and opacity for the text and the background 

4- Import your script  with one click

5- Highlight important phrases  just select the phrase and then the color

6- Open any text file directly in the floating widget. In your file explorer open a text file and choose Nano Teleprompter to open it or just select some text and press share, then select Nano Teleprompter. it will automatically open your camera app too.

7- Gesture control don't bother with numbers. Pinch to make the text bigger, and drag from the corner to change the window size

8- Adjustable delay you can delay the scrolling for a specific number of seconds 

9- Adjustable margins and space between lines

10Remote control settings you can customize your remote control buttons to pause, resume, scroll up/down, increase/decrease speed, go to next previous mark

11 Sync your file between your phones and back up to Google Drive

If you are looking for a feature rich teleprompter app , look no more :) 
We are always working on adding new features to our Teleprompter



if you have any issues or you would like to make a suggestion please contact us at:support@afellapps.com

summary: a teleprompter with many features like showing the text over any camera app
developerAddress: fatih mhl, paris sokak, cerkezkoy,Tekirdag, turkey
recentChanges:
Added the option to hide the UI button in the floating mode while scrolling.
Added the option to hide the timer.
comments: It just works. Tried multiple other apps, several which required subscriptions to get basics like a remote connected. And even then none of them worked properly with a remote. Has all of the basic features you would need, with no extra fluff or frills that most people don't. This is the app to get hands down in my opinion.

Loving this. As an actor, this is essential, especially when I get same day auditions. But I've run into a problem. I can't access my files anymore. Neither from Google drive nor from my download folder on my phone. Any and all help is appreciated. Thanks üòä
Works well, can display over camera apps, rotate portrait or landscape and can be resized and moved right beside the camera.
Just what I needed. I was about to buy a physical teleprompter when I stumbled upon this app. Et voila ! It has everything I need, and more, and it works great!
I love this app!! It really is so easy to use and is the best teleprompter option out there!! And I've tried several! üòÉ

title: Site Audit Pro
description:
‚ÄòThe fastest way to audit on the go‚Äô

Site Audit Pro makes auditing simple. Record issues, take photos, add assignees and share customisable reports easier and faster than ever before. 

Site Audit Pro helps over 40,000 businesses worldwide improve their productivity by making audits and inspections quicker to carry out and easier to manage. Whether performing a safety inspection, snagging issues, creating a punch list, or providing a quotation, Site Audit Pro will help you collate and share your findings on the go with customised reports to add a personal and professional touch. 

Features:
- Record issues with a photo, add a title, assignee and comments.
- Annotate photos to highlight important information.
- Organise issues into projects, adding site and client details specific to each project.
- Share a professional audit report instantly, without the need to head back to the office. 
- Share your reports as a PDF via email, Dropbox and more.

Customise Site Audit Pro for you or your business:
- Add personal details to your reports; include company name, logo, auditor name and signature. 
- Change the content to reflect your industry. Instead of ‚ÄòIdentified 12 issues‚Äô, why not use ‚ÄòFound 12 problems‚Äô or ‚ÄòExamined 12 properties‚Äô? Site Audit Pro is adaptable to a number of industries.
- Choose from and customise a range of 8 professional report designs.

Site Audit Pro is great for:
- Audits
- Inspections
- Punchlists / Punch Lists
- Snagging
- Site Walks
- Checklists
And so much more, whenever you need to capture and report important data, choose Site Audit Pro.

Download Site Audit Pro today to save time, improve productivity and make audits and inspections organised and hassle-free.

developerAddress:
Bank Chambers 1-3
Woodford Avenue
Gants Hill,
Ilford,
Essex
IG2 6UF
recentChanges:
What's New in 3.2.6

New:
- A rotation option for images.

Fixed:
- Empty Issues remaining when they shouldn't after the duplication of a Project.
- Various fixes applied for improved stability on certain devices.
comments: This is a great app that's easy to use and a lot of companies will find extremely useful. Unfortunately all sites and audits are 3 trades on 100 pages, but it would be great if this app could implement sub issues, e.g not just the job and the issues by date or reference, but with each job have for example 1st floor and then all 1st floor issues under that

I would like this app much more if I could navigate and edit it more easily. Edits such as easily reordering, adding, or removing issues without making the issue orders become tedious to correct. Navigating between issues by swiping left or right would be nice instead of closing the issue to move to the next. Thank you for your time.

Would be better if you could search for things like assignees etc. And create a list from ones already made, instead of having to go back through and make another list. For example, I snag plots then have to either make another list for a specific trade or manually highlight their item. An okay app overall, not sure its worth the money to be honest

My app is unable to share the report. I can't print, email, or text the projects to anyone that I need to send it to. When I go to share it, it does not attach any files. I have emailed support but have not heard back. Poor support. Would not recommend

Really useful app which helped me at work and even more when I started my own business. Had an issue recently as app wasn't sharing when I asked it to. Spoke to tech support and they sorted it for me. (Don't write extremely long titles on projects)

title: IP Cam Viewer Pro
description:
Awarded Best Software in Utilities category for 2011
Remotely access your video camera, digital video recorder, network recorder and webcam.

Over 1600+ devices supported. Use Scan Camera to automatically find compatible driver.
http://hit-mob.com/android_device_support_list.html

With 5+ years of development there are so many features they won't let me describe them properly so here's an overview.  

Wide protocol and video format support include HTTPS, RTSP and ONVIF.
Features include matrix view, pan tilt zoom, home/lock screen widgets, grouping, encryption and in-app motion detection.
Support for 2-way audio, background audio, record mode with remote control.
descriptionHTML:
Awarded Best Software in Utilities category for 2011
Remotely access your video camera, digital video recorder, network recorder and webcam.

Over 1600+ devices supported. Use Scan Camera to automatically find compatible driver.
http://hit-mob.com/android_device_support_list.html

With 5+ years of development there are so many features they won't let me describe them properly so here's an overview.

Wide protocol and video format support include HTTPS, RTSP and ONVIF.
Features include matrix view, pan tilt zoom, home/lock screen widgets, grouping, encryption and in-app motion detection.
Support for 2-way audio, background audio, record mode with remote control.
summary: Remotely view listen control and record cameras.
developerAddress:
Robert Chou
P.O. Box 1974
Danville, CA 94526
recentChanges: Bug fixes and more drivers.
comments: Yesterday's update broke all connections to my cameras. The use of a host name is what is failing. IP addresses still work. Most of my cameras are behind a dynamic IP address and must be accessed via a host name. I've been using this app for years and it's generally been very good.

Pictures is horrible and stretched. I really don't like paying for the same app twice. I bought the same app (Net eye cam) several years ago under a different name from the same creator. So now he release the same app under a different name and doesn't support the old app anymore. It's almost exactly the same app except the picture quality has been severely degraded. I've attempted to contact the creator twice now. And asked why am i buying the same app again. Still waiting for a reply.

I have been using this app for several years and it has not let me down. I have 6 IP cams around the house. The newest was the Ctronics solar powered. It requires a waken on lan signal to wake it up. I put in a request to Robert and he said it was a possibility. Last update and it was implemented. Great support!

I have been using this app for many years. It is really a very versatile, self contained app. Really like how it has settings on phone and u dont have to pit setting on someone else's database, to connect. I also worked with the developer a few years back was bit of a pain as I had to do all communications via email but person was very knowledgable and eventually got change made i needed. Really like this app.
It is easy to setup and use this app with many camera types. I would recommend checking this one out!

title: MiXplorer Silver - File Manager
description:
MiX Silver is a bundle of MiXplorer file manager and Archiver, Image, Tagger and PDF add-ons as a paid app to support development of MiXplorer.

FAQ: https://goo.gl/K9nf2y
Twitter: https://twitter.com/mixplorer

Skins: https://mixplorer.com/skins/
You can modify skin colors in the settings + Skin editor. There are also many theme packages with different icons to download. Tap on them + Import.

The best way indeed is to explore yourself. But here's a brief list of essential features:
- Easily themable with customization option which lets you select any color you like.
- Sort, disable and enable all menu options and action buttons.
- Unlimited Tabbed browsing and Dual panel in landscape mode and drag & drop between panels also supported.
- Easily create Tasks to multitask Copy, Move and other operations.
- Various view modes and sorting options for each folder separately!
- Customizable bookmarks drawer with essential file types already categorized.
- Advanced search functions.
- Html viewer.
- Font viewer.
- Export/Import all preferences and bookmarks and customized skins.
- Packing/unpacking 7z and Zip/Zip64 (splitted-encrypted), TAR, TAR.GZ, TAR.BZ2, GZIP, BZIP2, XZ, WIM, Lizard, LZ4, LZ5, Zstandard.
- Unpacking only: AR, ARJ, CAB, CHM, CPIO, CramFS, DMG, EXT, FAT, GPT, HFS, IHEX, ISO, LZH, LZMA, MBR, MSI, NSIS, NTFS, QCOW2, RAR/RAR5, RPM, SquashFS, UDF, UEFI, VDI, VHD, VMDK, XAR and Z.
- All your cloud storage needs accessible from one single app. Choose from 19 providers:
    Mega.co.nz, Mail.ru, Dropbox, Box, Yandex, HiDrive, Baidu, Mediafire, IDrive, Hubic, 4Sync, 4Shared, Google Drive, Meo, OneDrive, OneDrive Business, pCloud, SugarSync, VDisk.
    + clouds which support webdav like (Yandex.ru, OwnCloud, MyDrive.ch, DriveHQ, CloudMe, CloudSafe).
- Modifying zip files.
- EPub, MobiPacket and PDF reader add-on.
- Root access for all advanced operations.
- EncFS volumes supported for all storages.
- File encryption and decryption using Aescrypt file format.
- FTP/HTTP/WebDav Servers + TCP server to receive files from the other devices which using MiXplorer (Send-to option).
- Image Viewer (it supports GIF, SVG, TGA, ICO).
- Media Player + VLC codecs add-on.
- Powerful Text Editor and Code Editor.
- SAMBA (SMB1, SMB2.0/2.1), FTP, SFTP, WEBDAV supported as well.
- RAW and TIFF decoder.

And many more awesome features for you to explore!
descriptionHTML:
MiX Silver is a bundle of MiXplorer file manager and Archiver, Image, Tagger and PDF add-ons as a paid app to support development of MiXplorer.

FAQ: https://goo.gl/K9nf2y
Twitter: https://twitter.com/mixplorer

Skins: https://mixplorer.com/skins/
You can modify skin colors in the settings + Skin editor. There are also many theme packages with different icons to download. Tap on them + Import.

The best way indeed is to explore yourself. But here's a brief list of essential features:
- Easily themable with customization option which lets you select any color you like.
- Sort, disable and enable all menu options and action buttons.
- Unlimited Tabbed browsing and Dual panel in landscape mode and drag & drop between panels also supported.
- Easily create Tasks to multitask Copy, Move and other operations.
- Various view modes and sorting options for each folder separately!
- Customizable bookmarks drawer with essential file types already categorized.
- Advanced search functions.
- Html viewer.
- Font viewer.
- Export/Import all preferences and bookmarks and customized skins.
- Packing/unpacking 7z and Zip/Zip64 (splitted-encrypted), TAR, TAR.GZ, TAR.BZ2, GZIP, BZIP2, XZ, WIM, Lizard, LZ4, LZ5, Zstandard.
- Unpacking only: AR, ARJ, CAB, CHM, CPIO, CramFS, DMG, EXT, FAT, GPT, HFS, IHEX, ISO, LZH, LZMA, MBR, MSI, NSIS, NTFS, QCOW2, RAR/RAR5, RPM, SquashFS, UDF, UEFI, VDI, VHD, VMDK, XAR and Z.
- All your cloud storage needs accessible from one single app. Choose from 19 providers:
Mega.co.nz, Mail.ru, Dropbox, Box, Yandex, HiDrive, Baidu, Mediafire, IDrive, Hubic, 4Sync, 4Shared, Google Drive, Meo, OneDrive, OneDrive Business, pCloud, SugarSync, VDisk.
+ clouds which support webdav like (Yandex.ru, OwnCloud, MyDrive.ch, DriveHQ, CloudMe, CloudSafe).
- Modifying zip files.
- EPub, MobiPacket and PDF reader add-on.
- Root access for all advanced operations.
- EncFS volumes supported for all storages.
- File encryption and decryption using Aescrypt file format.
- FTP/HTTP/WebDav Servers + TCP server to receive files from the other devices which using MiXplorer (Send-to option).
- Image Viewer (it supports GIF, SVG, TGA, ICO).
- Media Player + VLC codecs add-on.
- Powerful Text Editor and Code Editor.
- SAMBA (SMB1, SMB2.0/2.1), FTP, SFTP, WEBDAV supported as well.
- RAW and TIFF decoder.

And many more awesome features for you to explore!
summary: A full-featured file manager
developerAddress: Quds Street, Hor Al Anz, Near Abu Hail - Metro Station - Deira, Abjad Grand Hotel, R-429 - Dubai - United Arab Emirates
recentChanges:
- Fixed not automatically removing the deleted folder from the list which is happening in the previous version.
- Some optimizations for TV and added 'Column count' option for Grid/Gallery view modes for non touch screen devices.
- Reset your passwords in the server settings page. It doesn't save your naked password. There is a new problem that you need to enter the password again, when you open the settings page. I will work on it.
comments: Best root file manager for Android. I can't believe it replaces my MP3 player and my PDF viewer and my video player, also I can play all my videos on my samba network. The text editor works wonderful, you need a precise text editor especially if you're editing files in the root directory. Just a fantastic application. Hence the reason why I bought it. Also I wanted to support the developer of course.

There is a 'No item renamed' popup, everytime I try to rename any folder (happening on sdcard only). I've tried doing same on the default file manager of my device..there it goes well,no problem.. Hope u understand the problem now.. Edit- Thank you SO much Hootan Parsa. It's solved now. This happened just today, dont know how it got tweaked(maybe Buggy MIUI)

My search ends here... After ESFileExplorer got sold to some crapy company which made it worse, I tried switching to almost all the popular file explorers, but finally after testing this awesome file explorer for a whole year now, I am proudly purchasing it today to support its development. Earlier I was always hesitant to install this app because it contained 'Mi' in its name. All the other file explorers are not even half way nearer to this piece of amazing software which is full of intutiv

Best file manager app out there on PlayStore. File Sharing through inbuilt HTTP/HTTPS/FTP/etc. You can compress/extract zip/rar/tar/etc. Theme can be customized. You can open multiple tabs with swipe gestures. Inbuilt code-editor, text-editor, html-viewer, pdf/ebook-viewer, music player, video player and much more. This one app has replaced more than 11 individual apps that I used in the past. This app is worth every penny. Kudos to the Developers. üëèüëè Keep the updates rolling... üòé

Starting from Android 11 (Samsung), Mixplorer will attempt to go to root folder when pressing back button from internal storage instead of quitting the app. EDIT: Ok, it seems I have found the problem. When opening Android/data or obb folder, Mixplorer will request permission from built in- manager. Correct folder must be selected, or else the problem mentioned above will happen. Thanks dev for quick reply.

title: iBend Pipe
description:
iBend Pipe saves you time and pipe. Helping you bend it right - the first time.

If you are an electrician that needs to make fast accurate conduit bends, this is the app you have been waiting for.

Enter values quickly by using sliders.

Forget about converting your values to decimals, use fractions instead. METRIC is NOT currently supported.

‚Ä¢Calculate conduit bend marks for a kicked 90 ****NEW FEATURE**** 

‚Ä¢Calculate conduit bend marks for an offset, by entering height and bend angle.

‚Ä¢Calculate conduit bend marks for a rolled offset, by entering the rise and roll of your offset.

‚Ä¢Calculate conduit bend marks for a three bend saddle, by entering saddle height and choosing bend angles.

‚Ä¢Calculate the adjustment for the starting point of an offset to make your offsets parallel.

‚Ä¢Calculate conduit bend marks for a compound 90 to avoid a round, square or rectangular object in a corner.

‚Ä¢Calculate conduit bend marks for a segmented 90. 

‚Ä¢Calculate conduit bend marks for 90 stub up. 

‚Ä¢Ability to edit the deducts/take-up for different size pipe.


Additional conduit bending calculations will be added in upcoming updates.

comments: Love the app Brother, but android is saying out of date. Help. If your phone updates over and over Uninstaller this app. I locks vzw and future updates so you are constantly getting update notifications
Great app on my friends iPhone but everything was overlapped on my android and I couldn't enter numbers

love the App. constantly using it to flex on my JW. the majority of the people in the trade that I've shown this app too have purchased it as well. Saves time, energy and conduit! only gave a 4 star because I would really like to be able to use all of the iOS features. If the developers are struggling to convert the app over to android, contact me. I know a guy!
This is an awesome app, it has helped me a whole lot with pipes and tubes bending. Thank you iBend Pipe.
Awesome app but come on guys update this app and keep it updated !!!! Imperial and metric please . I used to use this app all the time now never .

title: Millimeter Pro - screen ruler, protractor, level
description:
Millimeter is a  screen ruler app. It uses full screen  of Android device for distance and length measurements as caliper or tape measure. Place an object on the scale paper screen and simply touch and move rulers to measure it. Check features for more details. Pro version measures area, circle, radius and diameter, angles, ratio and splits into equal parts, angle

NO POP-UP ADS on your screen in the app unlike other free ruler apps on market. Best and real full screen ruler.

‚òõ ANY DEVICE  can be calibrated for accurate measurements in Calibration Mode, where common standard objects (coins, credit cards, etc) can be used as a reference.

More about app: goo.gl/aF9L9Q
üìñ posts about app: http://goo.gl/304nJB

üìè  What you can do in Pro version of the app:

- Calibrate Millimeter with custom or standard objects (üí≥)
- Ruler Mode for measure in metric and imperial units: mm and inch
- Use fractions for inch units
- Use app as standard ruler
- Use full screen mode for better user experience in Ruler mode
- Additional vertical ruler for 2D measurements (üìê)
- Area measurement for 2D measurements (‚¨õ)
- Calculate W/H ratio of the rectangular objects in 2D
- Parts Mode to split length or objects in equal parts
- Thread per inch ( TPI ) measurement pattern (üî©) in Parts mode (https://youtu.be/M1Qrbs2bgCY)

- Spirit / bubble level for checking incline or tilt angle üîÆ
- Circle Mode to measure circular objects (üî¥)
- Split circle into equal sector / angle
- Protractor / Goniometer Mode - measure angles (‚ö™)
- Lock / Unlock rulers in any mode for better usability (üîí)
- Set exact size, length, diameter, number of parts manually with keyboard input (‚å®)
- Change background to BW night mode for power saving (üîã) and better visualization (üåì)
- turn on/of fine grid (1 mm for millimeter units)
- Read interactive Help / Guide about all available features in a mode

Use this screen ruler in different areas to measure small objects  that fit  your phone or tablet screen :  jewelry, jewels, rings üíç , stones, screws, bolts, buttons diameter, nuts, knitting needles, knitting pattern, washers, insects, mosaic tile, hooks, thread, frame wrap angle, etc.

Units: millimeter (mm), inch (in). Fractions are supported for inch units.

Supported languages:
- English, German, Russian, Japanese and French languages.


‚òé If you have any problems with the app on your device, please contact support@vistechprojects.com first and we will help you. Thank you.

VisTech.Projects Team.


Note:
measurement range limited by size of your screen and with fine calibration the app gives you accuracy comparable to standard ruler or measure tape.

comments: Love all the features. Although I'd rarely use it, for $1.39 it's good to just have the tool. Only suggestion is to change the app icon to match the app's minimalist nature. I think it would also make the app more attractive on the Play Store. :)

One feature I'd enjoy to have would be to save some of the measurements for quick excess when looking for the size/diameter of bit or bolt etc! At toolbox or store Smooth setup that can screenshot or hit lock simple to get hang of one would feel a lot more accurate getting a bolt a bit size. When at the toolbox or hardware store. like any beloved app update welcome but this is simply smooth well made app

Very very well put together. Minimalist and extremely user friendly. There's nothing I would change or add. Completely free of ads and privacy intrusions. This app should be part of every phone's toolset and I sincerely hope the developers keep the excellence flowing.

Can you please add an option(further expand on the width and diameter) into this app. So that the user can create shapes(geometrical shapes [square, rectangle, circle, triangle, etc....) that can be assigned manual sizes (mm's & inches[example: height: mm*width:mm])) and exported as Png's?

This app seems to be extremely accurate, but I do find it a little confusing to set up & use. I'm sure it will become easier as I use it more. The area function looks to be especially useful. Thanks. I consider it money very well spent.

title: Work Log Pro
description:
Work Log is a quick and easy way to keep track of your shifts and calculate the number of hours worked and wages paid over your pay period. 
Work Log Pro unlocks all of the features of Work Log, including: exporting shifts as a spreadsheet or as a PDF, importing and exporting backups of your shifts, removing ads and support for multiple jobs.

NOTE:
*Work Log Pro unlocks all of the features of Work Log. DO NOT uninstall Work Log Free as it has all of your data. Both Work Log and Work Log Pro must be installed in order to benefit from all of the features available.

BACKUPS:
You can backup and transfer your data by emailing the backup to yourself from the General Settings using the Backup Database option. You can then open the attachment directly from the email on the device you would like to import the shifts to.

‚Ä¢ Fast, simple and straightforward way to track work hours
‚Ä¢ Time saving features like automatic break deduction and pay period settings
‚Ä¢ Choose between punching in and out or manually entering your shift hours
‚Ä¢ Easy to update, delete or add past shifts
‚Ä¢ Keep track of multiple jobs, each with their own settings
‚Ä¢ Lots of customization options to suit your needs like 24h formatting, selecting when your week starts and a variety of ways to view your past shifts
‚Ä¢ See how many hours you've worked and earned over a pay period, week, month or year
‚Ä¢ Set your pay period to automatically calculate how many hours you worked and your wages for each paycheck
‚Ä¢ Automatically have deductions and/or bonuses calculated for paychecks
‚Ä¢ Optionally keep track of sales or tips (useful if you make commision or tips. useful for servers or sales people)
‚Ä¢ Set breaks to be automatically deducted from shifts over a given period of time. (ie. 30 minutes deducted after a 5 hour shift, 45 minutes deducted after an 8 hour shift), or enter breaks manually
‚Ä¢ Keep track of overtime hours and wages for up to two overtimes
‚Ä¢ Use widgets to punch in and out quickly, or as a shortcut to add a new shift. (tap on the punch in time to cancel it)
‚Ä¢ Easily backup and restore all shifts to keep all of your information safe and to easily transition to a new device
‚Ä¢ Export your recorded shifts as a spreadsheet (.CSV) by week, month, year, pay period or all recorded shifts.
‚Ä¢ Ad free


Customization
‚Ä¢ Choose between a light and dark theme to suit your style
‚Ä¢ Display times with am/pm times or with a 24h clock
‚Ä¢ Display a currency symbol from over 100 countries
‚Ä¢ Set a backup reminder to remind you to backup your database every week, two weeks, month or two months
‚Ä¢ Set your pay period to be calculated by weeks, months, days or by half months (1st-15th, 16th-last)
‚Ä¢ Keep track of sales, optionally add sales to your paycheck, or a percent of sales (ideal for servers of sales staff)
‚Ä¢ Keep track of tips, optionally add tips to your paycheck
‚Ä¢ Option to automatically round shifts to 15m, 30m or 60m increments
‚Ä¢ Display hours in decimal (7.5h) or hours:minutes (7h 30m) format 
‚Ä¢ Have flat rate and/or percentage deductions automatically made to paycheck calculations to account for taxes or any other deductions
‚Ä¢ Have flat rate and/or percentage bonuses automatically made to paycheck calculations to account for things like vacation pay
‚Ä¢ Keep track of up to 2 overtimes, such as receive 1.5 times normal pay for a shift over 8h and 2 times normal pay for a shift over 12h. This could also be applied to pay periods, for example, 1.25 times normal pay for pay periods over 40h and 1.5 times normal pay for pay periods over 50h. All hours and pay rates are customizable.

Permissions
Internet Access and View Network State:
‚Ä¢ Required for analytics and ads
Modify/Delete SD Card Contents: 
‚Ä¢ Required to save database and .CSV files to storage to export

comments: Ive been using this app for years. I wish youd add a feature for multi future shifts, so its easier to input repeated shifts. Like for days/weeks in advance. I'd love to be able to input shifts for multiple days at once time and not input each shift separately. I'd also like an on-call option - it's different than overtime/shift differential. Like if I work 3 to 5 at normal rate but 5-6 at on call rate. It's not a whole shift, so I can't use either of those options. Color coding for shifts.

Great app. Very helpful for helping me keep track of my hours and making sure the business doesn't screw me over Haha. Unfortunately, if I can't remember my break, I think a great feature would be this app calculating simply by typing in how many hours was worked for after putting in the clock in and clock out (and leaving the break blank).

Wonderful at doing its job. Easy. Fast. To the point. Convenient widget. My only complaint: switching to another app (like a calculator or notes) and then switching back resets the view to the most recent pay period as opposed to the one you were previously on. Seems like a fragment or Nav error...
Great app for hour tracking. Love the fact you can deduct tax rates and anything else to see within pennies how much your check will be without any hassle to figure it out yourself! Amazing!!!
Works just as expected. Very intuitive and practical. I love the punch in function and the notification indicating the amount of hours worked. Premium is deafinitely worth the extra few bucks!

title: Root Explorer
description:
Root Explorer is the ultimate file manager for root users. Access the whole of android's file system (including the elusive data folder!).

Features include multiple tabs, Google Drive, Box, Dropbox and network (SMB) support, SQLite database viewer, Text Editor, create and extract zip or tar/gzip files, extract rar archives, multi-select, execute scripts, search, remount, permissions, bookmarks, send files (via email, bluetooth etc), image thumbnails, APK binary XML viewer, change file owner/group, create symbolic link, "Open With" facility, MD5, create shortcuts.

For fast, friendly support simply email us: support@speedsoftware.co.uk

We will always try to help with any problem you may have with the app. If we can't help then you can have a refund, no questions asked.

Although 22,000+ five star ratings will tell you that most people are very satisfied customers. Make sure you read as many comments as possible to get a good idea of what most people think of the app.

We still respect the old 24 hour refund policy. So if you're not happy with the app just email us within 24 hours and you can have a refund. We'll need to know the order number, which you can find on the emails sent to you by Google when you downloaded.

Why compromise? Get the original and the best!

New permissions:

Full network access - Required for network and cloud access. No information is passed to us over the internet.

Add or remove accounts - Used by the Google Drive SDK to add a new account if desired. No changes are made to existing accounts and no details accessed apart from the account name.

Find accounts on the device - Used to list available accounts for logging into Google Drive.

Prevent from sleeping - Used to stop the device sleeping during long operations so they are not interrupted.

Somehow I have used this app for 10+ years and never left a review. Root Explorer is THE de-facto standard for browsing files on an Android device in my opinion. I have become so accustomed to it I truly would not be able to function without it. I use this on an unrooted device and it is just fine. Obviously I do not browse root shares. Samba / Windows Share connectivity works great and is easily my most used feature. Now that I have a VPN setup I can easily grab files from my PC remotely!

It doesn't work, I just bought it and nothing happens from the beginning, when I try to give it permission it crashes and nothing happens, I need my money back... My cell phone model is a Samsung a 71

title: Electrician's Bible
