title: QuickEdit Text Editor Pro - Writer & Code Editor
description:
QuickEdit text editor is a fast, stable and full featured text editor. It has been optimized for using on both phones and tablets.

QuickEdit text editor can be used as standard text editor for plain text files, or as a code editor for programming files. It is suitable for both general and professional use.

QuickEdit text editor includes a number of performance optimizations and user experience tweaks. The speed and responsiveness of the app are much better than other text editor apps commonly found on Google Play.

Features:

‚úì Enhanced notepad application with numerous improvements.
‚úì Code editor and syntax highlight for 50+ languages (C++, C#, Java, XML, Javascript, Markdown, PHP, Perl, Python, Ruby, Smali, Swift, etc).
‚úì High performance with no lag, even on large text files (more than 10,000 lines).
‚úì Easily navigate between multiple open tabs.
‚úì Show or hide line numbers.
‚úì Undo and redo changes without limit.
‚úì Display, increase, or decrease line indentations.
‚úì Fast selecting and editing abilities.
‚úì Physical keyboard support, including key combinations.
‚úì Smooth scrolling both vertically and horizontally.
‚úì Directly target any specified line number.
‚úì Quickly search and replace content.
‚úì Easily input hex color values.
‚úì Automatically detect charset and encoding.
‚úì Automatically indent new lines.
‚úì Various fonts and sizes.
‚úì Preview HTML, CSS, and markdown files.
‚úì Open files from recently opened or added file collections.
‚úì Ability to edit system files on rooted devices.
‚úì Access files from FTP, Google Drive, Dropbox, and OneDrive.
‚úì Handy tool to edit INI, LOG, TXT files and hack games.
‚úì Supports both light and dark themes.
‚úì Optimized usage for phones and tablets.
‚úì Ad-free version.

If you can help to translate this application to your native language, please contact our email: support@rhmsoft.com.

If you run into any issues or have any suggestions, please feel free to contact us: support@rhmsoft.com
You can also share your comments with the QuickEdit thread on xda-developers: 
http://forum.xda-developers.com/android/apps-games/app-quickedit-text-editor-t2899385

Thanks for using QuickEdit!

developerAddress: Rhythm Software, 5319 University Dr PMB 2435, Irvine, CA 92612, United States
recentChanges: ‚úì Display navigation drawer by default when "save as".
comments: No Font foreground colors. Colors for programming purposes only, but you programmers are not smart enough to choose your own colors.

This is by far one of the best, if not the best, text editors for Android I've seen. It's one of the very few apps that I wish the developers would have a separate "support us" option. I understand it's against Google's policy for that type of option, but I see you have a website soooo... Anyways keep up the good work, and thank you!

Like others, I was looking to move away from Jotterpad after their disastrous version 13 which paywalled cloud sync. QuickEdit pro is a fantastic alternative, a full featured text editor suitable for handheld or tablet use, and with fully functional dropbox sync. Effortlessly handles large files; a 70,000 word file opens, scrolls and edits as quickly as the smallest shopping list. Also runs wonderfully on Chromebook.

Problem I didn't have with the free version of the app - If I lose my net connection and try to save a file, the attempted upload to Drive gets stuck, even after I've reconnected. I then can't open the file from Drive with QE. In a roundabout way I'm able to make a copy in Drive and delete the old file. However, the old file remains in an upload loop in the bin, and can't be deleted permanently (though it may auto delete after 30 days).

Nice app with good UI. Feature missing!! If I update a file on ftp server through another editor, the changes are not reflected in same file which is already opened in QuickEdit+ editor. Once changes detected in file, it has to prompt user to reload file or ignore. File conflict occurs often without this feature. Manual reload option currently available, but also needs auto refresh feature. Auto refresh option is must for code editors. Hope this feature will be included on next update.

title: The Bullet Journal Companion
description:
The Bullet Journal¬Æ Companion 2.0 is designed from the ground up to help you get the most out of your BuJo¬Æ practice and your notebook. Version two is packed with the most requested features by the community.

FEATURES:

‚Ä¢ The Log - Quickly capture Tasks, Events, and Notes when away from your notebook.
‚Ä¢ Library - Backup and Tag and search all your notebooks.
‚Ä¢ Guide - Learn the how to Bullet Journal¬Æ.
‚Ä¢ Reflection - Help form the powerful habit of reflection.
‚Ä¢ Articles - Get inspired by the global community.
‚Ä¢ Monthly prompts - Make sure you're prepared each month.
‚Ä¢ Designed by Ryder Carroll, creator of the Bullet Journal¬Æ system.

NEW in version 2.0:

‚Ä¢ Take pictures of all your pages.
‚Ä¢ Back up your Bullet Journals to your Files app.
‚Ä¢ Restore old notebooks on new devices.
‚Ä¢ View reflections from months past.
‚Ä¢ Redesigned reminders notifications.
‚Ä¢ Log items expire after 72 hours.
‚Ä¢ New views to organize your entire library of Bullet Journals.
‚Ä¢ Now faster and more responsive.
‚Ä¢ Numerous optimizations and bug fixes.

NOTE:

This app is NOT designed to replace your notebook. It is a companion FOR your notebook.

comments: Pretty good - some missing feature though. Like the 120 page limit (my notebook has more), the requirement of a date to take a picture (be nice to be optional), the inability to have overlap in months (I trade out notes ALOT, and would like to organize by notebook more than date). All in all a solid app though.

This app works just as it says, a companion to a bujo.My one gripe:one of the settings keeps resetting.You're able to take pictures of your journal and log them in the app, and it can remind you to back them up weekly or monthly during your bi-daily reflections.I try to turn these "Backup Reminders" off, but every time I close the app and restart it the setting reverts to reminding me weekly.It's not a big deal at all, but it's annoying to be reminded every week of something I don't want to do.

Why oh why oh why are the odd pages on the left and even pages on the right?? I'm completely unable to use the app because I can't accurately represent page spreads and it feels wrong to put page 1 on page 2. I want to love this but instead I hate it. Please add a toggle switch for "page one left/right" and then I can use it.
Bullet Journaling (Bujo) is a great tool for keeping track of things. This companion app makes Bujoing even better. When I forget my notebook, I can use the app's logs to still keep on top of things

Edit: changed from 1 star ü§¶‚Äç‚ôÇÔ∏èI thought library was guide information. Why wouldn't this option be called something more reminiscent of what it is, example "my journal" or "bullet journal" library is so vague. It could refer app storage, library doesn't exactly scream to first time users "this is where you record your journal, you know, the one journal you've started, the one you only have one of, that is not consistent of a libary of many books and journals"don't let fancy words ruin usability

title: aWallet Cloud Password Manager
description:
‚Ä¢ Securely stores your passwords, credit card information, e-banking credentials, web accounts and other custom data.
‚Ä¢ Synchronizes encrypted data with your own cloud account: Dropbox or Google Drive.
‚Ä¢ There is a built-in Editor for changing or creating new data Categories with custom icons.
‚Ä¢ Search within fields.
‚Ä¢ Contains no advertisements.
‚Ä¢ Supports backup and restore of the encrypted data file to the Android USB device.
‚Ä¢ Export of unencrypted data in CSV format to the USB device.
‚Ä¢ There is an Auto lock feature that can be preconfigured for a specific period of time.

PRO FEATURES, included:
‚Ä¢ Unlock with fingerprint (on a compatible device with Android 6 or later)
‚Ä¢ Unlock with face (on a compatible device with Android 10 or later)
‚Ä¢ Password Generator
‚Ä¢ CSV Import

SECURITY FEATURES
‚Ä¢ All data is encrypted, including Entry names, Category definitions and the data itself.
‚Ä¢ Encrypts data using AES and Blowfish algorithms with key sizes of 256, 192 and 128 bits.
‚Ä¢ When the data file is decrypted, up to all combinations of algorithm, key size and cipher mode of operation (CBC, CFB, OFB and ECB) are tried with the Master password to unlock the data file. This makes brute force attacks longer. The app itself does not store any hint to the actual cipher, key size or cipher mode of operation.
‚Ä¢ Uses a randomly generated 'salt' combined with the Master password. Salt helps to protect from off-line dictionary attacks.
‚Ä¢ The key to open the data file is created by combining your master password with the 512-bit 'salt'. The result is hashed 1000 times by SHA-256. Repetitive hashing makes a brute force attack more difficult.
‚Ä¢ Supports auto destruction of the data file after a predefined number of unsuccessful unlocks have been tried.

For more info see http://www.awallet.org/

If you like this App, rate it in Google Play. If you have any suggestions, just let me know.

comments: Exactly what I needed. I can't always easily find the notebook w/my pw. I originally had the non-cloud version which was fine until I destroyed my phone and needed a new one. I quickly learned the benefit of the cloud version. I recently got a new phone and with 10 sync I have all my pw.
Had this app for years and it's great. I've turned my aging parents to it as well. I had issue with synchronization and to my surprise my email was answered quickly with the solution to my problem.
my go-to app for password management. simple to use across multiple platforms. Always reliable.

Just transferred all my passwords, addresses, etc. to my new phone. Re-installed the app from Play store without having to buy it again. Nice deal! Everything came over easy and works just like it used to. I also backed up to an SD card before transferring, just to be safe. This app works so well and has all the features I need in a password manager.

Been using it for years. Well today I just lost half of my passwords. I know exactly how to restore from my Dropbox cloud. Today for some reason something popped up and I hit the wrong thing and lost half my passwords. Emailed back and forth and they kept telling me I was choosing an old file. How do I choose the wrong or old file when I just click on Dropbox and it automatically syncs? Very disappointed.

title: @Voice Premium License
description:
IMPORTANT: After buying, please install this very small app on your phone or tablet. It MUST BE INSTALLED DIRECTLY FROM GOOGLE PLAY app store for the license to work correctly.

Optional upgrade for @Voice Aloud Reader. Removes all the ads and enables extra features. Also saves you battery and Internet transfer otherwise wasted on downloading and showing ads

Please make sure that you have the original @Voice Aloud Reader installed on your device before downloading/buying this app.

After installing this @Voice Premium License app, please exit and restart the main @Voice Aloud Reader program (press 3 dots menu button at top-right - Exit) to get rid of the ads, then start again.

Additional features enabled in the main @Voice app by this license:

* Recording to sound files has an option to continue automatically through the entire reading list or ebook. Free version stops recording after finishing each article from the list or each ebook chapter.

* Use tags with speech replacements, under the Settings menu ‚Äì Edit speech. One could have separate sets of speech replacements e.g. for scientific articles, fiction etc., and easily switch them with these tags.

* Processing of voice change annotations in text, so that some parts of text could be spoken in different voices or even different languages.

* Other Premium features may be added to the app with time.

recentChanges:
Ver. 1.7.4
* Update to new Google Play requirements (AAB format)
comments: Thanks. Great app. Appreciate turning any article into a podcast. Does a pretty good job of skipping over unrelated content (ads, plugs for other articles) -- way better than read aloud in Edge. Only thing I wish it had was a way up queue up multiple articles. Eg if it's already reading something, sharing to the app would download and queue up that next article.

Greetings and thanks for the app! Thus far it's been the best voice reader I've found and was happy to purchase the premium version (it has the honor of being the first thing i've ever bought on the app store after years of being a cheapskate). One thing I was wondering: Since there's the option to repeat a single sentence X amount of times, could it be possible to do the same with paragraphs? That'd make this app (near) perfect and something i'd appreciate greatly! Again, thanks and peace

@Voice is amazing :-) ... But I need some help with the license... I bought the premium license on my mobile. I also have a tablet and when I try to install the app there I get the option to buy the license again (even if I hit "install" from my library. I tried buying the license again anyway, but after choosing the payment method and typing the password, Play Store says I can't finish the process because I already have the app. Can you help me, please?

I have benefited from the use of the free app for some time now and although the ads were not particularly obtrusive in the free app this developer deserves the financial support for creating an app that so many people get great use out of. I hope they do bring in additional features but even if not, I'm thankful for it as is.

OMG! I think I just died and went to heaven! This is brilliant! Should get an Emmy, Oscar, Best Android app of 2021, 2020, 2019! SOMETHING! I have been using the windows version of this and it's a pain in the derriere! This is a breeze to use! You are a Saint for doing this! Especially since everyone is 500 character impared! Thank you Twitter! At least this can read for them! I gotta ask, got this for win-10?

title: RealCalc Plus
description:
RealCalc Plus is the pro version of Android's most popular scientific calculator.

RealCalc Plus is designed to look and operate exactly like a real hand-held calculator. It has all the standard scientific functions plus fractions, degrees/minutes/seconds, history, memories, customizable unit conversions and constants. You can choose from a number of display styles and formats. It also supports binary, octal and hexadecimal calculations and has an optional RPN mode. RealCalc Plus is easy to use, but has full help included in the app.

RealCalc Plus includes the following features:
* Traditional algebraic or RPN operation
* Fraction calculations and conversion to/from decimal
* Degrees/minutes/seconds calculations and conversion
* 12-digit display
* Extended internal precision (32-digit)
* User-customizable unit conversions
* User-customizable constants
* Percentages
* Result history
* 10 memories
* Binary, octal, and hexadecimal (can be enabled in Settings)
* Trig functions in degrees, radians or grads
* Scientific, engineering and fixed-point display modes
* 7-segment, dot-matrix or standard font display
* Landscape mode
* Homescreen widget (now with RPN support)
* Configurable digit grouping and decimal point
* Three RPN styles: direct-entry (classic RealCalc mode), buffered-entry, or XYZT rolling stack
* Samsung multi-window support with drag & drop
* External keyboard support
* Full built-in help

developerAddress: Quartic Software, 61 Bridge Street, Kington, HR5 3DJ, United Kingdom
recentChanges:
* Homescreen widget now supports RPN (follows app by default, can be changed in settings).
* New delta-percent function.
* Support for Android 6.0 Marshmallow.
* Fixed possible crash on a few devices running 5.1 (Jiayu S3, Lenovo K3 Note).
comments: I have used this app almost every day, I bought the paid version pretty quickly. It has seen application at my workplace (engineering, programming), in my home workshop (measure twice, cut once)and even for help with my hobbies (scale models). The number 1 "Goto" solution for a pocket calculator.

I bought the pro version years ago. A permanent license for an excellent scientific calculator for a fair price? In the days of perpetual subscription services, this is a breath of fresh air! Truly a 2œÄ radien turn from so many other apps.

I can't recommend this more highly, particularly for surveyors or engineers who are used to HP35 series (but better) and RPN. I actually bought this a second time on another Google account just to support the creator, brilliant, just perfect.

Lovely calculator. Like many I have been using the free version for years and thought it right to buy the very reasonably priced full version. Nice not to have any ads / please pay reminders and just enjoy the quality calculator that does all I need and more. Recommended.
Purchased this years ago, sadly they haven't updated in 6 years. It's still been great, but widget recently stopped working properly.

title: ownCloud
description:
Welcome to the ownCloud Android App ‚Äì Add an ownCloud server, and have your private file sync and share cloud up and running in no time.

Do you need private file sync and share software?  Then good news, because the ownCloud Android App enables you to connect Android devices to a private ownCloud Server running in your data center. ownCloud is open source file sync and share software for everyone from individuals operating the free ownCloud server, to large enterprises and service providers operating under the ownCloud Enterprise Subscription.  ownCloud provides a safe, secure and compliant file sync and share solution ‚Äì on servers you control.

With the ownCloud Android App you can browse all of your ownCloud synced files, create and edit new files, share these files and folders with co-workers, and keep the contents of those folders in sync across all of your devices.  Simply copy a file into a directory on your server and ownCloud does the rest.

Whether using a mobile device, a desktop, or the web client, ownCloud provides the ability to put the right files in the right hands at the right time on any device in one simple-to-use, secure, private and controlled solution.  After all, with ownCloud, it‚Äôs Your Cloud, Your Data, Your Way.

Should you have any problem connecting or synchronizing with your ownCloud server, please contact us on https://github.com/owncloud/android/issues or check https://central.owncloud.org.

Visit us at www.ownCloud.com for more information about ownCloud and the ownCloud Subscriptions.  For more information on the free and open source ownCloud Server, visit www.ownCloud.org.

*** If you are experiencing login issues after an update and the ownCloud Workaround App is installed in your device, please, try to uninstall and reinstall the Workaround App ***

recentChanges:
- Add PKCE support
- Replace picker to select camera folder with the native one
- Hide "More" section if all options are disabled
- Note icon in music player to be branded
comments: Edit: Re-installed the app and it now works. Maybe a problem with setting acces to files on phone? Suggest to add an option in settings to check/update permissions when needed. It now works so i am updting to 4 stars for now. Previous review: Unable to download/upload files from the app. I can remove files and reate folders without problem. I have confirmed that I am able to do both from a web browser. I am using the official owncloud server docker container behind haproxy.

It was working fine for a while but after the camera path settings were changed and I pointed to the right path for pics and video, now the app crashes every time I open it. Update: This has been fixed!

Switching between accounts is broken in this version. While I'm here: whenever I 'share' a local file to owncloud a menu pops up with account choices (because I have multiple accounts set up). My name is the same on all these accounts so I have no idea which is which. Can you change it to display usernames as well / instead?

First,Seems i cannot automatlly upload my old photos, and when i copy a photo into the sync folder, it cannot be detected. Second, if the app can let me sync more than 1 picture folder automatlly is better Third, if the app can let me sync a not picture folder automatlly is better.
Easy to use. Great UI design.

title: aCalendar+ Calendar & Tasks
description:
aCalendar 2 is available NOW! 
We improved everything but kept it familiar.
For questions or problems see our new help system at https://acalendar.tapirapps.de or contact our support at support@tapirapps.de

aCalendar+ is the premium version of aCalendar - with all features unlocked and no ads.

aCalendar+ gives you many additional calendar features and your purchase supports further development and helps protecting the endangered Mountain Tapir.

EXTRA FEATURES (aCalendar+ or as In-App-Purchase)
‚óè Public holidays (and school holidays for some countries) - configurable in the calendar list
‚óè More colors (theme/UI colors, background colors, calendar colors, event colors)
‚óè Business features (Invite attendees, link contacts, free/busy, private, profiles, share as ICS)
‚óè Tasks (manage Google Tasks or tasks from CalDAV/OpenTasks)
‚óè No ads (removes the occasional ad)
‚ô• Tapir Apps donates 10% of all revenue to rainforest conservation through our friends at World Land Trust

FEATURES
‚óè intuitive navigation with smooth transitions
‚óè day, week, month and year view
‚óè Fullscreen widgets
‚óè flexible recurrences like every 3 weeks, every 17 days, or every Mon, Wed and Fri
‚óè over 100 colors to choose from as calendar color
‚óè per-event colors (even if not supported by the event's calendar)
‚óè custom event font size
‚óè birthdays & anniversaries with photos from your addressbook and editing
‚óè uses Android's native calendar backend and synchronization

USAGE
‚óè move forward and backward in the calendar by swiping vertically
‚óè switch between calendar views with a horizontal swipe (opens the day or week you start the swipe gesture on) or double-tap for day view
‚óè tap to open a calendar event
‚óè long-press to add new calendar event
‚óè long-press on mini-month to go to today or jump to date
‚óè configurable actions on 3-finger-tap, tap on title, volume buttons 
‚óè long press an event in day view to drag to a different time

PERMISSIONS
aCalendar only requests permissions needed for app functionality. aCalendar+ respects your privacy and will NEVER send any of your private data anywhere unless configured by YOU. Please contact us if you have questions about permissions.

TRANSLATIONS
aCalendar+ is translated into more than 30 languages, mostly by volunteers - please let us know if there is a bad translation somewhere or you want to add your language.

LOVE
‚ô• If you like aCalendar+, please show your support by leaving a good rating and recommending it to your friends ‚ô•

recentChanges:
Welcome to aCalendar+ 2.5!
If you have any questions or problems, please go to MENU - HELP (or visit https://acalendar.tapirapps.de)!
As indie app studio we rely on good ratings, especially as all our upgrades are one-time purchases.
Full changelog: https://acalendar.tapirapps.de/en/support/solutions/articles/36000251796
comments: Agree with Kendra, be nice to add a task from calendar. Reason for only 3 stars is that for some reason the task list defaults back to GMT (or close) even though I'm in a totally different time zone. The calendar copes fine with my system zone but the task list just won't accept my time zone so I'm having to "lie" about the future date to get it to match my calendar. I have since had contact with the developer and he has been super helpful and very quick to respond directly. Thanks Matthias!

This is a great app, but I wish tasks could be created from the calendar view, and that a location field was available in the task create/edit window. I also wish each task could have multiple notifications (alarm or email) scheduled at various intervals before the task time, like the optional notifications for events. Otherwise this app is fantastic & syncs all entered data among multiple devices, an improvement from the previous paid calendar & task app I was using.

Very good, lots of features, good performance. This calendar covers all the important calendaring functions that anyone would probably ever need, even a data repair function. As more features are added to it,though, the setting of these features are all over the place and that makes it unwieldy to use. In my opinion, I think the developer should address this "rabit hole" issue. Never the less, it's a worth while investment of your time.
THE best calendar I've ever found. I LOVE how customisable it is. You can make any entires or repeated entiries any colour you like. So organised!

Well worth the upgrade, this is the paid version of the non-plus app. While the other app is effectively a trial, this has all the real options like color configuration, multi-calendar default selection, etc.

recentChanges: Updated compatibility
comments: As of December 2020. This app does not work on my Android 10 phone. About a year ago, the app informed me that it could no longer record phone numbers associated with calls. Now, although a file is created. The file has no audio, when played through the app or otherwise. I paid for the Pro license and now feel completely ripped off. I am reporting this to Google play.

WAS my most helpful app on my old phone but not yet working on the new one. I never upgraded on the old phone so was getting phone numbers on all calls. I had a pro license.. still trying to transfer it. Re-installed. Still not working.

Hasn't worked on my phone for a long time... (I believe changes to Google API the stated reason). Was hoping this would be resolved with time... but no luck. So unfortunately I must rate poorly... ie app does not record calls.
Do not purchase like I did! App says the only way it works if it has full control of your microphone. This app does not work. Find someone smarter to figure out something so simple!

Used ACR prior to the permissions change, was great. Unfortunately still not working on Galaxy S9+ Android 10. All I hear is the faintest echo from speaker, and my own mic. Hopefully will become operable again in future; records are essential for legal purposes, much needed.

recentChanges:
Allow locking notes with passwords
Adding a 60% and 90% font size
Some stability and translation improvements
comments: Significant functionality has been removed; am going to look for a replacement. Specifically, cmds to import a folder & save all notes to files, still present in the NON-pro version, are missing from the pro version. I've uninstalled pro & reinstalled NON-pro. UPDATE: What do you mean "no longer be able to access the Storage"? Other similar apps can still access storage. Explain more clearly.

It has a dangerous feature: "Update the file itself as update the note" the other way is hazardous, does not checks if the file changed! (my file is on gdrive; even can not force reload note from file)

Good, however I recommend this improvement: When clicking to type in a long (scrollable) note, the keyboard comes up right to the bottom of the line where I click. It would be best if it gave some more padding.
This is an excellent notes app. I use it nearly every day. It havdles very long notes as well as short ones. It is a very valuable and useful app.
What about "Export All Notes" then? It is the only way to create backups, maybe is, was, the best feature of the app.

title: Password Manager SafeInCloud Pro
description:
SafeInCloud Password Manager allows you to keep your logins, passwords, and other private info safe and secure in an encrypted database. You can synchronize your data with another phone, tablet, Mac or PC via your own cloud account.

No subscriptions, no monthly fees! You purchase SafeInCloud once and use it on all your Android devices without any additional fees. You can share this app with up to 5 members of Google Play Family Library.

KEY FEATURES
‚óÜ Easy to Use
‚óÜ Material Design
‚óÜ Black Theme
‚óÜ Strong Encryption (256-bit Advanced Encryption Standard)
‚óÜ Cloud Synchronization (Google Drive, Dropbox, OneDrive, NAS, ownCloud, WebDAV)
‚óÜ Login with Fingerprint, Face, Retina
‚óÜ Autofill in Apps (Android 8+)
‚óÜ Browser Integration
‚óÜ Android Wear App
‚óÜ Password Strength Analysis
‚óÜ Password Generator
‚óÜ Free Desktop App (Windows, Mac)
‚óÜ Automatic Data Import
‚óÜ Cross-Platform

EASY TO USE
Try it yourself and enjoy an easy-to-use yet powerful user interface.

MATERIAL DESIGN
SafeInCloud was completely redesigned to match new Material Design user interface language by Google. In addition to the standard Light theme SafeInCloud also has a Dark theme option to help you saving a significant amount of battery life.

STRONG ENCRYPTION
Your data is always encrypted on a device and in a cloud with a strong 256-bit Advanced Encryption Standard (AES). This algorithm is used by the U.S. Government for protection of a top secret information. AES is also widely adopted worldwide and became the de facto encryption standard.

CLOUD SYNCHRONIZATION
Your database is automatically synchronized with your own cloud account (Google Drive, Dropbox, OneDrive, Yandex Disk, NAS, ownCloud, WebDAV). Thus you can easily restore your entire database from a cloud to a new phone or computer (in case of a loss or an upgrade). Your phone, tablet and computer are also automatically synchronized between each other via a cloud.

LOGIN WITH FINGERPRINT
You can instantly unlock SafeInCloud with a fingerprint on devices with a fingerprint sensor. This feature is available on all Samsung devices. Devices from other manufacturers should have Android 6.0 or higher.

AUTOFILL IN APPS (Android 8+)
You can autofill login and password fields into any app on your phone directly from SafeInCloud. You don't need to copy and paste them manually.

ANDROID WEAR APP
You can put some selected cards on your wrist to easily access them on the run. These could be your credit card PINs, door and locker codes.

PASSWORD STRENGTH ANALYSIS
SafeInCloud analyses your password strengths and shows a strength indicator next to each password. The strength indicator displays an estimated crack time for a password. All cards with weak passwords are marked with a red sign.

PASSWORD GENERATOR
The password generator helps you generating random and secure passwords. There is also an option to generate memorable, but still strong passwords.

FREE DESKTOP APP
Download a free Desktop application for Windows or Mac OS from www.safe-in-cloud.com to be able access your database on your computer. The Desktop application also makes data entry and editing fast and easy using a hardware keyboard.

AUTOMATIC DATA IMPORT
The Desktop application can automatically import your data from another password manager. You don't need to manually reenter all your passwords.

CROSS PLATFORM
SafeInCloud is available on the following platforms: Mac (OS X), iOS (iPhone and iPad), Windows, and Android.

recentChanges:
‚óÜ Sorting cards by name, date of creation, modification, size
‚óÜ Automatic backup (see Settings)

comments: I like this app. It would be even better if I could sort the cards by label. I'm unable to transfer my cards to the the desktop. The cloud storage for Win 10 isn't an option available on Android.

I have tried most of those popular password manager, this is the only one i keep using and recommend to friends and family member. It's less well known but not less in critical features, with cross platform compatibility, I use Windows and Android, I have more than ten 12 different devices and never have a problem with this little gem, exceptional stability. I especially appreciate the one off payment without being forced to a subscription. Highly recommended

I have been using this app for a long time and it gives me exactly what I need. Sync with different divices including computer and allows me to use the basics without needing to bother with extras that I don't use (however there are options available if I choose). Automatically organizes all my accounts alphabetically and I only need to memorize one password to access the app. Great Job!

UPDATED REVIEW: I wouldn't get this. It's way too finicky and unreliable. Sometimes it will pick up passwords other times it won't. I still have LastPass installed as a back up and A LOT of times LastPass will pick up the password but this app won't even prompt. It doesn't work of other browsers, and you NEED to manually input your password every 5 days, no option otherwise. Sigh. The search continues. Came over from Lastpass. Great replacement.

I have been using SafeInCloud for years, and love it!!! Every time a new and 'wonderful' password manager app comes out, I put it through its paces, and it ALWAYS comes up short. SafeInCloud is extremely feature-rich and very flexible, and you certainly can not beat the price!

title: Printoid for OctoPrint, the powerful OctoPrint app
description:
Learn more about Printoid PREMIUM on the official website: https://printoid.net/download-the-application/

Printoid is the smartest interface for Octoprint servers. Controlling your 3D printer has never be as simple as now! 

With the highest support of all the informations returned by OctoPrint, Printoid is reliable, stable and functional as possible with the latest versions of this amazing tool.

Printoid PREMIUM brings to your 3D printers a lot of incredible features, such as video streaming control, custom commands, support of multiple OctoPrint servers, and so much more!

‚ú¥ Smart and secured connection ‚ú¥
Printoid do all the best to simplify the connection with your OctoPrint server:
- Easy configuration panel
- The app chooses to use by itself the local or distant settings when needed
- Supports the SSL/TLS (HTTPS)
- Supports the basic authentication
- Retrieves automatically your printer configuration (heater bed, extruders)

üêæ All in one for the mobility üêæ
Printoid provides the best solution to control all your 3D printers:
- Add as much printer profiles as you want
- Easily switch between your printers
- Android Wear module to control your printers from your watch! (not available for Samsung wears)

üìÇ Smart file manager üìÇ
Printoid manipulates your precious files with care:
- Shows your GCODE and STL files from OctoPrint
- Download them, or upload a new file
- Start/pause/abort your prints
- Full support of the OctoPrint's slicer feature (slice and edit slicer profiles)
- Efficient 3D visualizer for your GCODE and STL files
- GCODE 2D layers visualizer

‚úÇ Full 3D printer control ‚úÇ
All you need is embedded in Printoid:
- Easy control of the axis, extruders, temperatures, ventilation...
- Support of up to 10 heater heads and heater bed
- Customizable presets for temperatures & fan speed
- Advanced settings to adjust the extrusion length, flowrate & feedrate
- Temperatures plotted in a graph in real-time
- Displays the current print informations in real time
- Full status of your current print in the Android's notifications

üìπ Video streaming üìπ
Printoid reassures you when you are not at home:
- Support up to 2 cameras simultaneously
- 3 different methods to show your video streaming
- Floating icon to show the video, no matter where you are on your device
- Widget for your apps launcher

üçÄ  Cool extra-features  üçÄ
What's a great application without its cool extra-features?
- Cults engine embedded
- Timelapse downloader & configurator
- Real time commands terminal
- Send custom GCODE commands to your printer
- Send custom SSH commands to your Raspberry PI
- PSU plugin control integration in the left menu
- TPLink plugin integration in the left menu
- Direct access to your OctoPrint's web interface from Printoid
- Job monitor widget: don't start the app to monitor your 3D printer!
- Screen locker for the best safety while printing
- Different themes available (let's try the Black Edition!)

üìß  The best support from the developer  üìß
Simply send a mail to the developer when you have some troubles, or suggestions!

‚ö† Important disclamer ‚ö†
Printoid is not affilated to Octoprint. It's an application developed independently.
For any questions or help, please contact the developer of Printoid.

comments: Without question, the best partner app for your 3d printing set-up. I had tried several others, and decided to try this. Within hours, I upgraded to premium - and I feel it's 100% worth it. Kudos to the developers. Great UI, easy to use , and good support documentation if you get stuck. Can't recommend Printoid enough!

An absolute bargain. This app is far and away the best OctoPrint interface app on the market. Even without any real competition this developer continues to improve the app constantly. I got out of printing for awhile, and when I came back I couldn't believe how many improvements had been made in such a short window. This developer truly cares about the app and it's usability in a way I haven't seen before.

I've used this frequently for a couple years now, and it's the best I've found after trying several options. I'd like to make a few suggestions to the developer to make Printoid even better. 1. For the "Automatically lock the screen" option, let me choose the type of lock that happens. I'd like to only automatically lock critical features, because I still want to be able to zoom in on the webcam stream without unlocking. 2. Edit/Delete buttons are hard to press on the Custom Commands edit screen. Simply make them bigger, or a long-press to edit. 3. Ability to specific automatic refresh time for camera widget, and better resizing of widget if possible

Updated my review, I'll verify if octoeverywhere is a 14 day trial everywhere. Printoid is great for what it does, but there is two other apps that does pretty much the same without having to purchase them. for stability and features, its clearly 5 stars. where it loses a star is because octoeverywhere is 3$ usd per month when it could have been developped in-app since we already have to pay for it. Also please fix when octoeverywhere trial ends, it doesn't deactivate itself and still tries to connect by that way and fails continuously even though i'm in wifi.

I paid for the premium version of this app, but after an update my remote access no longer connects to my printer. Will ONLY work over wifi. Nothing changed in my router, all the forwarding and port options are just as they were before the update.

title: StardewGuide - Tools For Stardew Valley
description:
Features
    ¬∑ Villager Locator to locate every NPC in the map.
    ¬∑ Calendar and Crop Planner: create a task list and plan your crops.
    ¬∑ See festivals and birthdays with the calendar.
    ¬∑ Keep track of the Community Center bundles.
    ¬∑ Listen to the full soundtrack of Stardew Valley.
    ¬∑ Get info about the villagers (Loved gifts, birthday...)
    ¬∑ Get information about the crops, fish and animals.
    ¬∑ Learn where you can find all the artifacts and keep track of the completed ones.

There are lots of more features coming soon.

summary: A collection of tools and information for Stardew Valley.
recentChanges:
- Added a new "Shops & Houses" page
- Added information about every shop and house in the town
- Optimized the start page
comments: Despite needing an update, this guide us still well worth the money. The app is easy to use, great for when you're playing and doesn't have any ads at all - it does need a little bit more work, some (fairly minor) things are missing but over time this could become a problem :)
Just bought this and don't see any updates for the 1.5 patch. Will there be one soon for this? There's a lot of items missing. It's well made otherwise but needs to be updated to the 1.5 version.

Lots of information on most things. I love the calendar aspect that lets you know when certain things are happening, which if you are playing for the first time would not know where or even if they existed. I would give a full 5 stars if I had access to what items the villagers, not only loved/best gifts, but if I knew what they liked/neutral/disliked/hated, if I can't give them the best gift. I've seen this aspect in some other free apps and it's really the only thing I'm missing from this one.
Great app but needs the 1.5 update to be valid. Keep up the good work!

This is exactly what I needed! It covers all the basic stuff like community bundles and gifting. But most importantly it lets you set date, time, whether the community center is done, and the weather to to help you find the NPC of your choice. No more scanning the wiki because you forgot Sebastian's birthday and for once he's not in his room.

comments: Fantastic tool. Well organized and impressive UI. The calculator icon needs work as the app is far more impressive than the thumbnail would lead you to believe. You could put a Haas logo in the corner of the calc and I'd buy that they spent a bunch of money programming this app; it's that professional. Next step is inputing tooling catalog charts to find the chip load of specific brand tools. Or at least direct hyper links to the website with the information.
Best app for machinist conventional or CNC. The price is fantastic. Spend more on a graphic calculator constructing your own formulas, take you a year
Very informative..a great tool to utilize in the field especially to aquire a base starting point for operations. Lots of very helpful info.

Needs a exiting app button but other than that great job just dont give up on it keep building the app needs a joe block calculator put in other than that you can't beat perfection üëå Great job.LOVE IT !!!

For new Machinist, some of the abbreviations are unknown. Not the fault be maybe a glossary of abbreviations would be nice. I am new to CNC Machining and some are confusing. My instructor say your app is very good. It will take time and experience to know how to use this. Not the fault of the developer, it my inexperience.

title: Cryptomator
description:
With Cryptomator, the key to your data is in your hands. Cryptomator encrypts your data quickly and easily. Afterwards you upload them protected to your favorite cloud service.

EASY-TO-USE

Cryptomator is a simple tool for digital self-defense. It allows you to protect your cloud data by yourself and independently.

‚Ä¢ Simply create a vault and assign a password
‚Ä¢ No additional account or configuration needed
‚Ä¢ Unlock vaults with your fingerprint*

* from Android 6.0 and smartphones with fingerprint sensor

COMPATIBLE

Cryptomator is compatible with the most commonly used cloud storages and available for all major operating systems.

‚Ä¢ Compatible with Dropbox, Google Drive, OneDrive, and WebDAV-based cloud storage services
‚Ä¢ Create vaults in Android‚Äôs local storage (e.g., works with third-party sync apps)
‚Ä¢ Access your vaults on all your mobile devices and computers

SECURE

You don't have to trust Cryptomator blindly, because it is open source software. For you as a user, this means that everyone can see the code.

‚Ä¢ File content and filename encryption with AES and 256 bit key length
‚Ä¢ Vault password is secured with scrypt for enhanced brute-force resistance
‚Ä¢ Vaults are automatically locked after sending app to background
‚Ä¢ Crypto implementation is publicly documented

AWARD-WINNING

Cryptomator received the CeBIT Innovation Award 2016 for Usable Security and Privacy. We're proud to provide security and privacy for hundreds of thousands of Cryptomator users.

CRYPTOMATOR COMMUNITY

Join the Cryptomator Community and participate in the conversations with other Cryptomator users.

‚Ä¢ Follow us on Twitter @Cryptomator
‚Ä¢ Like us on Facebook /Cryptomator

recentChanges:
- Added support for S3 compatible storage
- Enhanced password policy so that vaults with very bad passwords can no longer be created
- Fixed problem in file search when globbing is enabled, live search is disabled and pattern contains uppercase characters
comments: A very nice implementation of cryptomator - it makes me much more inclined to use google drive. Being able to use it on a USB stick is also excellent - I have a backup of all my documents on a stick and can access it on my backup computer or on my tablet, something I haven't been able to do with any other encryption software. (I also really really like the one-time payment rather than the subscription model !)

Well done! They included auto video uploads! Better than the commercial alternative and at a lower price (instead of annual subscription they charge for their phone apps, and it is 1 time payment - fair enough.) I also vote for features: 1. Thumbnails. 2. To have the option to choose if the original file in the phone gets deleted after being uploaded, just to save space on the phone (including the auto photo/video upload.) 3. Login to multiple accounts of same provider e.g. 2 Onedrive accounts.

Essential app for anyone what uses cloud storage and wants to keep ownership of their personal files. Really nice companion to the desktop app, and compared to VeraCrypt, Cryptomator is more geared to cloud storage, and individual files keep their directory structure (instead of just becoming a single 10GB container)

Stinks but I knew it would so no biggie. Doesn't offer grid view & doesn't do picture thumbnails (even after viewing the picture). Doesn't support Android's Storage Access Framework (SAF) so you can't open documents from apps like Office without downloading them (making editing and then uploading them manual). Boxcryptor is better in these respects but it uses a subscription model that requires an account so Cryptomator has the advantage there. Hoping it gets better, still $upportive of it!

Please add support to attach more than one Google Drive or other cloud providers drive linking system at the same time. Why to always log out from one and log in the other ? Make avail Folder upload feature also. Purchased the software to support Open Source Development. Thanks.

title: LectureNotes
description:
LectureNotes is an Android app for note-taking by handwriting on the screen, in particular with a stylus.

It has been designed while having a user at university (or at school) in mind, for instance a lecturer who is using it for preparing her/his lecture or even for actual teaching (by writing on the device and projecting the screen content for the audience) or a student who is using it for taking handwritten notes during a lecture. However, it has found many users outside university, for instance businesspersons who use it for business notes and sales presentations or artists who use it to create sketches and drawings.

Its major target devices are tablets with Android 3.0 or later. The basic functionality works on all devices with Android 3.0 or later, but some which are hardware-dependent such as pressure sensitivity might not.

NOTE: There is a free trial version to test if the app is right for you. The free trial version is fully functional with the exception that the number of notebooks is constrained to two, with no more than eight pages per notebook.

Reviews:
* https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=K32hUvoo7mI

User feedback:
We would love to hear from you, please send feedback and feature requests to us by email. If you encounter a problem with the app, please email us and we will do our very best to fix it quickly.

Major features:
* requires only minimal permissions and no internet connection (we do respect your privacy!)
* allows multiple pages to be simultaneously visible on the screen (i.e. continuous page view)
* allows smooth writing, typing, scrolling, and zooming

Additional features:
* multiple layers in notebook pages
* image import and image set import into notebook (including image import directly from camera)
* single- and multi-page PDF import (requires PDFView to be installed)
* notebook export as compressed PDF
* notebook export to Evernote (requires Evernote app to be installed)
* notebook export to OneNote (requires OneNote app to be installed)
* audio recording and replay (requires LectureRecordings to be installed)
* video recording and replay (requires LectureVideos to be installed)
* presentations (requires LecturePresentations to be installed)
* sharing and import of notebook pages
* keyword attachment to notebook pages and automatic indexing
* insertion, deletion, and rearrangement of notebook pages
* sharing and import of notebooks
* organization of notebooks in folders
* backup and restore of notebooks board

See the help page https://www.acadoid.com/apps/ln/help/ for more details.

Possible issue: For certain functionality, the app requires other apps to be installed: Notebook and folder import, notebooks board restore, and image set import require a file manager app to be installed; image import directly from camera requires a camera app to be installed; PDF import requires a file manager app and PDFView to be installed; export to Evernote requires the Evernote app to be installed; export to OneNote requires the OneNote app to be installed.

recentChanges:
* several minor improvements
* quick index added
* distortion of cut, copied, and imported material added
* grid cut, copy, and paste added

comments: I've been using this app now for years on various Samsung devices - note phones & tablets and I just love it! It is by far the best note taking app out there. Plus - the developer is always so quick to respond to questions.

Excellent handwriting app. A tried many but didn't find better. As a college teacher for online courses, I've been using it for 2 years. I have a couple of improvements suggestions that I may send by email. Just let me know whether you do accept suggestions from users.

In my opinion this is the best local app for writing&teaching Math and Physics. This is my favourite kind of digital paper. After system update to Android 11 there was an issue of storage permission. Lecture Notes support replied promptly and my problem was solved. Thank you, Marcus!
Almost. If I could get the input box to reach the end of the page it would be immaculate, but it stops and makes a new line about 3/4 the way through the page no matter what setting I change.:(
Not the easiest app to understand at first but once I got used to it, it became the best handwriting app I have ever used on both Android and iOS. The customisation is incredible.

title: Web Alert Expansion Pack
description:
This app adds new features to Web Alert.
Web Alert can monitor your web pages for changes and notify you when a change was detected (e.g. when the price of a product in an online store has dropped).

‚úî Set any custom frequency for checks (e.g. every 5 seconds)
‚úî Parallel checks
‚úî Filter text, e.g. only watch changes in the text between word ‚Ä¶ and word ‚Ä¶
‚úî Monitor a number for changes (e.g. the price of a product)
‚úî Define a time range without checks or without notifications
‚úî Change notifications only when a certain keyword is present (or absent)
‚úî Access websites with SSL certificate problems
‚úî Limit alerts to a minimum change percentage
‚úî Duplicate alerts
‚úî Modify the URL of an alert
‚úî Restore alerts deleted by accident
‚úî Can notify when a website is down or offline
‚úî Export website versions as a zip archive
‚úî Export / Import your alerts
‚úî View changes already in the notification
‚úî Allows to view only the changes and not the unchanged parts

Suitable especially for professionals in web development or automation:
‚úî Filter content with regular expressions (RegEx)
‚úî Use CSS and jQuery selectors
‚úî Watch in HTML source code for changes
‚úî Plug-in to integrate with Tasker, Automate and Automagic

With the extensive Tasker plugin many parts of the app become programmable even without knowledge of a programming language.

You still need to have the free Web Alert app installed.

Enjoy these new features! :-)

recentChanges: Please send any feedback to support@webalert.me
comments: This has been a FANTASTIC app! Such a wide range of practical uses that webalert can be applied to. For my purposes it solves an issue that I'd been trying to find a solution to for years: providing a detailed alert when my products are sold on a range of platforms. Love it, use it everyday and highly recommend. UPDATE: Almost a year in and still absolutely love this app. So helpful and starting to realize that I've only scratched the surface. UPDATE 2: Still LOVE it!

Simultaneous checks isn't the best way to check more than one site any any given moment. It has a tendeny to group up the checks, so if you have 5 simultaneous checks selected, and 8 checks in total, it will do the first 5 then the remaining 3, then 5 again. but if the 3 checks take longer than 1 minute to complete, the 5 have to wait until the 3 are done. What should happen, is that as soon as 1 minute has passed, and there is less than 5 checks taking place, another check should be started.

The app is cool, but please add the notifications for the "target not found" event as well - I presume this is the only way to track items for being back in stock. Right now I can see the notifications in my status bar, but there is no sound.

Great, tho a big drawback is the inability to exclude repetitive alerting based on new changes that are immaterial (ie., lack any newly-appearing triggers) simply because a trigger that I was already notified of is still there
Works pretty well but for some reason it decides my WiFi network is a mobile one so schedules based on the mobile setting. This seems to be when connected to a VPN.

title: Pomodoro Timer Pro
description:
Pomodoro Timer is a great tool that can help you boost your productivity and quality of your work. The Pomodoro Technique¬Æ was found in the 80's and it continues to be one of the most popular time management techniques being used today.

And it's really simple:
1.) Create a list of things to accomplish
2.) Pick one task to work on
3.) Pomodoro will start 25 minute timer
4.) Work on your task until timer runs out
5.) Take a short 3-5 minute break, relax your body and mind
6.) Every 4 Pomodoros take a longer break (10-30 minutes)

One Pomodoro‚Ñ¢ lasts only 25 minutes and you should avoid all interruptions during it. Yes, your mails, phone calls and all the other things can wait few more minutes. Taking frequent breaks allow the brain to keep fresh and stay focused. This makes the Pomodoro Technique¬Æ a simple and effective method of finishing a task as quickly as possible.

The Pomodoro Timer Pro is the ultimate weapon in your battle with time. You can add multiple tasks, their estimates, see the history and much more. You can always clearly see how much time you have left. The style of this app was inspired by the original pomodoro "kitchen" timer.

Pomodoro‚Ñ¢ and Pomodoro Technique¬Æ are registered trademarks of Francesco Cirillo. This app is not affiliated with Francesco Cirillo.

This app can be also used for TimeBoxing techniques or as a Productivity Timer.

If you have any ideas and comments that can help improve this app, feel free to email me.

recentChanges: Good news. We've made a couple of improvements and fixed several problems. Stay productive and have a great day!
comments: Good for your time saving trick. One can concentrate and focus on one activity by using this. Prioritize the work in a better way. Procrastination would be avoided and sometimes mindabsentness. But all will work only when you determine and discipline in using it. Make it your daily routine and amazing results can be felt.

It's not working properly if I start a pomodoro then put my phone away and continue doing my work then it stops automatically and it is totally ridiculous. It shows that it's running if I start it again but later it stops automatically and many a time it doesn't ring at all even if all the settings are perfect. I am not here to report rather I need a solution to this please do make necessary updates if that helps and don't waste our valuable times.
I love this app. It help me get stuff done! Works perfectly. Love that I can adjust the work and rest times. Wish we could customize the work and rest times even more! Just add our own custom times.
Great app for productivity. I strongly recommend all users to give a try. It will really help you maximize your output and increase work efficiency as well.

This application really looks very nice, easy to use, makes me concentrate and demonstrates my family that I'm vert busy at the moment. It is the pomodoro technique itself, with very small amount of improvements. However, after I played with the settings, pomodoro started to stop after 15 minutes and I was not able to bring it back in a usual way. Finally, I had to clean the app's local cache to make it work and I lost all the tasks list. Sorry to write all this. I think the app would be better if I were able to change settings without any fear to lose everything. Two stars because the time bug in the timer app is a show-stopper. Update: even after reset cache reset, pomodoro suggests to take a cake after 15 minutes. Awful.

comments: I thought this was a lifetime purchase but I am now prompted to buy the pro version from a banner ad at the top of the widget. I tried uninstalling and reinstalling both the app and key applications and rebooting but it still persists. What gives?
Good app, it would be convenient if there is the possibility to set the font size of the event name and the date separately.

I thought this was a lifetime purchase. I didn't buy a new phone all of a sudden it's telling me I need to purchase again. I love the app but if you are advertising as a lifetime purchase then that's what I'm expecting to receive. This is why I'm giving it 3 stars. Fix that and it would be worthy of 5.
Love this app but everytime I get a new phone it makes me purchase again. That is why I can not give 5 stars.

Time to search for another app! I am now receiving a calendar note each day to purchase the app when in fact I did !!! I am so tired of play store allowing this behaviour by devs !!! Emailed Dev and no response snh

title: eDrawings
description:
eDrawings Pro with in-app purchase.

eDrawings¬Æ is the only CAD viewer on Android phones and tablets that allows you to view native eDrawings files as well as native SolidWorks¬Æ parts, assemblies and drawings files. 

eDrawings is the email-enabled communication tool that dramatically eases sharing of product design information. You can load and send files via email to collaborate more effectively with everyone involved in product development, including people who are not regular CAD software users to interpret and understand 2D and 3D designs.

Multi-touch gestures let you pan, zoom, and rotate models easily. eDrawings also supports drawing sheets, and exploded views for eDrawings files published from SolidWorks¬Æ.

Features:
* Intuitive and easy-to-use user interface
* Open 3D (EASM, EPRT, SLDASM, SLDPRT, IGES, IGS, JT, STEP, STP, IFC), 2D (EDRW, SLDDRW, DWG, DXF) and associated files from any source: email attachments, cloud storage services (Dropbox‚Ñ¢, SkyDrive¬Æ, Google Drive, Hightail¬Æ, and others), web and FTP sites and network folders.
* Zoom, pan and rotate your 2D or 3D CAD data using multi-touch
* Animate 3D standard views
* Browse your 2D drawing sheets
* View your designs in full screen and double tap to fit it on screen
* Sample files included

Upgrade to eDrawings Pro using In-app purchase and enable new capabilities :
* Measure your designs (distance, angles, lengths, point to point and more)
* Dynamically view cross sections of your models in XY, YZ, or ZX directions from both sides and easily drag the cross section plane
* Create markups in your designs, including text notes and freehand notations
* Share marked up eDrawings files with others for review and further comments. All markups with history are saved within the eDrawings file. 
Thanks for using eDrawings! Don't forget to review the app. Your feedback is important to us! Please reach out to support@edrawingsviewer.com with any suggestions.

Known Issue with Augmented Reality:
Some devices clipped the Get Marker buttons and made them unavailable, you can now access them from the settings button in the top right corner when in AR mode


For more information, visit http://www.solidworks.com or http://www.edrawingsviewer.com

I just paid for a trial period today. App hasn' t open any SLDPRT for me yet. If issue persist fir 48 hours I will want a refund. I wish it works. Samples look good. This APP is simply not opening any files in SLDPRT. Refund me
It's just a tool to look at stuff that's already made. Measuring comes at a premium. Some files won't open. I expected more.
Use lesss.... don't download....stupid making fool.... after download you need to pay money for use-mesurement and section view churiya

title: Genius Scan+ - PDF Scanner
description:
Quickly scan your paper documents on the go and export them as multi-page PDF files.

*** 20+ million users *** 1000s of small businesses ***

Place any document in front of your device‚Äôs camera: our scanner app automatically recognizes the paper against the background, crops it, and cleans up the result. You obtain a crisp, legible scan. Batch scanning lets you scan dozens of pages in a matter of seconds. Powerful tools help you organize, share, or archive your documents.

== KEY FEATURES == 

Smart Scanning:

- Document detection & background removal
- Distortion correction
- Shadow removal and defect cleanup
- Filters (black & white, whiteboard, photo)
- Batch scanning

PDF Creation & Editing:

- Document merging & splitting
- Multiple page PDF creation
- Photos and PDF import

Security & Privacy:

- On-device document processing
+ Biometric unlock
+ PDF password encryption

Document Organization:

- Document tagging
- Metadata and content search
+ Custom naming schemes (Smart Document Names)
+ Backup and multi-device sync with Genius Cloud (separate subscription)

Export:

- Email
+ Box, Dropbox, Evernote, Expensify, Google Drive, OneDrive, FTP, WebDAV.
+ Any WebDAV compatible service such as Citrix ShareFile, NextCloud, ownCloud, Synology, Yandex. 
+ Automatic background auto-export

OCR (Text Recognition):

+ Text extraction
+ Searchable PDF creation
+ Business card scanning & contact creation

The features denoted with [+] are available as part of Genius Scan+ (a one-time purchase).

== ABOUT US ==

It‚Äôs in the heart of Paris, France that The Grizzly Labs develops Genius Scan. We take pride in crafting apps that help millions of users throughout the world and hold ourselves to the highest standards in terms of quality and privacy. Get in touch with us @thegrizzlylabs if you have any questions.

Quickly scan your paper documents on the go and export them as multi-page PDF files.

*** 20+ million users *** 1000s of small businesses ***

Place any document in front of your device‚Äôs camera: our scanner app automatically recognizes the paper against the background, crops it, and cleans up the result. You obtain a crisp, legible scan. Batch scanning lets you scan dozens of pages in a matter of seconds. Powerful tools help you organize, share, or archive your documents.

== KEY FEATURES ==

Smart Scanning:

- Document detection & background removal
- Distortion correction
- Shadow removal and defect cleanup
- Filters (black & white, whiteboard, photo)
- Batch scanning

PDF Creation & Editing:

- Document merging & splitting
- Multiple page PDF creation
- Photos and PDF import

Security & Privacy:

- On-device document processing
+ Biometric unlock
+ PDF password encryption

Document Organization:

- Document tagging
- Metadata and content search
+ Custom naming schemes (Smart Document Names)
+ Backup and multi-device sync with Genius Cloud (separate subscription)

Export:

- Email
+ Box, Dropbox, Evernote, Expensify, Google Drive, OneDrive, FTP, WebDAV.
+ Any WebDAV compatible service such as Citrix ShareFile, NextCloud, ownCloud, Synology, Yandex.
+ Automatic background auto-export

OCR (Text Recognition):

+ Text extraction
+ Searchable PDF creation
+ Business card scanning & contact creation

The features denoted with [+] are available as part of Genius Scan+ (a one-time purchase).

== ABOUT US ==

It‚Äôs in the heart of Paris, France that The Grizzly Labs develops Genius Scan. We take pride in crafting apps that help millions of users throughout the world and hold ourselves to the highest standards in terms of quality and privacy. Get in touch with us @thegrizzlylabs if you have any questions.
summary: Genius Scan is a scanner app in your pocket.

title: DAVx‚Åµ ‚Äì Contacts, Calendar and Tasks Sync client
description:
If you're encountering problems please contact us: support@davx5.com or have a look at our forums: https://www.davx5.com/forums/ instead of down-voting the app so that we can provide support.

DAVx‚Åµ is the only all-in-one synchronization solution for your contacts (CardDAV), calendars (CalDAV) and your tasks (based on VTODO). The app is easy to set up and integrates perfectly with your favorite calendar/contacts app (including default apps). It can also be used seperately, if you either have CalDAV, CardDAV or only Tasks.

Compatible with almost every CalDAV/CardDAV servers and services, including Nextcloud, iCloud and Synology!

After installing, you can add a DAVx‚Åµ account from within the app. See https://www.davx5.com/tested-with/ for help. For more information, please see the manual: https://www.davx5.com/manual/, the FAQ: https://www.davx5.com/faq/ and our forums: https://www.davx5.com/forums/

Key features:

‚äõ Sync your DAV calendars (CalDAV) and address-books (CardDAV) and Tasks (VTODO via CalDAV) in a single app
‚äõ Two-way synchronization (server ‚Üî client)
‚äõ Flawless integration with your device and favorite apps
‚äõ Easy setup (resource auto-detection, support for self-signed certificates, authentication by client certificates)
‚äõ Fast algorithms for high performance (CTag/ETag, limit sync time range for past events, multi-threaded sync)
‚äõ Optimized for phones and tablets. Backward compatibility for old Android versions.
‚äõ Management options within the app (Create and Delete new calendars,  address books and to-do lists*)
‚äõ Super-secure and we respect your privacy! 
‚äõ Absolutely no ads and no tracking.
‚äõ GDPR compliant.
‚äõ DAVx‚Åµ is completely open source

* depends on server implementation / may be not supported by all servers

Important compatibility notes

Attention: DAVx‚Åµ must not be moved to the SD card! This will cause strange behaviour, including account and data loss.

Get the best out of this app ‚Ä¶

‚äõ ‚Ä¶ when using with your own DAV server (Radicale, DAViCal, SabreDAV, Baikal, ‚Ä¶) and HTTPS ‚Äì so you own and control all your data while having the comfort of synchronization between various devices. Or use a hosted DAV service you trust or the one of your company.
‚äõ ‚Ä¶ and combine it with Evolution / Thunderbird / etc. on your computer

title: Ultimate Car Audio App
description:
The Ultimate Car Audio App is designed to bring you the most accurate tools, calculators and information, right to your phone. It is currently the number 1 car audio tool, car audio calculator and box building app on both iOS and Android app stores! This app is designed to do the following:

Single/Double Subwoofer voice coil wiring.
Subwoofer Cone area.
Amplifier power suggestions.
Car electrical system suggestions.
Subwoofer box calculators
Kerf Calculator
Ohms Law calculator
Tone generator
Sweep generator
Probably more, I'm bad at documenting

Ideas? Email: thomas@xplicitcoding.com

comments: The wire size calculator said "Holy wire size Batman". That was it's calculation for me. 12v, 900 watts, single 8ft run of CCA and the wire size I need is "Holy wire size Batman". ü§∑‚Äç‚ôÇÔ∏è So then I went to the debug mode to send a screenshot of my issue (like it said to do) and the screen was unresponsive. I clicked on email 5 or 6 times. Then I just waited. Nothing. I clicked email some more. Then waited some more. Still nothing. It needs work but feels abandoned.

Great App! I use it all the time. Helpful when calculating simple things like ohm loads, built in frequency generator including sweeps, and wiring diagrams. Definitely worth the small price that is being asked. I highly recommend for anyone into audio. Once you see and start utilizing the features it will be your go to for alot of stuff.

Great update! This is the most accurate enclosure calculator you will find! The changes to single vs multiple subs(and how cutouts affect volume with multiple subs - thanks Thomasüëç), correct port volume, this is so worth it. Plus the new Cone Area Calculator is cool, the Electrical Calculators have been useful, now there's Tone Generators/Sweeps. Just get this app!

Love this app. It is very useful in calculating enclosure volume and is pretty accurate too. Deducted one star coz it doesn't have a way to save the file when you design the box like torres does. Me as a regular enclosure builder always need to save the designs for future use. Please add an option to save the enclosure design with custom naming option.

The only thing this APP can't and won't do? Make me a sandwich. Otherwise this is everything you could ever need for car audio! No more going to facebook to ask the EXPERTS. You are the expert now. Need to tune a box? Got it. Need to tune your amp? Got it Need to add a battery but unsure the size? Got it Wire in 62 new speakers? Got it! Need s new alternator? Shoot you can run more car audio now! Got it, because this app is designed to help you with every question you could have.

title: SimpleMind Pro - Intuitive Mind Mapping
description:
Mind mapping helps you organize your thoughts, remember information and generate new ideas. We've created a beautiful, intuitive app, so you can mind map wherever you are and whenever you want.

SimpleMind Pro is designed to synchronize your Mind Map across platforms. For example (as a separate purchase) for Windows and Mac - https://simplemind.eu/download/full-edition/

Highlights
‚Ä¢ Easy to use.
‚Ä¢ Continuously fine-tuned based on customer feedback.
‚Ä¢ Trustworthy and reliable: 10+ years of updates and improvements.
‚Ä¢ Used in a wide range of applications: business, education, legal and medical.
‚Ä¢ Unique free-form layout or various auto layouts.
‚Ä¢ Seamless synchronization using clouds.
‚Ä¢ Add media and documents.
‚Ä¢ Share Mind Maps.
‚Ä¢ Change and customize the style of the Mind Map.
‚Ä¢ Tools to help you maintain overview.

Create
‚óã place topics anywhere you want in the free-form layout
‚óã or use auto layout - great for brainstorming
‚óã reorganize and restructure using drag, rotate, re-arrange or reconnect
‚óã use checkboxes, progress bars, auto-numbering
‚óã connect any two topics with a crosslink
‚óã label relations
‚óã virtually unlimited page size and number of elements
‚óã supports multiple Mind Maps on one page

Add media and documents
‚óã images and photos
‚óã notes
‚óã icons (stock, emojis or custom)
‚óã link to a topic, mind map, contact, file or webpage
‚óã voice memos
‚óã videos

Seamless synchronization using Dropbox, Google Drive and OneDrive
‚óã sync mind maps with your Android devices
‚óã sync mind maps across platforms. For example with Windows or Mac - as a separate purchase

Share your Mind Map
‚óã for example as PDF or Image
‚óã outline, can be imported in word processors
‚óã create a slideshow to present your Mind Map (Tablet only)
‚óã print
‚óã export to a calendar app

Style your mind map
‚óã change the appearance by selecting one of the 15+ style sheets
‚óã create your own style sheets
‚óã style every detail, exactly how you want it
‚óã change borders, lines, colors, background color, the checkbox color, and much more

Maintain overview
‚óã collapse and expand branches
‚óã hide or show branches or topics
‚óã block out distractions with autofocus
‚óã highlight branches by displaying branch borders
‚óã visually group topics with group borders
‚óã organize your Mind Maps in folders
‚óã outline view
‚óã search

SimpleMind for Android is optimized for phones and tablets.

title: HAMRS Logger
description:
HAMRS is a simple amateur radio logger, with templates tailored to portable activities like Parks on the Air, Field Day, and more. 

You can tab quickly through fields as you make contacts, see operator QTH information with an internet connection, and export your ADI file easily.
descriptionHTML:
HAMRS is a simple amateur radio logger, with templates tailored to portable activities like Parks on the Air, Field Day, and more.

You can tab quickly through fields as you make contacts, see operator QTH information with an internet connection, and export your ADI file easily.
summary: A simple, portable logger.
recentChanges:
## 0.11.3
**BUGS FIXED**
* Convert commas to decimals in frequency for internationalization
* Logged spots were not taking into account park reference
comments: HamRS (Ham Really Simple) so far has gotten all 5 star reviews. I am confident it will stay that way for subsequent reviews. It is that good! HamRS is a really simple logging program for amateur radio operators. It does what it needs to do with a nice clean easy to figure out and operate interface. It doesn‚Äôt need bells and whistles and other gimmicks as it does its primary job effectively. When you start up a new logbook you have 5 templates to choose from: generic, Parks on the air (POTA), Summits on the air (SOTA) and templates for field day & winter field day. These templates are set up to have boxes for ‚Äúpark to parks‚Äù when doing POTA etc. and it will populate the correct fields in the ADI file for upload. One feature you will grow to appreciate is that you don‚Äôt need an internet connection to use HamRS. But, if you do have a working connection once you type a call sign it will have a pop up ‚ÄúKC1OCA, Michael in Massachusetts‚Äù etc. And it will also report when you have been spotted on the POTA website! This makes it a lot easier to insure you have the correct call sign for your log. When you are ready HamRS allows you to export the ADI, create a duplicate of the log which is useful when you are in a park within a park etc. It also has a really neat (and Really Simple) map to display your QSLs as you make them! 73 ‚Äì KC1OCA

Perfect for logging portable contacts. The one major con to this app is that the data is not cloud-based. Would REALLY love to be able to have this integrated to Drive or something similar to be able to access logs from multiple devices. This would hands-down be the best and easiest, most intuitive logging software if there was a way to share data across different devices.

Must Read!!! First while entering in the callsign field It kept deleting or doubling up my input. Total mess / no way... I found that you have to disable "predictive text" in my tablet settings and that helped. I'm still having a problem with the callsigns disappearing randomly (I am not direct logging I'm copying from my paper logs from the weekend). Doesn't happen every time, it's a random surprise. Running on my two year old Samsung Tablet with no know hardware issues, works fine with every other app I have. Honestly I want this thing to work but there are some bug fixes in order... Maybe it's device specific but I'd expect it to work without hassle, hoping this input helps them get it dialed in. UPDATE: Great, the program crashes too... Made it to 143 contacts, getting progressively worse as it went on and then puked. Fortunately it autosaved. Also if I click on "QSO Map" that crashes the app too. Honestly guys I am not impressed at all.
Great logging app, I searched and used free ones. This one is on point and has different options you can select for use. And even has a forum to submit features you'd like.
Great simple, quick entry logging software I use for POTA, FD. Thank you Jarred et al de WB8BHK

comments: I bought this app years ago ( march 5, 2014) and I've loved it ever since. Something went screwy with my settings though where I was getting ads so I decided to purchase it again (sometimes when you do this on other apps, it will tell you that you've already purchased the app (if you actually did) and then it unlocks the premium features) this time around though I ended up getting charged I'm not sure why but not that big of a deal it's been my go-to calendar app since forever.

This is an amazing app! Although, there are some features I would like to see. (Such as a tab/onion skin function so I could see some events separately if needed.) That being said, the upgrade is ‚ú®worth every penny‚ú®

This is an excellent calendar. I love it. It is a great app, with all the practical and visually neat features it has.
The best calendar app I have tried. Consistently good functionality, and responsive developers make this an excellent choice.
