comments: I supported this app from the beginning and loved it. Now you took away features and try to milk me for money to get the features back? I think not. Shame on you for not respecting your initial license agreement. Shame on me for giving you money for it. Will recommend people uninstall it. There are much better apps for better price out there.

I had paid for the licenced version but now I can only download the free one. When I contacted their support, they referred me to Playstore, and I still got nowhere. I used to love this app and always recommended it to friends and acquaintances but not anymore, now it is a bitter disappointment.

CS is one of the best application that I have encountered. I am very critical and I assure you it deserves a 5 evaluation but posted 4 because I believe 5 is the ultimate perfection. I researched the scanner platform, if you try it, you will notice that I am right. I do not have any link with the company.

Even after I had bought this application time ago, now I have to install a second app just for scanning and they try to advertise me the premium feature with a big pop and a difficult to hide X to close it. I thought I bought it with NO ADS.

Ok...a lot of folks are complaining about license not being same as premium...I can understand that grief...however, I paid for the license in 2014 specifically because I wanted no ads and wanted the pdf watermark removed. For me, so far, so good. Hope there will be no nasty surprises along the way...I am not interested in premium, license is good enough for my needs, for now...

title: FE File Explorer Pro - File Manager
description:
FE File Explorer Pro is a powerful file manager app on Android and iOS. It can access not only local files, but also files on your computer, NAS and cloud storages. Transfer files from any location to any location. Stream movies and music to your Android phones and tablets. Directly view and manage documents, photos and files without downloading.

Features:
* Access network shares on macOS, Windows, Linux, NAS via SMB/CIFS protocol.
* Access WebDAV Server, FTP Server and SFTP Server.
* Access cloud storages: OwnCloud, Google Drive, Dropbox, OneDrive and OneDrive for Business.
* Access files on Android internal storage, SD Card and USB OTG.

* Automatically discover computers, NAS when you setup new connections.
* Support Windows Domain, Active Directory and DFS. 
* Copy, move, rename and delete your files right on Android. 
* View documents, browse images, play movies and musics.
* Edit-in-Place: Edit documents located on remote storage in another app. FE File Explorer will save it back to remote storage automatically.
* Archive and unarchive ZIP, RAR, and 7zip files.
* Search files by file name. 
* Stream movies and musics from remote storages to Android. 
* Transfer files between storages.
* Sync files between remote storage and Android device.
* Backup camera photos to remote storage.
* Nearby file transfer: transfer files between Android and iOS devices.

===== CONTACT US =====
Email: support@skyjos.com
Twitter: @SkyjosApps
Facebook: @FEFileExplorer

comments: Galaxy Tab S4 user. This is an amazing app. I needed something to FTP for work (i.e., uploading large files over 1gb and more) and this works GREAT. It's also excellent at moving files between my android devices and computers. I tried similar apps before finding this one and they just didn't have the FTP capabilities I needed. The built-in file manager pales in comparison with its new FTP features, unfortunately. Well worth the price. New dark theme is nice, too.

When selecting folders from internal memory to be moved to the SD card. It appears to be an impossible operation. This among the most basic needed functions of any piece of software that claims to be a file manager.
Trying to view an image sent from another app causes it to try and copy it for some reason.
Best file explorer / manager with NAS and SMB, FTP, etc. (multi protocol) support built in!
This is what you're looking for! All I need but forever finding it. So much nonsense out there. This is made to last

title: Screen Master Pro: Screenshot, Photo Markup
description:
Screen Master is an easy-to-use, no rooting required screenshot & photo markup tool. With Screen Master, you can capture screen by touching the floating button or shaking device, lets you take screenshots on your tablet, phone or other Android device the easy way!

Screen Master also provides a variety of annotation features such as crop, add text, pixelated image, draw arrow, rect, circle and more. Lets you easily edit and markup your screenshots and quickly share it with your friends!

‚ñ∫ Advantages: 
1. No rooting required, No restrictions on use
2. HIGH-QUALITY screenshot, saved without any loss, support PNG format
3. A variety of image annotation features
4. Web page whole capture, quickly save webpage as image
5. Support save screenshots to external SD card
6. Support Android 7.0 Shortcuts and QuickTile features
7. Support long screenshot and stitching photos

‚ñ∫ Key Features:
‚òÖ Take Screenshots: 
Screen Master provides a variety of features to take a screenshot
   - Floating button: An simple button that is displayed on top of everything, just one-click to take a screenshot
   - Shaking device: Shaking your device to take a screenshot
   - Web capture: The simplest way to take a full page screenshot of your web page, just share the url to Screen Master
   - Long screenshot: Support long screen capture function to easily capture the entire screen

‚òÖ Photo Markup: 
  - Crop and rotate image: can be cut into rectangular, round, star, triangle and other shapes
  - Spotlight key info: highlight something with Spotlight
  - Blur image: pixelate the image to cover areas you do not want to show
  - Magnify image: zoom in your selected section with loupe
  - Add emoji sticker: Make your pictures look lively and interesting
  - Add text on photo: can be customized text color, background, shadow, stroke, style, size and more
  - Annotate picture, all tools you need: Arrow, Rect, Circle, Pen
  - Large picture can be directly annotated and do not have to be cropped first
  - Not only screenshots but all pictures are supported, you could import photo from gallery, HD save and share with your friends

‚òÖ Photo Stitching:
Automatically recognize and stitch multiple photos into a long screenshot, that can be stitched horizontally and vertically

‚ñ∫ Notice: Screen Master can't capture secure pages, such as Youtube protected content, pages in a banking app, or a password input page

If you have any comments or suggestions on Screen Master, please contact us at blossgraph@gmail.com. We appreciate your feedback!

comments: The best screenshot app for Android. Has simplicity got quick basic use and many advanced features not found elsewhere (in at least 10 other screenshot apps) that enable you to make professional looking screen qoutes, annotations add text, arrows, auto cut the top and bottom where Android notification and navigation buttons are etc...

OMG. Love the app. Was a bit hard at the start. Learn the functions and your set for some simply and and sleek editing. I use it daily when i'm on my Facebook page mainly. Save so much time when your need make a simple but sleek design also making quick graphics/Editing and pics becomes so much easier and quicker. Really would recommend upgrading to premium for sure. More features are great. You dont know you need those extra feature until to get them and use its app to its fil potential

Great app, helps create and manage screenshots and the optional floating button is handy (and not too intrusive). Stitching works well, and cropping, annotating, and stickers & arrows all work very well.

One of my most frequently used & valuable apps--well worth the money for the pro version. Very powerful . . . I keep finding new ways to use its features. Frequently updated & improved, a model for all app writers! 2021 Update: Two years later and I'm still lovin' this app. I use it daily on my Android phone and tablet--versatile & easy-to-use for making, sharing (easily share to Pinterest/Google Photos/Gmail), and annotating screenshots. The "Stitch" feature that allows joining multiple screens seamlessly is particularly valuable. Want a bigger image with more pixels? Rotate the device and stitch multiple screenshots together.
Excellent screenshot program however I would like the floating icon to be able to stop anywhere in the screen not just to the left and right sides

title: Calculator Plus
description:
USA TODAY named Calculator Plus among its "25 Essential Apps", calling it the "handy calculator app that's garnered great user ratings"

I'm Calculator Plus - the perfect calculator for Android.  I'm easy to use and beautifully designed to do things better than your phone or handheld calculator ever did.

I'm big, easy to read, and I love saving you time and effort.  I remember everything you calculate, and let you review it anytime, making me perfect for shopping, doing homework, balancing checkbooks, or even helping with taxes.  And if you need to quit and go do something else, I'll have it all waiting for you when you come back.  You'll never need to type the same calculation twice again.

I'm attractive and effective and I make great use of your big, beautiful display:

- I show your calculations in clear, elegant type that's easy to read, with commas just where they should be
- You'll never lose track of where you are in a calculation - I show you exactly what's happening at all times
- I remember everything, so you can take a break, then come back later and pick up where you left off
- You can use backspace anytime to correct a simple mistake, instead of starting over
- Use memory to keep a running total you can actually see
- Swipe memory keys aside if you need more advanced math functions
- My percentage key shows exactly what it did, so you're not left confused
- My intuitive, lovable design makes it simple to do everyday calculations on your phone or tablet

Let Calculator Plus on your phone or tablet finally put that handheld calculator to rest.

Calculator Plus (C) 2019Digitalchemy, LLC

I love Calculator Plus. I originally got it for my Kindle Fire and loved its look and feel and functionality. I am delighted to have it for my phone. I love the look and the satisfying click when I press a key. I find the memory function very easy to use with a fine display. It does everything I want it to do. I hope this app stays around forever.

This app is simple to use to add up all your mathematical problems. Doesn't take a lot of room as far as megabytes go so it's a win-win all the way around. If this app a try you might be pleased as I am that I did download this app.0
Really like the simple interface and capabilities of this calculator. Wish there was the capability to 'print' the results/history to either PDF or a Cloud printer

comments: Pocket RxTx is a really nice app for HAMs as well as SWLs who want to listen to shortwave from locations all over the world right over the Internet. Also it can be used to control your transceiver. I did have a bug running it in my car's head unit. It had difficulties with the connection to WiFi.

great app to listen to SW with. if ur too cheap, or want to get into swl'ing, check out this app! dig deep and support the developer too to remove ads. imo opinion its worth it, but im just some guy on the internet... dave, km6tmz

Need to fix the sound, it's to scratchy and annoying sometimes, so I'll turn it off. Love this app, but burst of noise all the time like screeching or something its awful! Please fix this in next update thanks.

Just found WebSDR and loving it! Great app! There are things that work correctly in the free version that don't in the pay version on my phone. May I suggest a couple of things? A way to set defaults for waterfall on, etc. Turning on the waterfall every single time gets annoying. Also, when my waterfall is on I can't see the actual frequency. It is cut off on the bottom on the pay version, but shows on the free version. Incorporate the frequency display into the top of the waterfall? Thanks!

Fantastic app to control your radio of choice. I use the Yaesu FT-991A, and it pretty much runs seamlessly. It runs on my home wifi, enabling complete control of transceiver CAT, and the audio is heard at my SAMSUNG A50 Android phone. There is plenty of great documentation to aid in the setup, and at this time there is much more I could be doing with it, I am sure. As I experiment further, I will attempt to share any further experiences.

title: JSON & XML Tool Premium - Creator, Editor & Viewer
description:
The JSON & XML Tool Premium app lets you view, create and edit JSON and XML files with ease, by using its simple hierarchical view. The tool is useful for various scenarios, for example, it lets you edit and make game addons. In addition, the app can be used for conversion between types, for example, loading a JSON and then saving it as an XML.

The app uses the storage browser provided by the SAF (Storage Access Framework) and does not require storage permissions (read-and-write access). However, the app will request storage permissions in some cases, such as when a file was loaded using an external file picker without providing proper access.

View a JSON / XML File
‚Ä¢ Load a file using the internal file picker (Storage Access Framework)
‚Ä¢ Load a file using an external file picker (might require storage permissions)
‚Ä¢ Download from the web by providing a URL
‚Ä¢ Paste text and parse it
‚Ä¢ Receive the text of the file from other applications (via ACTION_SEND)
‚Ä¢ Create a new file from scratch

Edit a JSON / XML File
‚Ä¢ Rename node elements
‚Ä¢ Modify node element value
‚Ä¢ Easily switch between value types: Boolean, Number & String
‚Ä¢ Add, duplicate & remove node elements
‚Ä¢ Move elements up & down within an array
‚Ä¢ Save as a new file or overwrite the current one

Additional Features
‚Ä¢ Dark theme support
‚Ä¢ Share the JSON / XML text to an external application (via ACTION_SEND)
‚Ä¢ Preview as text
‚Ä¢ Formatted text output instead of a single line
‚Ä¢ The app registers itself as a JSON / XML file handler upon installation
‚Ä¢ Export as a PDF document
‚Ä¢ Extract and transform elements using the JMESPath query language

developerAddress:
150 Menachem Begin Road
WE Tower - Level 9
Tel Aviv, 6492105
Israel
recentChanges: Bug Fixes.
comments: The structured view is great, but the app doesn't have a normal text editing view, which is incredibly strange for a JSON "editor". I assumed it would have a text mode. There's a small pop-up view of the text, but it's apparently not editable in that mode, and it never shows syntax highlighting for some reason.

Extremely well designed json viewer and editor. Copy/paste, open file, load from web - so many options. Kudos to the dev! One thing that would be nicevto see would be a copy option for the path to a particular value.
The only thing that exists for this without obnoxious ads, so 5 stars for that.
In less than a minute, I decided to purchase the premium tool. It is that good. Thank you.
Did the job well.

title: CalenGoo - Calendar and Tasks
description:
With CalenGoo you can manage all your events and tasks. With lots of configuration options you can make it look and work the way you want.

‚úîÔ∏è Sync all your past and future events with Google Calendar (just add your Google account under "Settings > Accounts" instead of syncing via the Android calendar).
‚úîÔ∏è Sync calendars with Google Calendar, Exchange, CalDAV and iCloud (via the Android calendar or directly).
‚úîÔ∏è Sync tasks with Google Calendar, Exchange, CalDAV and iCloud.
‚úîÔ∏è Attach photos and files to your events (when syncing directly with Google Calendar).
‚úîÔ∏è Attach Evernote¬Æ notes to events.
‚úîÔ∏è Weather forecast ("Settings > Weather").
‚úîÔ∏è Add icons to Google events (you have to add your Google account under "Settings > Accounts", then you can configure the icons under "Settings > Icons").
‚úîÔ∏è Five types of calendar views (day, week, month, agenda and year).
‚úîÔ∏è Four styles of agenda views ("Settings > Display and Use > Agenda view")
‚úîÔ∏è Use drag&drop to move and copy your events.
‚úîÔ∏è Widgets to see your events on your home screen (day, week, month, agenda, year and task widget).
‚úîÔ∏è Support for Exchange categories (when syncing CalenGoo directly with Exchange using EWS).
‚úîÔ∏è Share calendars with other people (using Google Calendar).
‚úîÔ∏è Search function
‚úîÔ∏è Various reminder functions (e.g. notifications, pop-up window, spoken reminders, different sounds, ...)
‚úîÔ∏è Birthdays and anniversaries of your contacts
‚úîÔ∏è Floating events and completable events
‚úîÔ∏è Templates for events
‚úîÔ∏è Print to PDF function
‚úîÔ∏è Android Wear support (watch face and agenda view)
‚úîÔ∏è Tasks in events (add a short list of tasks into an event)
‚úîÔ∏è Contacts can be linked to events
‚úîÔ∏è Use keywords to change the color or icons of your events ("Settings > Display and Use > General > Keywords").
‚úîÔ∏è Dark theme and light theme ("Settings > Design")
‚úîÔ∏è Many configuration options can be found under "Settings > Display and Use".

For more details please see here:

http://android.calengoo.com

Additionally you can add ideas or vote for ideas on https://calengoo.de/features/calengooandroid

And you can find a free 3-day trial version here: http://android.calengoo.com/trial

If you have problems just contact the support: http://android.calengoo.com/support

recentChanges:
- Separately configurable widgets of the same type, e.g multiple agenda widgets that show different sets of calendars.
- To be able to undelete a deleted event for a few seconds you can turn "Settings > Display and Use > General > Show undo action" on.
- It is now possible to sync directly via Wi-Fi with the Windows/macOS version of CalenGoo by creating a "Local sync" account under "Settings > Accounts > Add account".
- Added support for Evernote 10
- Bug fixes
comments: I'm having issues! Please help -- I've used it for years and now when I try to put in an event, it doesn't allow me to put an event on the same day. When I try to set the duration to two hours, it automatically puts it as a two day event. Calengoo, there's something wrong with your app!!

I've been using Calengoo for years, and it has never let me down! I love it. Tried others and always came back to calengoo. It has the best calendar views and is very, very customizable. Perfect week view. Flawless synchronisation with google. The settings menu's are large, because there's so much to adjust, but it all makes sense. And if you 're in trouble, support is fabulous.

I have used and loved this app for years, to the point I am dependent on it. Now I'm having lots of problems with it and it is so frustrating. My tasks duplicate, disappear altogether, all sorts of things that make me not able to rely on it for my scheduling anymore and I am so disappointed. I tried reinstalling it too but the problems persist (even on different phones). I may have to give up on it and go elsewhere.
Brilliant calendar app, especially for CalDAV synching. Nextcloud users need to check this out.
Problem with latest release. Weekly widget shows time against each day column rather than one on the left. Otherwise I like it :)

title: Photo Measures
description:
Photo Measures is the best and easiest way to save measures on your own photos on Android.

Architectural Digest - "Very useful when shopping or meeting with contractors"
Tuaw.com - "It's perfect for your own work around the house, and is handy for creating plans to bring to a contractor."
AppSafari Rating: ‚òÖ‚òÖ‚òÖ‚òÖ‚òÖ - "So incredibly convenient"

Recommended by many reference magazines, websites and blogs all around the world: Architectural Digest, Tuaw.com, This Old House, AppOfTheDay.com, AppSafari.com, AppGefahren.de, etc...

‚óÜ‚óÜ‚óÜ‚óÜ‚óÜ

Constructing a house? Engineering a new project? Moving to a new place?
Take some photos and note down the dimensions on the photos to remember the exact layout, and to make sure that everything will fit easily. 

Need to keep in mind the exact dimensions of an object? Just take a photo and quickly write them on it.

Are you decorating? Want to buy a new frame or a new furniture but not sure it will fit? 
No problem since you can have all your house dimensions always with you!

‚óÜ‚óÜ‚óÜ‚óÜ‚óÜ

You are a real estate agent? 
A contractor?
An engineer?
A designer?
Working in the construction industry?
Someone who wants to keep his house's measure easily accessible?

Whenever you need to save dimensions, sizes, angles or write down a detail you need to remember, Photo Measures will help you to be more efficient and more accurate.

‚óÜ‚óÜ‚óÜ‚óÜ‚óÜ

Photo Measures helps you to:
‚úì Take a photo and directly draw measures on it
‚úì Zoom into and out of your photo when you need more precision 
‚úì Edit your measures with a very intuitive interface
‚úì Quickly add text as comments when measures are not enough
‚úì Native support for angles
‚úì Save your measures in imperial or metric units 
‚úì Easily organize your photos by category
‚úì Export your dimensions in high resolution
‚úì Export as PDF or JPG
‚úì Import photos of any size and aspect ratio

Keep posted, a lot of new features are planned for the next versions!

Rue de Gen√®ve 18
c/o Trittenfid SA

recentChanges:
Thank you all for your very positive feedback!

In this version:
- We added a new "Style" menu where you can easily change the way your measures are displayed
- We did a lot of "under the hood" changes in order to be able to publish new updates faster
- We improved the overall look and usability of the app
- We did a lot of minor improvements

Feel welcome to contact us if you have any comments!
comments: It's great, and super easy to use. Totally worth money. What I'm missing is adding multiple images from gallery at once. It's super frustrating to adding it one by one especially when you have a lot of photos in gallery so every time you have to scroll hundreds of them to add next one. Also It's sometimes hard to move line when point is at the edge of photo.
It does not actually measure it just provides a picture that you can draw lines on with your own measurements

Excellent App for what it can do. My requests to make this app better would be the following: 1. Allow integration with Adobe Acrobat/pdf editing function to add a page and text before sending. 2. Provide a feature to change the file name of the pdf being exported. In this way, the user won't have to go to a PC afterwards to do more work. 3. There is no material which describes the difference between the Lite and the paid version. Unless I missed it..

Does all the dimensions and notes on photos I need it too. I do surveys of buildings and this helps me remember exactly what I saw. Plus, it looks classy when I share the pics. One problem was that when it syncs to DB, the file name gets lost and spits out some crazy alpha numeric file name. Even at that my photos are still safe, because I share them to my photo gallery on my phone. Easy peasy.
When I had ( photo measures lite) it was working great. Then I went pro version and it stopped working . It just leave me a short message and goes away. I shure would appreciate help.

title: Clipper Plus: Clipboard Manager
description:
Clipper Plus is a powerful clipboard manager that automatically saves everything you copy. Access your collected clippings later and organize them in lists. Copy, paste, view, edit and share their contents. Store repetitive pieces of text in Clipper and copy them whenever you need to. Take control of copy and paste with Clipper!

‚úî Unlimited collected clippings. Keep more than the 20 newest clippings or disable automatic cleanup completely.

‚úî Dynamic values. Place the current date and time in your custom snippets.

‚úî Clipping search. Find what you‚Äôre looking for easily.

‚úî New settings and options. Choose whether to collect each clipping manually, and more.

‚úî No ads. Clipper Plus is completely ad free, and your purchase supports development.

And of course, all the base features of Clipper Free:

‚úî Automatic & seamless clipboard history and extension. All copied text is collected and saved for later use. Don‚Äôt worry about copying over anything important.

‚úî Easy clipping organization and editing. Copy a clipping back to the clipboard with a single tap. Define custom folders for storing your collected clippings. View, edit and extract contents.

‚úî Quick and easy access. Open Clipper through your status bar for quick access to your collection. Predefine quick snippets for easy copying and take your notes in Clipper.

Copy and Paste 2.0 is here!

(Upgrading from Clipper Free? Clipper Plus installs as a separate application, so start it after installation to migrate your data and uninstall the free version.)

If you need help or have any suggestions or complaints, please don‚Äôt hesitate to e-mail us at clipper@rojekti.fi. Your feedback is invaluable to us.

Used permissions:

‚úî Photos/media/files: import & export backup functionality to internal storage or SD card

recentChanges: Clipper Sync has shut down on June 1st, 2019. This update removes cloud sync & contains crash and bug fixes. If you need to export past sync data, go to www.clippersync.com.
comments: Started WORKING AGAIN (somehow). Sometimes it will stay on and copy everything I copy, but sometimes it doesn't. When the app is opened and left so you can access it with the square button, it seems to work best. I am not rooted or anything. I went ahead and went into the battery settings a minute ago and took it off battery optimization to see if this would help steady things out. I'll come back for an update after a few days and see if that has helped.

Clipper aspires to meeting a real need, capturing and retaining everything copied, but the reality is that it captures clips erratically. Leaving the app running doesn't seem to matter, as is including it in "apps that never sleep" under battery settings. However, as it will retain multiple clips on occasion, there is proof of concept. I encourage the developer to keep working.

This is one of my favorite Apps. I was sad when it stopped working for me when I switched from MotoMod to Samsung Note Ultra 5G. Now Clipper Plus is working again. It's absolutely awesome. Thanks for all your effort. It is most appreciated. I do miss the sync across devices. No fault on your part there.

Great and working with Android 11. The reason i didn't choose 5 stars is that not every time I copy something it appears in the clipboard. Besides, sometimes even what I am copying gets to the clipboard, next day or so I don't find these copied items there although I hit the "Save" button. I hope this will be fixed.

It would be cool if the app did a version compatibility check before offering the opportunity to buy a pro license. I was able to refund without issue, but this doesn't seem like an oversight and more like a malicious money-grab. Shame on the devs.

title: Reminder Pro
description:
Reminder app without advertisements.

Are you looking for a simple pop up reminder app?
Do you want to create reminders for one-time and recurring tasks?

Get Reminder and skyrocket your productivity. üìà

Never forget an important task again! Finally a simple and easy way to set a reminder or deadline notification. This hourly reminder app gets straight to the point. Set notifications to remind you of all the tasks, errands, and to-do list items and sit back and put your mind at ease.

No unnecessary or complicated features. Reminders can be set in a matter of seconds. Add reminder or deadline notification for anything!

The Reminder App is a simple but versatile productivity tool to organize your life! From using it as a med reminder, important week reminder, pill reminder alarm, to appointment reminder, deadline reminder, meal reminder and recurring reminder, you can truly benefit from adding Reminder in your daily life.

üìÖCHECK OUT HOW THOUSANDS OF USERS ARE ALREADY USING REMINDER: 

‚òÖ Deadline Notification
Stay on track with school, work, or personal deadlines by entering them into the do Reminder
app.

‚òÖ Homework and Assignments
Create pop up reminders for when homework or other school assignments are due.

‚òÖ Meetings
Work schedules can get busy. Set reminders for all your meetings each week and sit back
and let Reminder notify you when you need to attend.

‚òÖ Daily Tasks
All those daily tasks can stack up. Assign a date and time to all your tasks and be on your
way to organizing your life! Also, use it as a recurring task reminder to never forget doing those routine tasks that improve your life such as water consumption. 

‚òÖ Birthdays
It can be difficult to remember all the birthdays of your friends and family members. With
do Reminder you can set a deadline notification for each birthday so you never forget to say happy birthday.

‚òÖ Anniversaries
Use Reminder to notify you of that special date. You can even add remember me notes for plans, dinner
reservations or gift ideas

‚òÖ Errands
Set up a schedule to take care of all your errands with ease using our task reminder with alarm. Set date, time and detailed
notes so you can remember to do all the errands in your to-do list.

‚òÖ Important Calls
Reminder can also be your day planner with reminders. Add reminder alarm so you don‚Äôt forget that important call or plan multiple calls during the day and add notes to your reminder like
names, phone numbers, etc.

‚òÖ Paying Bills
Never get charged for a late fee again! Use our list reminder to set an alarm to remind you to pay a bill.

‚òÖ Taking Medication
Set a daily reminder to take your medication and use Reminder as your pill reminder. Set once and you‚Äôll never have to remember again!

‚òÖ Event planner
Plan your events in advance with our to-do reminder.


‚òÖ And so much more!


üîîOTHER GREAT FEATURES AVAILABLE:

‚òÖ Custom recurring reminders

‚òÖ Popup Notifications

‚òÖ Snooze option

‚òÖ Widget

‚òÖ Daily summary reminder

‚òÖ Quiet hours settings for hourly reminders

‚òÖ Advance reminders

‚òÖ Multiple Themes

‚òÖ Search functionality

‚òÖ Auto Backup / Manual Backup

‚òÖ Categories with different colours and settings

‚òÖ Standard, Compact and monthly grouping view options for list of reminders.

Now it‚Äôs time to remind yourself of doing the important task in your life.

Reminder can also be your day planner with reminders. Add reminder alarm so you don‚Äôt forget that important call or plan multiple calls during the day and add notes to your reminder like
names, phone numbers, etc.

‚òÖ Paying Bills
Never get charged for a late fee again! Use our list reminder to set an alarm to remind you to pay a bill.

‚òÖ Taking Medication
Set a daily reminder to take your medication and use Reminder as your pill reminder. Set once and you‚Äôll never have to remember again!

‚òÖ Event planner
Plan your events in advance with our to-do reminder.


‚òÖ And so much more!


üîîOTHER GREAT FEATURES AVAILABLE:

‚òÖ Custom recurring reminders

‚òÖ Popup Notifications

‚òÖ Snooze option

‚òÖ Widget

‚òÖ Daily summary reminder

‚òÖ Quiet hours settings for hourly reminders

‚òÖ Advance reminders

‚òÖ Multiple Themes

‚òÖ Search functionality

‚òÖ Auto Backup / Manual Backup

‚òÖ Categories with different colours and settings

‚òÖ Standard, Compact and monthly grouping view options for list of reminders.

Now it‚Äôs time to remind yourself of doing the important task in your life.
summary: Ad-free version of reminder
recentChanges: Minor issues has been fixed.
comments: Outstanding app! I use this every single day and would be lost without it. Originally I was using Google reminders but the problem is that Google reminders is inconsistent about when the notifications go off. An 8:00 a.m. notification in Google reminders might not go off until an hour later. This program is always on time. There are so many features available that make it personalized. What I truly like is the fact that it is constantly improving. The Creator is updating it with new features.
For some reason, even with battery optimizations removed, the app still refuses to notify. I couldn't make it a 'Never Sleeping app' either because the app is not even available as an option.
Good, would love to see the icon back likenit was. Everytime I see this one it makes me think of Twitter. Thank you, thank you for changing it back. I like much better!
Am not get a notification ring tone for the reminders in this app.. Only notification displayed. In the settings ring tone also enabled Hope you may advise to solve the problem
This is the best reminder app I have found and I have used a lot of them. Has all the options I have been looking for. Great job.

This would happen thru both widget and app. Slow and didn't perform correctly. 3 stars is generous tbh but I'm hoping this is just due to some kind of update malfunction

title: Mega Plugin for Solid Explorer
description:
This is a plugin for Solid Explorer, which lets you connect to your Mega account. You can do pretty much everything:
- copy, move, rename and view files
- download and upload files
- stream music and videos

In order to connect to Mega, follow these steps:
1. Tap the + button
2. Choose "Cloud connection"
3. Select Mega option
4. Enter you login and password
5. Tap connect. Tap again to open your cloud drive.
descriptionHTML:
This is a plugin for Solid Explorer, which lets you connect to your Mega account. You can do pretty much everything:
- copy, move, rename and view files
- download and upload files
- stream music and videos

In order to connect to Mega, follow these steps:
1. Tap the + button
2. Choose "Cloud connection"
3. Select Mega option
4. Enter you login and password
5. Tap connect. Tap again to open your cloud drive.
summary: Mega cloud explorer plugin for Solid Explorer

1.1.4:

comments: Why is it not working on Android tv. I had purchased it to use on tv but no use. Can you please make it work.. Or please refund money, which by default you have disabled.
I just bought this right here from Google play but it gives me the error: The plugin "Mega for Solid Explorer" is missing valid license!

Working fine even media playback also possible with external media players .... Where with mega app or website you need to use inbuilt media players which has no features like the media player of google photos inbuilt video player

Has never worked for me. I keep it around hoping that an app that will fix this issue, but it still does not work. Solid explorer, itself, is great. This plug-in? Not so much. And the error update seems to change depending on the version I'm trying to use. Now it says it failed because of a problem with my device. (OnePlus 6) ü§∑‚Äç‚ôÇÔ∏è

Wasn't working, but I hadn't accessed it for quite awhile. Worked - after I first accessed Mega to make sure everything was working as far as account went, then UNINSTALLED AND REINSTALLED plug-in: That last did the trick. Didn't even have to reenter passwords. I'm not using two-factor authentication, but the notes say they're supporting it now. Don't be quite so harsh, some of you. At least Mega is supported, at whatever speed you're getting. I expect New Zealand to be slower from US anyway.

title: Oilfield Calendar
description:
Working in the oilfield is tough. Managing your time there is easy with the new Oilfield Calendar app.

Oilfield Calendar is the easy-to-use calendar and planning app that you just can‚Äôt do without if you‚Äôre an oilfield worker. See how easy it can be to keep your life organized!

‚Ä¢ Customize your oil and natural gas hitch with easy to use interface

‚Ä¢ Drilling, production, and facility workers, this will be your wives new best friend.

‚Ä¢ Vendors, know the DSM on tour to sign your tickets.

‚Ä¢ See if Christmas or your birthday is on your days off, plan ahead using month and year views.

‚Ä¢ Create and compare multiple schedules. Print and share them in PDF.

Oilfield schedules can be difficult. Plan ahead with oilfield calendar. Keep your life turning to the right.

How to Use Oilfield Calendar

‚Ä¢ Create and change new hitches in the hitch editor

‚Ä¢ Holidays are marked with oil drops in month view

You‚Äôve got your hardhat, steal toes, and glasses, now add Oilfield Calendar to essential tools to have when working in the patch. Now you can manage your busy schedule at home, and at the rig with Oilfield Calendar app.

** Feel free to drop us a line! We‚Äôre always listening to your suggestions to improve Oilfield Calendar! If you have any input for the app, just contact us at OCsupport@arcwise.co and we will help you! **

** Are you happy with Oilfield Calendar? We‚Äôd love to hear about it! Please take a moment to leave us a nice review. It really helps! **

While you‚Äôre in the sharing mood, go ahead and throw us a like on Facebook too, 
THANKS!

Love this app. It makes it so clear. easy and available to know how and when to plan my life's schedule!

Loved this app on my galaxy s7 then when I switched to a note 9 it moves so slow and buggy and wont even load hitches anymore and I have to keep restarting the app to only load 1 hitch out of 3 hitches .
Love the app and easy scheduling, keep up the work.
This calendar is very helpful to plan family events.

title: FSWizard Pro Machinist Calc
description:
CNC Milling and Turning Speed and Feed Calculator (Wizard)
Absolutely the best CNC machinist speed and feed app around.
Calculate Speeds and Feeds simply by choosing your work and tool material.
No need to know any numbers.

FSWizard will automatically use recommended cutting speed and chipload for machining with a variety of indexed and solid endmills, drills, taps etc.

Check our HSMAdvisor+FSWizard PRO bundle: http://hsmadvisor.com/index.php?page=FSWizard_H

‚òÖ Made for CNC Machinists by a CNC Machinist  Zero_Divide - the creator of a popular line of Machine Shop Productivity apps. ‚òÖ

Improve machining productivity and optimize cutter life.
Calulate Chip Thinning and HSM - High Speed Machining.
Find out the optimum machining depth of cut and width of cut parameters.

FSWizard Machinist app has following features:

‚òÖ Milling Speeds and Feeds. HSM. High Speed Machining, Chip Thinning.
‚òÖ Ball Nose Endmill Speeds and Feeds
‚òÖ Drilling and Tapping Speeds and Feeds
‚òÖ Tapping thread Engagement and Best Tap Drill selection for both Imperial and Metric Taps

‚òÖ Drill charts for both imperial and metric systems
‚òÖ Tap drill charts for most common imperial and metric taps.
‚òÖ Tap drill charts for BSP and NPT pipe threads.
‚òÖ HeliCoil Threaded inserts information
‚òÖ Imperial and Metric Flat Head Screw reference
‚òÖ Imperial and Metric Socket Head Cap Screw reference
‚òÖ Interactive GD&T Reference. With definitions for Flatness, Position, Fetaure Frame, etc

‚òÖ Oblique Triangle Calculator
‚òÖ Fillet Calculator: Calculate fillet between two lines
‚òÖ Bolt Circle, Particial Circle and Line (polar points) calculators
‚òÖ Countersink/ Drill point Calculator
‚òÖ True Position Calculator
‚òÖ Scientific Calculator with trig functions and brackets.

‚òÖ Milling Tools available: Solid Endmill, Indexed Endmill and Facemill, Solid and Indexed drills
‚òÖ Drilling Tools: Jobber Drill, Hi-Performance Parabolic Drill, Spade Drill, Reamer
‚òÖ Turning Tools: Profiling and Grooving

Charts: Drill chart, Imperial, Metric,Pipe Tap  charts are also included in free version.

FSWizard works with both metric and imperial units.

For the full list of materials please visit:
http://hsmadvisor.com/index.php?page=help&shell_id=241&article_id=4811_supported-materials-list

Some of materials that come with FSWizard PRO:
1) Very soft low-carbon steels. (135 HB)
   Very Low Carbon Steel 120HB
2) Free cutting magnetic steels (120-210 HB)
   1018 Carbon Steel (175-200 HB)
   A-36 Hot Roll Steel 160-220 HB
   Low Carbon Steel 5-20Rc
3) Structural steels, Low to medium carbon steels (<0.5%C) (135 -165 HB)
   1015, Ck 15, C16(111 HB)

4) High-carbon and ordinary low-alloy steels. Medium-Hard (165 -210 HB)
   4140 Alloy Steel 250-300 HB
5) Normal tool steels.Hard-quenching and tempering steels. (210-270 HB)
   Low Carbon Steel 30-40Rc
   O-1 Tool Steel 175-225 HB
6) High-alloy, high-hardness steels. (270-360 HB)
   A2 Tool Steel 200-230 HB
   D-2 Tool Steel 200-250 HB
7) High-strength, Hardened steels. (>360 HB) 
   H-13 Tool Steel 50-55 RC
   Hardox 500 (50-55 RC)
8) Free-cutting stainless steels. (160-275 HB)
   17-4 Ph Stainless 150-200 BH
   302 Stainless 135-185 HB
   303 Stainless 135-185 HB
9) Moderately difficult stainless steels. (185-325 HB)
   304 Stainless Cold Rolled 225-275 HB
10) Difficult and Very Difficult stainless steels. (275-375 HB)
   440 Stainless 275-325 HB
   P550 Stainless 350-430 HB
13) Cast iron. SG iron. (120-260 HB)
   6061-T6 Aluminum
   7075-T6 Aluminum
   Copper 110 (42 HB)
   High Lead Brass
   Magnesium - Alloy
   Titanium - Pure 70 HB
   Zinc - Die Cast
17) Plastics, Soft non-metals
   Delrin, Nylon, Nylatron
   Duratron XP, Vespel PI, Celazole PBI
   Mahogany
   Pattern / Modeling Board
   Polycarbonate, Polysulfone, Ultem 1000-2300 PEI
17.1) Wood
   Hard Wood

   Soft Wood

recentChanges: Fix missing units in the app header
comments: I mill and turn mostly stainless for the food processing industry and so far this app has been invaluable! The rpm and feed rates for tapping and drilling have been spot on. I had the free version and it was pretty good but the pro version has more variety of machining calculations for many more materials. If I was to critique anything I would complain that I don't have any parameters for insert drills but I guess those numbers are usually supplied by the manufacturer of said insert drills.
Great, helpful app. Suggestions: 1) add speeds and feeds for tapered end mills 2) in the materials drop-down list, show both Brinell and Rockwell C hardness, please
App is super useful. Don't regret buying it at all. Just the speed and feed part is worth the price of admission, all the bolt hole, drill point calcs are a great bonus!

One thing I'd like to see added is a reference for effective thread depth with the possible drill sizes for a given two size (for instance, if youre running a 2-56 tap and you use a #50 drill you have X% effective thread).

I have just downloaded this App and it is fantastic. I work with a lot of different materials including hardwood and Acrylic. It is well worth the money and going through all the reviews it nice that there is positive feedback from the creator about suggestion from the public. 5 stats from me.

Great all around app. Will not do what I need it for. Cut list calculator will only show 20 or so stock piece in picture. Zooming out only overlaps number. Making it unable to read.
Excellent woodworking/carpenter calculator and SO much more! Very handy! Definitely recommend!
Use it everyday. Has more calculators than I imagined. Even a program for writing over an image. Super useful.

title: Voice Notes (No Ads)
description:
* Just one payment, no extra monthly fee!
* If you have used free version before, all the input notes will remain in this paid version.
* After this paid version installed, please launch the new app icon with "No Ads"
* Paid version unique features:
    Remove Ads
    Unlimited to use [Set reminder time when adding notes] and the Alarm button


Features:

- Only one touch needed. 
  It can continuously receive your speech and convert to text. Note down and remind you later at the date/time you set.

- Integrated with your Android calendars, you need not maintain another one.

- Automatically save your notes in a storage file, and easily back up to cloud.

- Support to create notes by projects or categories.

- Also easy to share voice-to-text to friends.

- It can work when the phone screen is turned off.
  With the Recite option, you can make sure the notes are correctly recorded.

- Support headset button to control Start/Stop voice recognition.

- Supported speech recognition 120 languages.

- Supported 20 user interface languages (including English)

- Simple user interface. Just press the microphone button and speak to take note!

Requirements:
- Google voice search (Google App) v6.15.24.21 or later is required as  a speech to text engine. Most devices have it pre-installed. If your devices do not install it, This app will  guide you to install.
https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.google.android.googlequicksearchbox


Permissions Notice:
This app may ask for permission to access the following features
‚Ä¢ Microphone for speech recognition
‚Ä¢ External storage for saving notes file
‚Ä¢ Calendar for adding reminder event


If you need, you can try this free version:
https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.SouthernPacificOceanFisher.VoiceToText_memo

recentChanges:
- Fixed issue: It might fail to share notes to friends on some specific devices.
- New option: Move the alarm button to lower side
- Change the setting value of [Only one time stamp per microphone-on] as default "On" because most users feedback they do not need too close timestamps.

comments: Great App! One suggestion is to allow record and save audio while converting to text. The words can be stored in text file and audio in wav or mp3.
No ads but the text to speech was making mistakes. Plus it was not what I expected.

I have been looking for somthing like this that works and gets all the text as you say it without very little spelling mistakes and so far no spelling mistakes and has been very accurate. I used the free version first for about 4 weeks then purchased the pro when I was sure it worked ok.

I have tried several apps for note taking, voice and reminders. This has solved all of my issues. Highly recommend not only trying but using it! I purchased the pro version to remove the ads, with pleasure.

Suggestions for improvement: 1. Speak note then speak date/time to be reminded. 2. Select/check feature for notes with Color code for marking items done. 3. Item's not done gets snooze feature until done. Works great with my google calendar 5 Stars.

title: Uninstaller Pro
description:
Fastest and simplest uninstall tool on android!
 
Features:

* Remove application easily by single click!
* Support batch uninstall
* Display application name, version, installation time and size
* Search application by name
* Various sort modes
* Very small application size: 74KB(0.07MB)
* Highlight application which is moved to sd card by TF icon
* Filter system apps which cannot be uninstalled
* No android permission required
* No advertisement

Just what I was looking for. It's very easy to batch uninstall apps. Single click uninstalls.
I love this app. it's the only deletion app I use. I've tried others but this is the easiest and most effective. worth of money
simple and great. been using this app forever.
Stays on in the background; won't shut down most times...

title: ‚ú¶ TREK ‚ú¶ T.I. Notes
description:
Enjoy notes with the LOOK and SOUNDS you love! 
This is one of the best, most intuitive ways to take and organize notes.

Product Features:
‚ú¶ Actions to add, edit, archive, trash, and delete notes
‚ú¶ To-do checklists
‚ú¶ Image, video, audio, and other file attachments
‚ú¶ Categories and tags to manage notes
‚ú¶ Sketch notes with any color or brush size
‚ú¶ Share or send notes through messaging and social apps
‚ú¶ Merge and search notes
‚ú¶ Agenda reminders with notifications and location
‚ú¶ Lock & Password app or note
‚ú¶ Export/import backups
‚ú¶ Resizable widgets in 3 styles and multiwidget support
‚ú¶ Add Notes shortcuts to home screen
‚ú¶ 30+ languages
‚ú¶ OK Google Assistant integration: just tell "write a note"/"take a note"/"note to self" followed by the content *manage default note app

The Total Interface spoof continues!
This app's interface is meant to parody the way sci-fi designers on a cheap budget imagined future computers 30 years ago. Made with cones, curves, and various blocks in the basic 256 colors computers were capable of at the time. Topped with tiny text that was meaningless and buttons with completely indecipherable function or layout.

I stayed true to that style, but for my artistic expression I gave everything actual meaning and function to give you a fully usable interface for all functions.

This is a generic interface that uses only public domain simple curves, colors, rectangles, etc. and contains no trademarked material from any old - games, computer programs, shows or movies. I respect copyrights, so please don't ask me to update to include them in reviews or by mail.

Light up the stars :-) It helps me.
Like and follow my Facebook page for the latest releases and updates. https://www.facebook.com/Not.Star.Trek.LCARS.Apps/ 
Also check "More by NSTEnterprises" below to see my other offerings.

comments: Honestly, i thought this would just be another fairly standard note app but with an LCARS design (which would've been enough for me haha) but this app is more than that. It has a lot of great features and it is such an awesome addition to my phone! I love Star Trek TNG and its because of awesome developers like this that I can exercise my passion for it. Thank you for this great app!

Love it for what it is, goes great with your other themes. But please add a back button somewhere to its UI just to be consistent with your other themes. Don't believe it has one built in unlike the others. Also, I'm a bibliophile and wanna know if that story idea worked out. ‚Ä¢Ôπè‚Ä¢ Edit: Thanks I use both, was more of a wishlist item but might help others.

I love the interface and all, overall nice app ( though a more treki font would be appreciated. What annoys me is the fact that the app doesn't save your notes at all, so if you switch from one theme to another, reseting widgets--all your notes are gone, unless you remember to manually save them as text file. This is something no other note widget has trouble with so naturally I forget. Otherwise appreciate the look and I definitely don't regret the purchase

Perfect with the rest of the interface i like it! Thank you for making my obligatory smartphone experience somewhat pleasant. It would seem that ticking items on lists back and forth and rearranging their order would come in handy.
If you are a Star Trek enthusiast I will recommend this app it goes good with the total interface launcher that he makes very awesome

title: File Transfer Pro
description:
The easiest, fastest way to send and receive files and folders from other smartphones, tablets, and computers. File Transfer works cross-platform on Mac, Windows, iPhone, iPad, iPod Touch, and Android.

It is quick and easy. No configuration required, no need to enter an address to connect. Devices are automatically discovered (as long as they are connected to the same wi-fi network). Select files and they are transferred to your devices and computers in seconds. Without USB cable. 

File Transfer is not a cloud. Files are transferred directly and instantly on your local network. No need to upload your files to the Internet, then download them on any device.

To download File Transfer for other platforms go to http://www.delitestudio.com/file-transfer/

File Transfer is compatible with File Storage, the best file manager for iOS, and File Storage Companion (free for Mac and for Windows).

Follow us at: http://www.facebook.com/delitestudiosrl
descriptionHTML:
The easiest, fastest way to send and receive files and folders from other smartphones, tablets, and computers. File Transfer works cross-platform on Mac, Windows, iPhone, iPad, iPod Touch, and Android.

It is quick and easy. No configuration required, no need to enter an address to connect. Devices are automatically discovered (as long as they are connected to the same wi-fi network). Select files and they are transferred to your devices and computers in seconds. Without USB cable.

File Transfer is not a cloud. Files are transferred directly and instantly on your local network. No need to upload your files to the Internet, then download them on any device.

To download File Transfer for other platforms go to http://www.delitestudio.com/file-transfer/

File Transfer is compatible with File Storage, the best file manager for iOS, and File Storage Companion (free for Mac and for Windows).

Follow us at: http://www.facebook.com/delitestudiosrl
summary: The easiest way to exchange files with smartphones, tablets, and computers.
recentChanges:
We've completely redesigned File Transfer to make it even more beautiful, fast, and easy to use. With a refreshing new look which adheres to Material Design guidelines.

If you've got any ideas on how we can keep improving our app, we're all ears. Drop us a line through the page "Contact" at http://www.delitestudio.com.
comments: I'm using this app to copy files from an Android phone to an iPhone over WiFi. It lacks the ability to sort or filter files, and has no image thumbnails. If a failure happens while copying files, the entire transfer fails. There is no opportunity to skip or overwrite failed files, even if the reason is that the file already exists. As a result of these shortcomings, the app is frustrating to use.

The app doesn't do anything except direct you to buy the pro version. I bought it and couldn't get it to work so i tried contacting support through the app. Then, a screen came up in a foreign language. I stopped there, it was getting more than my patience would allow. Dont buy !!!

License check failed. I often travel in China, and because this app requires constant license checks it means I must always make sure I am either connected to the internet or I have VPN available which is inconvenient. Sometimes, I just want to transfer files from my laptop to phone but can't, because of the license check issue. March 28th 2020 update This software still sucks. I tried using it, but now it doesn't even see either my pc or my iPad. I have three devices and none see each other.

It work's perfectly :)) I can send an receive files between macbook an android just like original airdrop :). But you need to pay for it. Free is only transfer from phone. For macbook, you need to buy separate app.

Well if you enjoy having your rectum scrapped out by wool brushes then this 1.99 expenditure is for you. There is absolutely no instructions on "how to". It starts and then if you try to delete something forget it. Not allowed on the chromebook either. The program gives you no status of how long you have to go or any status come to think of it. Imagine a cow looking at a new fence post and what he is thinking.

title: eWallet - Password Manager
description:
No subscription fee! Now includes updated Biometric features, allowing a wallet to be unlocked using a fingerprint, iris scan, facial recognition, or something similar, based on the device being used.

Lock your passwords, credit cards and bank account numbers behind military-grade encryption and carry them with you wherever you go by installing the most sophisticated and easy-to-use password manager app on your Android smartphone and tablet. Stay safe, stay strong, stay smart and organized with the powerful smartphone and tablet app, eWallet¬Æ.
 
COMPLETE PASSWORD MANAGEMENT
Your digital life is at risk if you aren‚Äôt using secure passwords, but you needn‚Äôt worry about carrying sensitive information around in your pocket any more thanks to eWallet.
 
This robust security app provides password storage on-the-go, so you can still log in to your bank account, store your credit card and PIN numbers, and lock your online life away while still having full and free access whenever you want it.
 
SAFETY AND SIMPLICITY
With full cloud or local full Wi-Fi synchronization (and backup) of your secure ‚Äúwallets‚Äù between Android devices and desktop computers using the additional PC version (sold separately), eWallet is as convenient as it is strong. Check out its powerhouse features below, and find out more at https://iliumsoft.com/ewallet.
 
FEATURES:
   * 256-bit military-grade AES encryption
   * Biometric scanner (fingerprint, facial recognition, iris scan) support for secure yet convenient access on compatible devices
   * Includes Dark Theme (aka Dark mode)
   * Sync your data seamlessly over the cloud (Dropbox) or via Wi-Fi with eWallet‚Äôs PC or Mac versions (purchased separately)
   * Random password generator to keep your login details safe and secure
   * Store bank account, insurance and personal details. Keep all your info close at hand, and secure
   * Auto-locking feature
   * Create and sync multiple wallets between computers and devices
   * Customize your wallets with great-looking cards, backgrounds and categories
   * AutoPass automatic password entering through built-in browser control
 
Ilium Software has over 23 years of mobile security software experience and is trusted by more than half a million users around the world to deliver the most comprehensive, user-friendly solution to personal data security. Don‚Äôt risk being without eWallet.
 
Visit https://iliumsoft.com/ewallet for more information.

eWallet 8 requires Android OS 5 or higher.

comments: I have used eWallet since my Palm Pilot days--it has never failed me. It has always run on my Windows desktop, as well as Palm Pilot, Windows phone, Samsung tablet, Chromebook, and Android phone. It always sync's flawlessly. My one indispensable app.

I have used eWallet for several years now and love it. It keeps all of my passwords conviently in one location on my phone and desktop computer and is secure. I have only one password to remember to get to all of the others, and I refer to eWallet often . It is a lifesaver!!
This is the greatest APP ever for management of important data. I have been with eWallet for longer than 10 years and love it.
Great app for organizing your be bank accounts and other business and bills all of which contains a password of some kind into one place with max encryption.
I have been using eWallet on Android and Windows computer since 2014. It syncs between the 2 when I choose the option. Love it!

title: Planimeter - GPS area measure | land survey on map
description:
Planimeter is a the best land surveying app and field area measure tool. You can also measure distance, perimeter, bearing, angle and GPS coordinates in different formats on Google Maps. You can save, edit, label, view, share your measurements as KML data files and screenshots. 

Check out Free Planimeter Guide with details about how to determine square footage and all other features: http://goo.gl/J7iZIn

Features you won't find in other apps:

- live auto map measure using GPS tracking (walk / drive around boundary) with time interval and accuracy settings;

- magnifying glass for very accurate pin placement for distance and area measure: https://youtu.be/Hha_nmC032M

- add point with exact distance and angle input (Distance and Bearing Feature): http://goo.gl/8XbhJU

- create, share and view KML directly from e-mail attachment , file browser, etc: http://goo.gl/2cdI8w 

- intuitive and friendly way to add labels in Notes Mode (extra paid mode):  http://goo.gl/s52VdU

- quick share, directions and navigation to selected point is available from Notes Mode (extra paid mode): http://goo.gl/nCRTQi

- smart features to remove redundant points and generate convex areas;

- different geo-coordinate formats;

- quick switch and view measured  path and polygons in pre-cached Google Earth app (extra paid feature);

- Multiple areas measurements (in-app purchase):  https://goo.gl/SrFMj3

- Circle Mode (in-app purchase) - radius around point https://goo.gl/dkHuvy

- Volume /  Cost calculator when height or rate per area unit entered https://goo.gl/dkHuvy


Multilingual: English, Portuguese, Russian, German, Italian


The app  has many positive comments from users and   has been successfully used in different areas: 

- outdoor activities: sports, golf (distance between two points or holes), bike tours, trail planning, travelling, quick path measure , map your run
- garden and yard: landscape planning, grass cutting, lawn care and mowing, fencing, grass seeding.
- agriculture, poultry and farming: harvesting, fertilizing, crops (corn, wheat, maize, beet, etc.) planning and estimation, crop fields labeling for the records, field area measure, paddocks and area fencing for cows, horses, chickens, rabbits, etc. 
- solar energy: area estimation for solar panels, flat roof area estimation
- construction: land survey, road sealing, parking lot repairing 
- forestry: objects and tree mapping, damage area estimation, measure land area
- other: ponds size and are measure;  pole lines planning; directions and navigation to the marked / shared point; movement tracking; get exact GPS coordinates of way-points; fence calculation; measure distance on google map, geocaching.

More about the app, tips and updates: https://vistechprojects.blogspot.com/search/label/Planimeter

comments: Very handy app, like a lot, but can not figure out how to upload my farm's map. Would be great if I can upload my map and work on it
Made my life much more easier since I need to make a lot of layouts of the field area.

Great app! Does almost everything I want. Just updated to Android 10 and the current version does not work on 10 (bummer). I'm sure you folks will have that fixed soon. Wish there was a way to save files directly to a Google Drive folder as it would make it a lot easier to share the KML files with co-workers. If it could do that this would be a 5 üåü app for sure. Okay folks, time to update the code so it will run on Android 10. Performed a few simple task. So far everything checks out. Thanks

It has taken me a long time to find my way around this app. I am also finding that a maximum of 10 screens is going to be limiting. Overall the app is better than nothing, but with a bit more tweaking I'm sure it would be fabulous! And it seems that my work hasn't saved - not once but twice now. I am really a bit over this app - and to think I actually paid for this!

I only need to use this app for a small proportion of what it's capable of and it's great. Only problem so far is the inner section of the target is a bit dark so can be difficult to line up precisely on a very specific spot but how picky is that. Brilliant app.

title: Opaque oVirt, RHEV, and Proxmox Client
description:
By buying this app, you are supporting an open-source project in need of resources to improve! Thank you!

If you are unhappy, please do not rate the application badly - simply get a refund or if the refund period has expired, ask me for a refund by email! Satisfaction is guaranteed!

Release notes:
https://github.com/iiordanov/remote-desktop-clients/blob/master/bVNC/CHANGELOG-Opaque

Report bugs:
https://github.com/iiordanov/remote-desktop-clients/issues

If you have questions, please don't post a negative review, rather, ask your question on the forum so everybody benefits:
https://groups.google.com/forum/#!forum/bvnc-ardp-aspice-opaque-remote-desktop-clients

Check out my VNC Viewer as well

Opaque is a GPLv3 licensed secure, super fast oVirt, Red Hat Enterprise Virtualization (RHEV), and Proxmox VDI client that allows you to connect graphically to all your virtual machines running in the cloud from anywhere in the world. It currently implements support for the SPICE protocol.

NOTES
(1) Some older devices are known to have issues with self-signed SSL certificates. If you find you are affected, return Opaque or ask for a refund. Please do not rate the application badly because of a platform issue!

(2) On most current devices, playing sound and video exceeds the CPU processing power and causes jittery sound and video playback.

(3) If virtual machines are behind a RHEV/oVirt proxy, you may need to connect to them with Opaque by using a .vv file. To get a .vv file, you have to login through the oVirt/RHEV web interface and connect to your VM's console there. Chrome works perfectly with the web interface, and opens Opaque directly. With Firefox, you have to open a File Manager, and tap the file in the Downloads folder as soon as the download completes. The built-in Android Browser does not work for .vv downloading.
* System administrators: If you are planning to recommend this app, please ensure you have determined the simplest method of access for your environment.
* Users: If you're unsure, please ask your System Administrator!

(4) The oVirt web "User Portal" for oVirt v3.4 and older does not allow obtaining .vv files for virtual machines. 

(5) Direct connections to Proxmox VMs are now fully supported. Select Proxmox from the Virtualization Environment drop-down when adding a connection (tap the "+" at the main screen).

Current features include:
- Full Proxmox and oVirt/RHEV integration.
- TFA / OTP Two factor authentication with Proxmox (Yubikey, Google Authenticator, etc.)
- Android 4.x and earlier: USB redirection with OTG enabled devices. Connect your OTG cable prior to connecting to your VM. For some Android 4.x and Android 5.0 and later, your device must be rooted and you have to use "SELinux Mode Changer" (from Google Play) to set selinux to permissive mode.
- Audio playback/recording
- Supports both Proxmox and oVirt/RHEV virt-viewer/remote-viewer (.vv) files
- Ability to edit default settings for .vv file connections or to make creation of new connections more convenient (on the main app page, tap the wrench at the top-right corner or look in the menu on older devices).
- SSL encryption for peace of mind
- Commercially signed and self-signed certificates  
- SPICE protocol support
- Automatic rotation
- Desktop resizing to match display resolution
- Pinch-zoom
- Multi-touch UI with four mouse input modes to choose from
- Mouse scrolling by swiping with two fingers up/down
- Single-handed mode for easy on-the-go operation
- Support for most bluetooth input devices.

Planned features:
- Allocating VMs from a pool
- Clipboard integration
- VNC protocol support

Opaque source code is GPLv3 licensed, and is available here:
https://github.com/iiordanov/remote-desktop-clients

It also uses a number of open-source libraries included in the Gstreamer SDK for Android, as well as libcelt, openssl, libgovirt, jpeg-turbo, and librest.

- Ability to edit default settings for .vv file connections or to make creation of new connections more convenient (on the main app page, tap the wrench at the top-right corner or look in the menu on older devices).
- SSL encryption for peace of mind
- Commercially signed and self-signed certificates
- SPICE protocol support
- Automatic rotation
- Desktop resizing to match display resolution
- Pinch-zoom
- Multi-touch UI with four mouse input modes to choose from
- Mouse scrolling by swiping with two fingers up/down
- Single-handed mode for easy on-the-go operation
- Support for most bluetooth input devices.

Planned features:
- Allocating VMs from a pool
- Clipboard integration
- VNC protocol support

Opaque source code is GPLv3 licensed, and is available here:
https://github.com/iiordanov/remote-desktop-clients

It also uses a number of open-source libraries included in the Gstreamer SDK for Android, as well as libcelt, openssl, libgovirt, jpeg-turbo, and librest.
summary: An oVirt, RHEV, and Proxmox client that connects to your VMs' graphics console.
comments: Pretty good -- importantly it works to open oVirt vv connections. Running on Chromebook. Would be improved with: copy and paste sync, Alt-Tab capture when full screen, and scrolling down has a strange effect of scrolling the whole view window on the screen rather than scrolling the window within the Spice view. Possible some of these bugs are specific to the Chromebook experience. Keep up the good work.

great program, but no mouse click or special button input is possible. I would appreciate some support with this issue. Edit: Support was provided quickly and effectively. The error was ultimately related to my VM monitor resolution and not this app. I strongly recommend both the app and the developer.

It does not work properly with the .vv files downloaded from proxmox web ui, as when it opens the .vv file the connectionto vm is done but in my tablet then all it is shown is a white background with only the mouse pointer around there.
Its slow, 32bit color, no way to switch, even when lowered resolution still was slow. Tried win10, debian, ubuntu on latest proxmox, all were slow. Why sell this when its not usable?
Required to use SPICE with the official Proxmox mobile app, but doesn't work, just shows an error message. Nice. Refunded the purchase.

title: Pool Chem Dose Calculator
description:
Pool Chem Dose Calculator will calculate the exact chemical dose needed for 38 chemicals in 11 categories for any size pool in US Imperial or Metric measures. To use it you enter the pool volume in gallons or liters, choose US Imperial or Metric, select which item you want to change from the drop down list and then enter the desired change in ppm or mg/l. Pool Chem Dose Calculator then lists all of the chemicals that can be used for that item change and the doses for each one. It only shows 3 chemicals on the screen. If there are more than 3 for an item, you can scroll down the list.

No brand names, no sales just the exact dose of the chemical you want to use by chemical name. Use it while you are at a pool or in the field to find out how much chemical to add to make a correction or increase or decrease a condition.

Select from the following items: 

Increase Chlorine, 15 chemicals Increase Bromine 2 chemicals
Increase Alkalinity 3 chemicals Decrease Alkalinity 2 chemicals
Increase Hardness 2 chemicals Increase CYA 2 chemicals
Increase Oxidizer 1 chemical Decrease Chlorine 6 chemicals
Increase Salt 1 chemical Increase Borate 3 chemicals
Increase Copper 1 chemical.

For example, if you want to Increase Chlorine by 3 ppm in a 14,750 gallon pool, enter 14750, select US Imperial, select Increase Chlorine from the drop down menu and enter 3.0 in ppm. Instantly see the amounts needed to get 3.0 ppm chlorine in that pool for 15 types of chlorine. Makes it easy to compare and see which might be cheaper to use or make a substitution. 

You can also use the Pool Chem Dose Calculator to figure out the change to a water condition if you add an amount of chemical. For instance suppose you have a 15,000 gallon pool and you want to know how much the free chlorine will increase if you add a gallon of 10% liquid chlorine. No problem, just enter the pool volume, select US Imperial, select Increase Chlorine and then enter an amount for ppm. Keep changing the ppm up or down until the dose amount for Chlorine 10% gets near 128 fl oz or 4 qts.

Saves money because you get the exact dose for that pool ‚Äì no more guessing. Have an emergency where too much chlorine was added and now you need to neutralize the chlorine in the pool? No problem, Just enter the pool volume, US or Metric, select Decrease Chlorine and enter the amount of chlorine you want neutralized and you get the amounts needed for 6 chlorine neutralizers. You will find this app invaluable.

Works amazing

title: Disk & Storage Analyzer [PRO]
description:
DISK & STORAGE ANALYZER [PRO] displays information on sdcard, usb devices, external and internal storage in a simple and clear graphical form (infographics). NO ADS, NO VIRUSES.

‚ñ†  It's the MOST ADVANCED and INTERACTIVE DISK SPACE VISUALIZATION on Google Play. 
‚ñ†  ‚ÄúFinds lost cache files. It helps me to free up disk space by quickly finding and deleting big files.‚Äù
‚ñ†  ‚ÄúThis application is an essential addition to any file browser. it is very simple and convenient tool to search for files by size.‚Äù

‚óè VISUALIZATION
Folders and Files are represented as a Sunburst chart and sorted by their size.
–°entral chart sector is a current directory. Its represented by a circle. The rest of the sector is the subfolders and files. Click on the sector and we go deeper. Application draws nested levels with a head of previously selected sector.

Disk & Storage Analyzer [PRO] displays mount points as a pie chart with a free and available space and the distribution of files by category (documents, images, videos, music, etc.) and extensions (for example, the distribution of the Music has subcategory mp3, wma, ogg, etc.)
Data on available storages taken from mount points of the vold.fstab file.

‚óè STRONG SEARCH CAPABILITIES
All contents of the device is indexed at run. Full drive search can be done in a second. Founded files are displayed on the Quick Search page after entering a search query.

‚óè FINDING BIG FILES EASILY
Global Top Ten largest files mode is available. Using this application you can easily clean up device and free a lot of space.

‚óè INTUITIVE USER INTERFACE
User-friendly interface allows you quickly switch between modes and pages. Like Google Play application My Device Storage Analyser uses view pager.

Context Action Mode is now available for selected sectors (only for Anroid API 3.0 and higher). It's very simple to select files and perform operations on it.

You have the following pages in the application:

‚óè FILE CATEGORIES. All files in internal and external storage, SD card or USB device are presented in a structured way:
   By category (documents, videos, music, etc.)
   By file size (large, large, medium, etc.).
   By file date (today and yesterday, earlier this week, last week, earlier this month and etc)

‚óè MY STORAGES page displays the summary statistics for available storage.

‚óè DRIVE USAGE Sunburst is an Intuitive and effective way to display the data on the device. Simply drill-in and you will discover inner data universe.

‚óè TOP 10 Files mode shows you where all the free space on the device has disappeared

‚óè QUICK SEARCH mode shows the result of search or a content of a chosen category.

Clicking on the file shows context menu with a open or delete the document, discover its properties.

Long click on the category or extension will put contained files to the Quick Search page.

# The application is OPTIMIZED for phones (2.1) and tablets (3.0 and above). 

# Application is still in development, so there may be unexpected force closes. Better FEEDBACK than low rating. Thank you!

Try free version DISK & STORAGE ANALYZER first.

One drawback is the app choice to delete cache for non-system apps doesn't work on my Android phone. I have to go manually delete them. Still, grateful for such a useful app I gladly give it 5 stars.

title: Remote Ripple PRO (TightVNC)
description:
Fast remote desktop client from the developers of TightVNC. It allows you to access, view and control your PC, Mac and Unix systems remotely. As compared to competing VNC viewers, Remote Ripple offers:

‚úì Clean and simple user interface
‚úì Fast operation even on slow connections
‚úì Smooth desktop scaling
‚úì Low memory footprint
‚úì Ultra low-bandwidth mode in the PRO version
‚úì Perfect mouse emulation via a unique ‚Äúmouse tool‚Äù (try it out!)


It works via Wi-Fi, 3G, 4G/LTE networks and connects straightly to your remote machines. It does not use intermediate servers and does not route your data to third-party services. While direct connections via Internet may require some configuration, they guarantee best performance and independence from online services.


How it can help you

From time to time, many of us need to access our ‚Äúbig computers‚Äù and use some ‚Äúbig software‚Äù installed on it. Remote Ripple allows you to do your work remotely. Also, you can:

‚úì Monitor what's happening on your computers while you're away (use View-only mode to prevent from interfering with the desktop).
‚úì Provide remote support to your friends and family. Assist in installing software, fix problems and demonstrate how to set up things.
‚úì Administer servers, workstations and virtual machines remotely.
‚úì Control your home computers while laying in a lounge chair. For example, you can use Remote Ripple as a remote control for your music or video player running on a PC.
‚úì Copy a file forgotten on a remote host (while Remote Ripple does not support direct file transfers, it can help in transferring files with other services like Dropbox or Google Drive).


Install Remote Ripple, and find your own use cases!


Getting started

To connect with Remote Ripple, make sure your target computer runs a sort of VNC server.


‚úì If the target PC runs Windows, install a VNC server on it. We strongly recommend TightVNC as it provides best performance and compatibility with Remote Ripple. You can download your free copy of TightVNC on its Web site ‚Äî http://www.tightvnc.com/


‚úì Mac OS X systems already have a VNC server included. It's a part of Apple Remote Desktop service. To enable it, go to System Preferences, choose Sharing, enable Remote Management, press Computer Settings, check ‚ÄúVNC viewers may control screen with password‚Äù and enter the password you will use when connecting.


‚úì Most Linux distributions include a number of VNC servers as well. Just install a VNC server from your package collection, and type something like vncserver or tightvncserver (or whatever command starts that particular VNC server). Typically, it will offer you to enter new VNC password and will start sharing your desktop (or create new virtual desktop for you).


‚úì Virtualization systems (such as VMware and QEMU) often include built-in VNC servers, although they may not be enabled by default.


Get news and support

‚úì App page at Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/RemoteRipple (press Like to see updates in your news feed)
‚úì Remote Ripple on Twitter: https://twitter.com/RemoteRipple (press Follow to get updates)


Like Remote Ripple? Rate and review it on Google Play!

Also, we will appreciate if you review Remote Ripple in your blog, social networks, other Web sites or forums. Send us links to your reviews!


Thank you!

But it refuses to install on my phone, and since i uninstalled the other one, i now don't have access to it on my phone any longer. Hilp?
