(27/11/2020) Is there any news on when a fix is coming? (31/04/2021) Function key issue fixed! thanks! rating upgraded: this app is perfect :-) (04/07/2021)

Works real nice, better than the alternatives. What I'm missing is ability to offset where the screen starts. My phone has rounded corners and I'd like center and fix the view instead of starting from the top left corner.
Really good! I have a media server and sometimes i need to access it even when i don't have a computer nearby. This allows me to do simple server maintenance with my phone or tablet and i love it.

Pretty good app but I can't seem to install it on more than one device. If I try, Google Play says "error you already own this application". How can I do this? UPDATE: After contacting the developer and getting a very quick response, this now works. Very pleased with the app.

title: LightSpectrumPro EVO
description:
With LightSpectrumPro EVO you can measure the color temperature of a light source without having to spend hundreds of dollars on professional devices. LightSpectrumPro EVO has an error of 2 - 8% compared to existing professional products on the market. in addition to the color temperature measurement in Kelvin, LightSpectrumPro EVO allows you to view the color spectrum of the light being examined with a band ranging from 360nm to 800nm. in addition to the spectrum it is possible to display the position of the white point on the CIE 1931 diagram and to apply a filter for wavelengths to display in overlay on the image captured by the cameras which elements reflect a specific frequency and with what intensity.

** ATTENTION!! ** 
This application requires high-performance hardware, do not install it  on dated or less powerful devices, the result will be a very poor performance. 
We recommend using multicore devices, with at least 2 or more gigabytes of RAM.

Risultati della traduzione
Added the value of the PAR PPFD flux of photosynthetic radiation in umol/m2/s
Minor bugs fixed
comments: Pretty cool app, with limitations... If the developer could add the ability to select different segments on the delta rendering mode while avoiding others this would help a ton! Also the UI is horrible when trying to go from feature to feature, overlapping the ones you wanted and the like, please fix; or if willing to discuss it respond to this and we can have a discussion; this is a great app for what it does do. Also if you could support 3rd party hardware like a thermal infared camera! <3

I wasted $3.00 on this app, tried it twice, and then realized that there is absolutely no way a light spectrum analyzer can work with only a digital camera. You have to have something to split the spectrum like a diffraction grating or prism in order to actually to spectrum analysis. The camera has an RGB sensor just like your eye. So, let's say there is yellow at 580nm wavelight. Then there is a mix of red 650nm and green 550nm. To the RGB sensor and your eye, they look THE SAME. So, the sensor has no way to tell if it is receiving yellow light or a mix of green and red. It CANNOT work.

Does what it says, and gives consistent measurements. Can't say anything about accuracy though, as I don't have any other meters to compare it to. There are a few UI/UX issues- can't back out of screenshots; can't delete screenshots; menu is hardly intuitive (maybe is more understandable for pros? Idk.); would not measure on first run; photo metadata is movable, but if you leave it at the bottom of the screen, you can't see it in the screenshots; seems to limit how many screenshots you get.

Just got it nice simple app only took a few minutes to figure it out. The only problem I encountered is exiting the app there is no easy way to shut it down. And if you go to the scan history window I get trapped in it with no way to exit other than clicking on one of the and then loading that picture then backing out on that menu with two back clicks. For some reason the app shut down the menu arrows on my phone. Annoying but it is still a good app

Is there a way to disable the sounds? I could not find any setting for that. I hear a click on every press of a button, even if the phone is set on mute. Also, sometimes the app stops computing in realtime and freezes all the numerical values, even though the scenery is changing. A restart is therefore required. Otherwise it's a pretty good app.

‚Ä¢ Three Phase 120/208V (black, red, blue)
‚Ä¢ Three Phase 277/480V (brown, orange, yellow)

This app is great for wire pulls.

title: Bills Reminder 2.0
description:
Keep getting those nasty late payment fees? Download this mobile bill organizer into your Android smartphone now and get daily reminders to pay your bills on time every time! No more easy money for the banks!
 
Simply key in your payment amount and due date and this bill tracker app will notify you in advance when your bill payment is coming due. With this handy mobile payment tracker with you at all times, now you don't have to worry about forgetting to pay your bills while you go about your busy schedule! 
 
How Bills Reminder works:

-Enter your bill payment amount and the due date via an intuitive user interface.

-By default, Bills Reminder will start to remind you of the payment 5 days before the due date. The number of days in advance can be customized for each bill but the default is set to 5 days. (You can change the default setting as well)

-Bill Reminders will fire off reminder notifications every day at a preset time (default is 8:00am) until you have paid your bill. Your device LED will also flash a distinct orange color to indicate that a bill payment is coming due.

-Unlike other bill tracking apps, Bills Reminders will always fire off when the bill payment is coming due, no matter whether you have opened the app or not or whether you have rebooted your device.

-You can also setup recurring bill reminders. The repeating period is extremely flexible, you can set bill reminders to repeat every X days,weeks,months or year. (Eg. every 2 weeks, every 6 days, every 1 month etc.)

-You can also capture or attach photos of bills, invoices, receipts alongside each bill reminder you created. This is helpful when it comes to actually making the payment. All the information is already stored in the app, so there is no need to go and find that paper bill statement.

-Paid Bills/Invoices/receipts can be kept for future reference

With all those late fees saved, this bill tracking app will pay for itself in no time! 

This app is brought to you by Handy Apps! 

Connect with us on Facebook at:  https://www.facebook.com/HandyAppsInc
descriptionHTML:
Keep getting those nasty late payment fees? Download this mobile bill organizer into your Android smartphone now and get daily reminders to pay your bills on time every time! No more easy money for the banks!

Simply key in your payment amount and due date and this bill tracker app will notify you in advance when your bill payment is coming due. With this handy mobile payment tracker with you at all times, now you don't have to worry about forgetting to pay your bills while you go about your busy schedule!

How Bills Reminder works:

-Enter your bill payment amount and the due date via an intuitive user interface.

-By default, Bills Reminder will start to remind you of the payment 5 days before the due date. The number of days in advance can be customized for each bill but the default is set to 5 days. (You can change the default setting as well)

-Bill Reminders will fire off reminder notifications every day at a preset time (default is 8:00am) until you have paid your bill. Your device LED will also flash a distinct orange color to indicate that a bill payment is coming due.

-Unlike other bill tracking apps, Bills Reminders will always fire off when the bill payment is coming due, no matter whether you have opened the app or not or whether you have rebooted your device.

-You can also setup recurring bill reminders. The repeating period is extremely flexible, you can set bill reminders to repeat every X days,weeks,months or year. (Eg. every 2 weeks, every 6 days, every 1 month etc.)

-You can also capture or attach photos of bills, invoices, receipts alongside each bill reminder you created. This is helpful when it comes to actually making the payment. All the information is already stored in the app, so there is no need to go and find that paper bill statement.

-Paid Bills/Invoices/receipts can be kept for future reference

With all those late fees saved, this bill tracking app will pay for itself in no time!

This app is brought to you by Handy Apps!

Connect with us on Facebook at: https://www.facebook.com/HandyAppsInc
summary: Download Bills Reminder now and never pay late fees again!

If you have any feedback to share, do email us at support@handyappsforlife.com
comments: Like the app so decided to upgrade. But you can only backup your data on the same phone. Get a new device have to pay for the upgrade over again. Doesn't upload any are previous data onto a new device

I guess that the only things that would make this app much more appreciative, would be to sync with calendars and if it was able to synchronize with itself on multiple devices. I hate having to load the same information on both my tablet and phone, it sucks. Other than those two issues, I love the app. It keeps me from overspending and let's me know what I'm working with.

Have the free version. Decided to upgrade to the paid version to make backups. It's basically a different app that makes your reenter all the info, if you go into the free app and try to do a backup after purchasing it acts like your haven't upgraded. There's a better way to do that to where you don't have to deal with a separate app and forced to enter all your info. Got refund and will find a different app to use

It's an okay app but not worth ‚Ç¨4... I downloaded and paid for this app only to realise that there was another app that did the same thing but with a much better UI that didn't cost anything... I would have much preferred to have paid for that app as it's worth it more than this one... this is the problem with these app stores... there are a lot of mediocre or poor apps that you are expected to pay for that just aren't worth the cost especially when there are other apps that are better and free
Excellent and easy to use and keep on track of bills efficiently

title: SMS MMS to Email
description:
Select one of your SMS conversations or one of your MMS attachments and send it via email to your email account or to any other email account. The app does not support automatic forwarding of SMS or MMS to an email. The forwarding to an email account must be performed manually.

you may filter the text messages to send using the from/to dates feature. you need to specify the from/to dates using the format mm/dd/yyyy or dd/mm/yyyy. if your keyboard does not have the slash key you will have to try with a different keyboard.

developerAddress:
106A Fox Lane
Palmers Green
LONDON, UK N13 4AH
United Kingdom
recentChanges: new app icon
comments: It used to work great. Now it does nothing. What I found was that it copied the text messages and put them into a text instead an email. I have the paid version.  REPLY to DEVELOPER. Sorry. My bad. When it asked me to select the app to use I thought it meant the text app. It was asking for the email app to use to send the texts. I have now fixed that and it worked perfectly. I have changed my rating back to 5 stars. Thanks.

I have tried numerous times to send a couple threads of texts that are high up in numbers with no success. Ive raised and lowered max text messages per email. It goes through and portions it out like it's going to go. Then it stops and the pop up information box goes away. Also, I started to look through the emails I'm sending to myself and some of them are only one side of the conversation. I had looked at earlier ones and they were fine, so i guessed that the later ones would be too. My bad.
This app is simple to use and works very well to send SMS text messages to any email address. It does not work to select MMS messages to send to email.
The app did not transfer my text to email which was vital for me!!

I am often sending texts to more than one person at a time, particularly 2-3 people at a time. When I go to choose SMS, the threads sent to more than one person does not show up! Those threads don't even show up by one of the individuals sent to. Not sure why, but also would be nice to be able to choose the text by date sent to combat this problem..... Right now I have to send to one person and copy the text and send to each person individually.

title: UltraCal
description:
Mandina's Inspection Services introduces UltraCal on android:

UltraCal is a NDT calculator that consists of 12 popular formulas used in industrial Ultrasonic Inspection. This app's formulas are perfect for personal use and for those taking upcoming inspection examinations. One can make their own test questions and check the answers using UltraCal (velocities are in metric and US standard).

You will be able to calculate:
1) Wavelength
2) Near Field
3) Half Beam Spread
4) Amplitude Comparison
5) Acoustic Impedance
6) Percent Reflection
7) Depth Calculator (sound path)
8) Snell's Law
9) Angle Beam Set Up
10) Angle Beam Flaw Location
11) AWS Indication Rating
12) TOFD PCS

Doesn't work

- Checklists
- Durable checklists

- Encryption (password protection)

* Fix for alarm sound with Android KitKat

* Should fix reminder and sticky issues after reboot on some devices, please tap on the OPEN button in play store once!
comments: I have loved Note Everything Pro for years now, and am happy to report that those who have "lost" the free base version can actually obtain it from the developer's website, as it still resides there. I do hope that they might pick up the torch again, but the original free version with the Pro add-on works perfectly well for me under Android 11. It is bit of a trick, though, trying to figure out where your existing version has been putting backups, or will put backups to ZIP files if you make one. I had originally set mine up to go to my microSD card, but eventually Android blocked that so Note Everything set up a noteeverything/backup folder on internal storage. I was able to snag my most recent backup from there, carry it over to my new device, and place it in internal storage under the noteeverything/backup folder there, then use the backup/restore function to get all of my notes back. I'll keep using this wonderful app for as long as Android itself allows me to. But you still can use it, you just have to snag the Note Everything base app, which the Pro add-on requires, from the developer's website, since it has not been updated recently enough to comply with the Google Play Store requirements (which are a good thing, but painful when this sort of "disappearance" occurs).

I've had this app for many years and have loved it. It has changed over to many new phones. I had to buy a new phone and in the process of changing things over, I lost years of notes, and I had originally bought the upgraded version of this app. No one from this app, will contact me to help me reload, and it tells me that I have to download so many things that do not help. Because of their costumer service I wish I could give it a negative rating. I need my notes, and there's no one to help.
Was good app, but unsupported for about 8 years now, and getting buggy with later OS versions.
No other note app comes close. And I've tried most. Feature rich without bloatware. I just wish it was still available.

I loved the app, especially the durable checklist. I've been using the app since probably 2012. But the backup feature does not work so everytime I get a new phone I have to manually transfer the information. That's assuming I had access to the old phone. Seeing its been 2.5 years since the last update I can't bring myself to keep using it if I'm going to invariably lose everything again.

title: Handy Scanner Pro: PDF Creator
description:
Handy Scanner Pro turns your phone or tablet into a powerful document scanner. Say goodbye the piles of paper that follow you around. You can scan multipage documents, whiteboards, business cards and so much more. The post-processing filters give you the greatest quality with the lowest background noise.

Then, just share them to GMail, Dropbox or any other application. Better yet, use instant uploading to Dropbox! Produces both PDF and JPEG images!

‚òÖ Handy Scanner is both easy to use and efficient. We're still amazed of its performance
AndroidZoom.com
‚òÖ Handy Scanner Makes Scanning Documents With Your Camera Fun Again 
androidpolice.com
‚òÖ Handy Scanner, it straightens and fixes perspectives, enhances readability, makes multi-page documents easy, and pushes PDFs quickly to wherever you'd like.
lifehacker.com

‚òÖ Scan Documents
¬ª Take several pictures in a row (batch scan) with our custom camera.
¬ª Automatic document bounds detection
¬ª Improve readability with our filters (print-ready, enhance colors/contrast,...)
¬ª Export documents to PDF or JPEG format (to Dropbox, Box, Gmail, GDocs, ‚Ä¶)
¬ª OCR your documents by sharing to the Google Docs application and selecting ‚ÄúConvert to Google Doc‚Äù

‚òÖ Manage
¬ª Search your documents
¬ª Post-process documents again

‚òÖ Why you should get Handy Scanner Pro

¬ª Unlimited camera shots in a row (3 in the free version)
¬ª Access the highest quality results (low and medium quality available for free users)
¬ª Fine-tune your images by settings contrast/brightness
¬ª Remove all watermarks from PDF files
¬ª Remove advertisements
¬ª To help us keeping this amazing app alive and kicking.

‚òÖ Notes
¬ª Unfortunately Google Play won't allow us to reply to individual comments. If you experience problems, please contact us using the e-mail address below.

title: Business Calendar Pro
description:
Business Calendar Pro has everything you need in a calendar app: It provides an excellent overview of your appointments, it‚Äôs easy to use and it gives you powerful tools to create and manipulate your events.

‚òÖ "Our favorite calendar app on Android, due to its flexibility and ease of use." - Lifehacker 01/2014 ‚òÖ
‚òÖ "One of the best Calendar Apps for 2014" - FastCompany ‚òÖ

Features
‚ñ™ Quick Day View: for a fast overview of all events of the day
‚ñ™ Favorite Bar: for direct access to all your calendars
‚ñ™ smooth scroll and zoom: for better, intuitive interaction

Customization down to the last detail
‚ñ™ adapt all views & widgets to your liking
‚ñ™ individual reminders with vibration, sounds, repetitions, intervals, LED
‚ñ™ adjustable font sizes for the app & widgets

Details
‚ñ™ month, week, day, agenda and event view
‚ñ™ color-coded year view
‚ñ™ scroll- and zoomable multi-day view (1-14 days)
‚ñ™ easy switching between timeline bars and event titles in month view
‚ñ™ search function
‚ñ™ sync your events with Google Calendar, Microsoft Outlook, Exchange etc. using the Android calendar synchronization
‚ñ™ professional widgets for month, week, agenda and day view
‚ñ™ intuitive handling: just move your finger over some days of interest in month view to open them in multi-day view
‚ñ™ many options for recurrent events (e.g. an event that takes place every other week on Tuesday and Thursday)
‚ñ™ birthday calendar
‚ñ™ context-sensitive help system to optimize your workflow¬†

Additional features in this pro version
‚ñ™ manage contacts: link contacts to your events
‚ñ™ customizable templates: create your own templates for new events
‚ñ™ multi-selection: delete, move or copy multiple events at once
‚ñ™ drag&drop: move and copy events easily in the multi-day view
‚ñ™ tasks add-on: use the integrated task-management tool to sync with Google Tasks & Toodledo
‚ñ™ notifications: comprehensive reminder functionality
‚ñ™ app theming: light and dark theme for the app
‚ñ™ advanced widgets: set colors, font sizes and individual calendars
‚ñ™ import & export: quickly import or export all your calendars in .ics format

We also offer a free, ad-supported version of Business Calendar, which we kindly advise you to test for the functionality and the general workflow of the app! We hope that in the long term the pro version result as indispensable for you if you use your mobile calendar regularly.

recentChanges:

comments: App locks up and freezes all the time lately. I am forced to WAIT till it responds. Sometimes it doesn't respond at all. Or i have to close the app and try again. This doesn't always work however. The only thing that does work is when I completely shut down and then restart. Very disappointing as I have used this app for years with no problems until now. I am going to totally delete the app and then try a reinstall. I'll let you know.

I love this app! Have used it for years. I like the layout better than Google calendar for being able to see all my events on my phone screen at a glance. It syncs well with Google. When i got a new phone and had trouble reinstalling the paid version of it, the developer replied to my message and helped me sort it out. It's great! üòÄ

It would be nice if I could assign a color code to any event, not just "all day" events. As it is, enter the time (eg, 14:30) before the title (Drs Appt). Next check [‚àö] the "all day box" and assign a color to it (eg, Dr Appts are RED, Critical calls DARK BLUE, Deposits GOLD, Budgeted Expense GREEN, etc). It would also be an improvement to link "LOCATION" to my contact list, in addition to the current list of frequent locations. Ditto for ATTENDEES link to my contacts.

Was favorite calendar for years. Able to color code multiple household members accounts and turn visibility on/off as needed. So helpful when organizing a family and work with lots of appoimtments. Sadly all the Business Calendar Apps have been crashing for over a week and not allowing pictures to be attached. I've been getting frustrated w free and Pro versions of BC & BC2 :(

Reluctantly, I have to stop using it as I just incurred a financial penalty for missing an appt. BC Pro doesn't always display events that are in the native calendar. I thought it was Outlook until I switched to Google and had the same problem. I loved this app until I discovered how unreliable it was.

title: KeePassDX Pro
description:
Multi-format KeePass password manager, the app allows saving and using passwords, keys and digital identities in a secure way, by integrating the Android design standards.

This pro version encourages development, better service, and you contribute to the creation of open source softwares without advertising.
Currently, the application has the same features as the free version with the themes unlocked but is intended to integrate elements related to non-free sites and services commonly used.

Features
 - Create database files / entries and groups.
 - Support for .kdb and .kdbx files (version 1 to 4) with AES - Twofish - ChaCha20 - Argon2 algorithm.
 - Compatible with the majority of alternative programs (KeePass, KeePassX, KeePassXC, ‚Ä¶).
 - Allows opening and copying URI / URL fields quickly.
 - Biometric recognition for fast unlocking (fingerprint / face unlock / ‚Ä¶).
 - One-time password management (HOTP / TOTP) for two-factor authentication (2FA).
 - Material design with themes.
 - Auto-Fill and integration.
 - Field filling keyboard.
 - History of each entry.
 - Precise management of settings.
 - Code written in native languages (Kotlin / Java / JNI / C).

Pro Features
 - Access to custom themes.
 - TOTP Steam creation.
 - Deleting donation buttons.

KeePassDX Pro is open source and ad-free.

The project is constantly evolving. Do not hesitate to check the development status of the next updates: https://github.com/Kunzisoft/KeePassDX/projects

Send issues to: https://github.com/Kunzisoft/KeePassDX/issues

comments: Miles ahead of the competition. Has a clean interface, easy to navigate, customizable themes, and it just works. I have tried the rest and just wish I had found this sooner. Dev is competent, active and responsive. Not much more you could ask for. Well worth the admission fee.
Indeed the best experience I have had using keepass DBs on Android. The free edition includes everything you will need, but contributing to such a fantastic product is a no-brainer.
Works great. Imported my keepassxc database from my laptop without a fuss. And is open-source. One of the best purchases I made in Google Play
Used the free version long enough to know supporting it by purchasing the pro version is worth it. Fantastic app, clean design...I love it, please don't let this fall apart the way other apps do.
Great so far. However I cannot see the tags that I have in the database when I open the DB using this app. Is there any way tags are accessible in this android app?

title: PreppersTool
description:
PreppersTool - by preppers for preppers

Prepper is derived from the English word prepare and refers to people who prepare themselves for potential crises.
These preparations include stockpiling emergency supplies (food, drinks, medicine and other essentials), but also planning for escaping (bug-out), alternative communication routes (radio) and learning basic survival techniques play a central role in prepping. Which scenarios you want to prepare for (forces of nature or man-made) is rather secondary - the focus is on independence from modern infrastructure, without which our everyday life is no longer possible.


This app allows you to comprehensively manage emergency supplies
With the categories Food, Water, Tools and Other and their specific subcategories, your entire inventory can be typified. In addition to your home stockpile, you can also create as many inventories as you like for your escape vehicles, backpacks and camps.
Items in all inventories with a low shelf life are prioritised and trigger cyclical notifications so that they can be used and replaced in time. Based on all stored supplies, the system calculates how long your supply of food and drink should last in an emergency.


Your surroundings can be better assessed with a map
Create various POIs (points of interest) with relevance in the event of a crisis. Where can you find drinking water, food, medical supplies or military bases? In some scenarios, this knowledge is extremely valuable to better handle problems at your location.


Staying in contact is extremely important, especially in a crisis
For this purpose, agreements can be made in text form or meeting points can be created on the map (where do you leave messages, at what time do you expect messages from each other). In order to be able to communicate with each other over longer distances, only communication by radio is usually possible without a power supply. Radio agreements can be saved, in which all relevant information for radio communication is stored.


Export of all relevant information as PDF
Everything that has been entered in the app, including results on demand coverage, can be exported as a tabular PDF, which can then be displayed, sent or printed directly with other apps.


Internationalised and customisable
Currently, the app is available in English and German and supports the Metric and US Imperial System for units to define volume, mass, distance and more. Daily requirements for food, drinking water and utility water, as well as options for notifications, can be configured as desired.


The PreppersTool is under constant development
We have several years of experience as hobby preppers and welcome any exchange with others who are involved in prepping. We have already received many suggestions for new functions and are working on their implementation. This way, we can keep improving our tool and, over time, provide more comprehensive help for prepping - all in one app.


Contact for problems, questions and more
We are happy about every message via Telegram (https://t.me/meckyd) or Mail (info@prepperstool.de)!
descriptionHTML:
PreppersTool - by preppers for preppers

Prepper is derived from the English word prepare and refers to people who prepare themselves for potential crises.
These preparations include stockpiling emergency supplies (food, drinks, medicine and other essentials), but also planning for escaping (bug-out), alternative communication routes (radio) and learning basic survival techniques play a central role in prepping. Which scenarios you want to prepare for (forces of nature or man-made) is rather secondary - the focus is on independence from modern infrastructure, without which our everyday life is no longer possible.


This app allows you to comprehensively manage emergency supplies
With the categories Food, Water, Tools and Other and their specific subcategories, your entire inventory can be typified. In addition to your home stockpile, you can also create as many inventories as you like for your escape vehicles, backpacks and camps.
Items in all inventories with a low shelf life are prioritised and trigger cyclical notifications so that they can be used and replaced in time. Based on all stored supplies, the system calculates how long your supply of food and drink should last in an emergency.


Your surroundings can be better assessed with a map
Create various POIs (points of interest) with relevance in the event of a crisis. Where can you find drinking water, food, medical supplies or military bases? In some scenarios, this knowledge is extremely valuable to better handle problems at your location.


Staying in contact is extremely important, especially in a crisis
For this purpose, agreements can be made in text form or meeting points can be created on the map (where do you leave messages, at what time do you expect messages from each other). In order to be able to communicate with each other over longer distances, only communication by radio is usually possible without a power supply. Radio agreements can be saved, in which all relevant information for radio communication is stored.


Export of all relevant information as PDF
Everything that has been entered in the app, including results on demand coverage, can be exported as a tabular PDF, which can then be displayed, sent or printed directly with other apps.


Internationalised and customisable
Currently, the app is available in English and German and supports the Metric and US Imperial System for units to define volume, mass, distance and more. Daily requirements for food, drinking water and utility water, as well as options for notifications, can be configured as desired.


The PreppersTool is under constant development
We have several years of experience as hobby preppers and welcome any exchange with others who are involved in prepping. We have already received many suggestions for new functions and are working on their implementation. This way, we can keep improving our tool and, over time, provide more comprehensive help for prepping - all in one app.


Contact for problems, questions and more
We are happy about every message via Telegram (https://t.me/meckyd) or Mail (info@prepperstool.de)!
summary: Manage all your crisis prevention preparations - make prepping easy.
recentChanges:
- Support of decimal numbers for weight, volume and energy: Input dialogues and calculations of consumption adapted accordingly.
- Location averaging improved

title: YouBlue Pro - Smart Bluetooth Auto
description:
New in latest version::
    Choose which devices to react to (starting app on Bluetooth connect)

    Added Widget used to toggle service
    Added "Start ANY app" on Bluetooth connect
    Added ability to run in foreground which makes it less likely the operating system will shut down the service.
    Added ability to start YouBlue on boot.
    Optimized UI
    Multi-Language Support


HIGHLIGHTS (details lower in page)::
Action -> Reaction
Lost connection to Wifi -> Turn on Bluetooth, check for devices
Connected to Wifi -> Turn off Bluetooth (after delay)
Connected to Bluetooth -> Start an app of your choosing (see settings, select devices)
Disconnected from Bluetooth -> Turn off Bluetooth, then attempt reconnect after some time


***WANT TO TEST IT?*** (if you're connected to wifi)
-if you want a music app to start on Bluetooth connect, be sure to go to settings and select the desired app
-it assumes you're disconnected from wifi at startup, so turn on Bluetooth manually before starting the service to see it turn it off after a few seconds
-you can also disable wifi after starting the service to simulate a disconnect from wifi.  It will turn on Bluetooth.
   
This is a very simple app which uses some logic to determine when/if your Bluetooth adapter needs to be on (Smart Bluetooth Control). If your car supports Bluetooth but you don't make use of it because you don't remember to turn it on, or if you leave Bluetooth on all the time but want to save battery, this app is for you.

It's a service which runs in the background and can be toggled on/off in app or via the widget. Once the service is started, it will keep running even if you close the app. To stop it, open the app and click the stop button or tap the widget.

DETAILS::
Algorithm: (Completely Customizable)
 -Wifi Detection-
    On wifi disconnect, Bluetooth is turned on for 20 seconds. If it connects, it's done. If it doesn't connect it will try again 6 more times in 2 minute increments. (In case your router is far from your car, apartment?)
    On wifi connect, Bluetooth is turned off
    -Bluetooth Detection-
    On Bluetooth connect, a desired music app will be started if configured from the settings menu.
    If you are connected to Bluetooth and that connection drops, the adapter is immediately turned off. A check is run every 2 minutes for the next 20 minutes, then every 5 minutes for the next fifty minutes. (maybe you stopped for gas, or for lunch, but no wifi to detect) Each check turns the adapter on for 20 seconds, then off if no connection occurs.



Current Version::
**** New in version 3.02****
-Updated UI
-Feedback and rating support
-Multi-Language Support
-Start and Stop buttons replaced by toggle button
-Quick link to Bluetooth pairing and settings menu added

**** New in version 1.4 ****
-Auto start music streaming app when Bluetooth connects
-Currently supports (some names abbreviated by request):
--Pandora
--Spotify
--iHeartradio
--SlackerRadio
--Milk Music
--Rhapsod-
--Goo--- Music
*YouBlue has NO ASSOCIATION with any of the above listed Apps. Users must have the desired App installed and configured for auto start to work properly. 

The Bluetooth¬Æ word mark and logos are registered trademarks owned by Bluetooth SIG, Inc. and any use of such marks by Kevin Ersoy is under license. Other trademarks and trade names are those of their respective owners

recentChanges: Fixed issue with the widget on Oreo+ devices.
comments: Great app, provides a lot of options for different needs, simple to use, developer is pretty quick responding to inquiries. Highly recommended.

**Edit** I reset the settings of the app after an uninstall and reinstall and it appears to be working as it should now. Completely useless. I simply need an app to launch YouTube Music when connected to my vehicle. This one appears to be incapable of doing that, even after I bought the paid "Pro" version.

I just started using this phone however so far this app exceeds the previous app. I am impressed. UPDATE:. i was having problems with the app - i contacted the developer and after several attempts we were able to rrsvr the problem. all is well!

I like listen to music when going to sleep so wanted something to start my Sleep timer app for my spotify (because Spotify does not have one built in.) most will just start player when bluetooth device connected but this will start any app. I do think should be way to set different bluetooth devices to open different apps.

The app has completely stopped working on a MotoG 6 phone and Android 8. It was working on a G4 and Android 7, but no more. Please fix. BTW, I know how to set and use the app as I was using it for long before changing the phones.

title: Braintoss
description:
Whenever you have a thought that you don't want to lose - speak, snap or scribble it into the Braintoss app and it will be sent to your inbox for later use.

‚Ä¢ Capture your To-do‚Äôs in one click
‚Ä¢ Empty your brain on the spot
‚Ä¢ Quickly capture when on the move
‚Ä¢ Voice memos easily captured
‚Ä¢ Capture inspiring slides, receipts or business cards

Braintoss  works with: Evernote, Trello, Todoist, Dropbox, Things, Microsoft To Do and other apps that allow input via email.

And if you have a Ford car with SYNC3 you can use Braintoss on the road.

If you enjoy using Braintoss, please leave us a nice review. We'd really appreciate it.

Happy braintossing :)

"Braintoss has changed my life‚Ä¶ I don't like it, I love it!" - Howard Stern on his daily SiriusXM show

"Just got best capture tool I've found for iPhone: braintoss.com. Smartly simple design by 10yr GTDer." - Awesome praise from GTD guru David Allen via Twitter.

"At last something I actually use to remember those ideas or suggested films and books. Two touches and it is in your inbox and you can happily forget. Happy forgetting is the best!" - by Robert R Johnson

"Too bad I can't take it with me under the shower, that's where I have my best epiphanies!" - by Marc-Jan van Laake

"Just got a tip about a great practical app from a friend. Braintoss. Handy app." - by Dutch TV personality Jack van Gelder via twitter

Use Braintoss to capture stuff and send it to your inbox with one tap:
‚Ä¢ for any thought/idea/task
‚Ä¢ for Images
‚Ä¢ for Business Cards
‚Ä¢ for QR Codes
‚Ä¢ for receipts

developerAddress:
Uit den Bosstraat 8
2012 KL Haarlem
The Netherlands
recentChanges: Bug fixes.
comments: It didn't work correctly for me; all voice recordings are in (very) slow motion which makes the app useless to me. Immediately asked for a refund. Happy to redownload it if it is fixed :)

Fantastic. Slightly odd bug though - when you take a photo the preview is tighter than the actual shot it takes and sends. So if I take a photo of paper that is framed how I want it, it sends a photo that has 10cm all around the page. Would change to 5 stars without this. On s10+.

Not supporting RTL languages (Hebrew in my case) All text is aligned to the left, and if my text is mixed Hebrew and English my notes are almost unreadable. Also sometimes it can take up to several hours until it send my notes (specialy photos). The app isn't insisting sending queued notes, and just keeping them at this status

This is my go-to app for getting things out of my head and into my Getting things done inbox. It is super simple, but does exactly what it has to do to make me more efficient and more relaxed at the same time. The latest update has fixed the low imagine quality and no-sending issues (and now you can spot if a note didn't send). Great customer service too - thumps up to Remco for fixing my reported bug in record time.
Unreliable. Great app, but it fails to send emails so often it is unreliable as a GTD capture tool. Quite often a lot of my messages end up in the queued status.

title: Omega Watch Face Paid Unlocker
description:
*** NOTE: This application is only an unlocker key to go alongside the free app. To download the free app the the watch face, visit https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.brohkahn.omegawatchface ***


Feel like the best secret agent while sporting the Omega watch face. You'll be able to leave your phone in your pocket as Omega will tell you every necessary detail you need to get through your day. By knowing your schedule with such details at a moment's glance, your friends might even think you to be a supernatural spy!

Omega is the most complete watch face for your Android Wear device. When fully utilized, Omega will tell you the time, date, weather, battery level of your devices, and your current fitness data. What follows is a list of all of Omega's fully customizable features:

DATE & TIME
- Of course

BATTERY
- Show battery from your watch and/or phone in the battery meters
- Choose the interval at which to poll the battery level of your devices
- Optionally show the exact battery life at the bottom of the screen*
- Use the battery life monitors on the watch face to display approximate battery life (within 10% to 18%)
- Optionally show only the current health block in ambient mode to reduce screen burn-in and brightness

WEATHER
- Omega's handheld app will get current weather information from Dark Sky
- Choose from a variety of details to show: the day's high & low, wind speed & direction, sunrise & sunset*
- Use imperial / metric units
- Note: Requires ACCESS_FINE_LOCATION and INTERNET permission

SCHEDULE
- Omega's wearable app will read the calendars that are on your wear device to determine your next event
- Choose the interval at which to check for new events
- As soon as your current event has ended, Omega will look for the next event
- Choose how long in the future you want to look: check for event in the next 2 hours or the next 1 week
- Note: Requires READ_CALENDAR permission

HEALTH*
- Omega's wearable and/or mobile app will read the Google Fit data from your device
- Choose from a variety of retrieval methods: Google Fit data or sensor data from phone or watch
- Choose the interval at which to update fitness data.
- Note: May require BODY_SENSOR permission

Every one of Omega's features/elements is completely optional and can be modified to your liking, here is what you can do to each element individually:

- Show/hide element*
- Change text size
- Change font
- Text color
- Vertical position*
- Text alignment
- Toggle icon
- Change icon side

*Note: some elements require paid version. Purchase the paid version for only $1.99 for a limited time at https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.brohkahn.omega

Application Issues
Our goal was to create a complete and fully functional, usable, power efficient watch face. If you do not think that our mission was a success, please send us an email at kevin@broh-kahn.com with your issues and we will get back to you as quickly as possible. If you have an issue with the application, please do not leave a negative review or uninstall the app; contact us and we will do our best to solve your issue within 3 days.

Feature Requests
If you have a small feature request (i.e. configuration change) for this watch face, please send us an email at kevin@broh-kahn.com and your request will be completed within 1 week, guaranteed. Larger requests may take more time. If you would like us to design a new watch face with all the functionality of Omega, please get in touch and we'll work with you to design a well-designed and functional watch face

comments: tried this and the free version and the watch face doesnt display. Creator does not respond to email either.
Paid for unlock key and downloaded omega watch face app. App opens on my Samsung Galaxy Note20 Ultra G5 but can't see how to load onto my Samsung Galaxy Gear S3. Help please??

Have the free app and purchase the unlocker but it didn't appear to do anything, so wasted $1.99.  Watch face gives a bunch of errors when it loads up, and displays the time only.  Nothing else works and there is no settings that I could find to work with.  Stay away until fixed.
Great watch face. Not only nostalgic, but provide a lot of information with a clean design. Bought unlocker to support developer.  Is it possible to add an option to have colour in ambient mode?
Can't even find it in or on my gear 3.. any tips on how to get it to show up on my gear S3 ?

title: Shot Lister
description:
Shot Lister is the only truly professional shot list & scheduling app. Take that crumpled piece of paper out of your back pocket & touch the digital future of shot listing.

Shot Lister revolutionizes the art of shot listing from pre-production to the minute by minute decisions on set. It‚Äôs designed by experienced filmmakers to deliver the only solution that can build, organize, schedule and share shot lists and shooting schedules digitally.

Shooting a film never goes to plan, now instead of scribbling over your printed out spreadsheet, you can get back on track with a flick of a finger.
Shot Lister comes with TWO options:
SHOT LISTER which is more than capable of handling most indie productions & includes the ability to add hundreds of scenes and thousands of shots, customizable categories & multi-cam support. This is a one time purchase & all updates are free.

SHOT LISTER PRO is for more complex productions that require specific features which are more expensive to build. These include the ability to import scripts, add storyboards, circle takes & sync files. Shot Lister Pro is an optional in-app purchase with 1, 3 and 12 month subscription options, which can be cancelled at anytime. Subscribers really help us bring new features much sooner for both Shot Lister & Shot Lister Pro.

See full list of features for both below & for helpful how-to videos visit www.shotlister.com

SHOT LISTER
‚Ä¢UNIVERSAL
Share Shot Lister files across iOS and macOS platforms.

‚Ä¢INDUSTRY GRADE
Easily organize & store hundreds of scenes & thousands of shots with the flick of a finger. We support scene letter revisions, 1/8 page counts, ‚Äúi‚Äù and ‚Äúo‚Äù exclusion, and cast breakdown tracking. All to fit a variety of professional workflows.

‚Ä¢SCHEDULING
The only software available to easily create a shooting schedule on a shot by shot & minute by minute basis. Rearrange scenes in Stripboard view, & easily check what is yet to be shot or scheduled.

‚Ä¢LIVE MODE
Experience the ground breaking ‚ÄúLive‚Äù production mode to see exactly how you are doing to the minute, and re-organize the day in a matter of seconds. Let Shot Lister show you exactly how many minutes ahead or behind you are.

‚Ä¢FULLY CUSTOMIZABLE
Every project & director is different, customize & order every category throughout the app to your own needs. Re-name the user category for any specific use, like tracking props or wardrobe. Customize the lens & gear list to fit your package.

‚Ä¢MULTI-CAM SUPPORT
Assign shots to different cameras & group them together to be shot simultaneously. Supports up to 26 cameras.

‚Ä¢DESKTOP IMPORT
Build shot lists in our website Excel or Numbers templates then import them directly into Shot Lister.

‚Ä¢SHARING and DROPBOX
Export beautifully formatted PDFs or the entire Shot Lister project file (SHL) via Dropbox or email. Also export a CSV from Shot Lister to continue to work on your desktop.

SHOT LISTER PRO
A 1, 3 or 12 month in-app subscription gives you access to the following features. Subscription automatically renews annually & can be canceled at any time.

‚Ä¢CREW SYNC (PRO)
Sync your project file with other Shot Lister users. Keep the entire crew up to date live. Also manage crew member privileges as ‚Äúview only‚Äù or ‚Äúview and edit‚Äù to share authorship with collaborators.

‚Ä¢SCRIPT IMPORTING (PRO)
Import Final Draft or Fountain scripts into Shot Lister & let it instantly build a project, generating all the scene meta data & cast list to save time. To import Celtx convert into Fountain file via https://www.writerduet.com

‚Ä¢STORYBOARDS (PRO)
Add Storyboards to every shot and display full screen in the Storyboard Theatre. View your plan, see which boards are left to be shot in Shooting or Scene order.

‚Ä¢CIRCLE TAKES (PRO)
In the time it takes to tap a finger, circle the best takes & export the data in SHL or PDF.

Experience the ground breaking ‚ÄúLive‚Äù production mode to see exactly how you are doing to the minute, and re-organize the day in a matter of seconds. Let Shot Lister show you exactly how many minutes ahead or behind you are.

‚Ä¢FULLY CUSTOMIZABLE
Every project & director is different, customize & order every category throughout the app to your own needs. Re-name the user category for any specific use, like tracking props or wardrobe. Customize the lens & gear list to fit your package.

‚Ä¢MULTI-CAM SUPPORT
Assign shots to different cameras & group them together to be shot simultaneously. Supports up to 26 cameras.

‚Ä¢DESKTOP IMPORT
Build shot lists in our website Excel or Numbers templates then import them directly into Shot Lister.

‚Ä¢SHARING and DROPBOX
Export beautifully formatted PDFs or the entire Shot Lister project file (SHL) via Dropbox or email. Also export a CSV from Shot Lister to continue to work on your desktop.

SHOT LISTER PRO
A 1, 3 or 12 month in-app subscription gives you access to the following features. Subscription automatically renews annually & can be canceled at any time.

‚Ä¢CREW SYNC (PRO)
Sync your project file with other Shot Lister users. Keep the entire crew up to date live. Also manage crew member privileges as ‚Äúview only‚Äù or ‚Äúview and edit‚Äù to share authorship with collaborators.

‚Ä¢SCRIPT IMPORTING (PRO)
Import Final Draft or Fountain scripts into Shot Lister & let it instantly build a project, generating all the scene meta data & cast list to save time. To import Celtx convert into Fountain file via https://www.writerduet.com

‚Ä¢STORYBOARDS (PRO)
Add Storyboards to every shot and display full screen in the Storyboard Theatre. View your plan, see which boards are left to be shot in Shooting or Scene order.

‚Ä¢CIRCLE TAKES (PRO)
In the time it takes to tap a finger, circle the best takes & export the data in SHL or PDF.
summary: Shot Lister is the only truly professional shot list & scheduling app
developerAddress: 1201 - 33 Smith Street, Vancouver BC Canada V6B 0B5
recentChanges: Updated version for autoinstall
comments: Great idea overall, very useful app. I tested it on a two-day shoot recently and found out there's a couple of bugs: ///// 1) when it was time for a note to start (let's say SETUP or COMPANY MOVE), the text of the note disappeared, the whole line turned grey and I couldn't check it when it was done, so I had to delete it and rearrange times in order to continue tracking the shoot. This situation also made the app crash a couple of times over the two days of the shoot. ///// 2) the checkbox didn't fill proportionately to the time. When a shot started, the checkbox was filled up to its middle immediately and remained like that until it was checked done. I remember it filling proportionately to the time when I first downloaded the app ~8 months ago and tested it at home. ///// Also, the PDF export doesn't work with non-Latin characters (I write in Greek). On the exported PDF, all non-English words were printed as question marks. It would be nice to see this fixed; I should be able to use it equally since I paid the same price for the app as an English-speaking user. ///// Apart from those difficulties though, it's still a very good app that helped me keep track of a difficult shoot. Please fix the bugs :) Update Jul 18, 2021: The bugs haven't been fixed, plus I tried to sync a project from my tablet to my smartphone today and found no way to do so. I tried emailing an SHL file first, but when I tapped "Share", Shotlister wasn't in the available apps to send the file to. So then I tried to subscribe to Pro so that is syncs automatically, but when I tap "Subscribe" in the settings, it takes me to my current subscriptions where there's no button to subscribe to Pro. I guess you've made this app for iOS and tweaked it for Android, but it still needs lots of fixing in order to work as expected on Android. I wanted to like this app and the idea of it is very useful, but the execution unfortunately is mediocre.
Layout unusable on a Galaxy Note 9, completely falls apart. Watch out resolution of your device.

The bugs and limitations make this a pain to use. For one, on your first scene you had better give it the proper number, as you can change it a hundred times and it will always default to the original number. Which brings up the next issue - no custom scene numbering? How silly. I have my way of doing things, and the next guy has his way, and each script or project calls for varying complexity in numbering, but we have to use Shotlister's canonical numbering.

Although the UI is still slightly antiquated, the software manages to perform well in situations. Using it this last week on a shoot, I (as the sound mixer) was able to see how much time we had for some shots and also what shots were coming up throughout the day. This is useful for me because I need to know in advance which actors need to be mic'ed up, and for the shot, where to hide the mic. Shotlister has also been helpful in the past, on both op systems, keeping me on track as a director.

A really useful app for indie shoots. It definitely has a place on small productions where you have to get time management off your mind ! I recommend giving it a try. I just have some minor issues with the display options on Android, but nothing that stopped me from using it efficiently.

title: Solid Explorer USB OTG Plugin
description:
This plugin for Solid Explorer lets you access files stored on USB drives or card readers on Nexus devices. Minimum required version of Solid Explorer is 2.0. If your device already supports mounting OTG drives, you don't need this plugin.

Please note that Nexus devices running Android 6 have now built in support for FAT formatted USB drives, so Solid Explorer will work with them without this plugin.

All nexus phones and tablets with USB host capabilities are supported (Nexus 4 may not be supported without a custom kernel). You may also want to use this plugin on other devices with USB host in case they don't mount file systems out of the box.

Supported file systems:
- FAT32
- exFAT
- NTFS in read only mode

Features:
- full read/write access (except NTFS)
- media streaming - play music and videos on third party players, even on the Chromecast
- supports hard drives with external power supply

This plugin doesn't require root. In case of any problems, please use the "Send bug report" option under application's "About" section.

Always make a backup of your files. NeatBytes is not responsible for any harm done to your device.

comments: Having issues with Samsung T5 2GB drive where I have to dismount drive (says error can't read volume) and /force close app before it will work. Works as intended after that. Behaved this day with drive fresh out of the box and subsequently. 2 stars to draw attention to this as I don't feel like the support site adequately addresses critical failures. Fine for feature suggestions. Wish it had a feature to automatically pause if cord shorts or drive disconnects mid-transfer. Like buffer 5MB.
It's hard to copy items from sd card to usb....most of the times it crashes or gives out error. Otherwise this is the best way to access ext. drives directly i.e. without the need to format it.
No longer works for me in android 11. Get CBW write fail. Had to switch to file manager+ as that seems to work. Hope solid gets fixes

Does not work. Unable to access cleanly formatted drive in ExFAT. Just says error, and cycles through various error messages. Have attempted this on a number of different drives and get the same result.

Works with exFAT USB. most of the other explorers and similar apps can't detect the USB or if they can (which is rare) they can't delete files. This extension adds missing functionality to the base file explorer. On the other hand Smart File Manager is copying files twice as fast from the same USB and Total Commander + Paragon have 3 to 4 times greater transfer speeds! I hope that the file copying speed will be significantly improved, especially from the USB to the device.

title: bVNC Pro: Secure VNC Viewer
description:
Need bVNC on iOS? It's now available at https://apps.apple.com/us/app/bvnc-pro/id1506461202

Thank you for supporting my work and GPL open-source software by donating! Please also rate my application, and tell everyone about it!

Release notes:
https://github.com/iiordanov/remote-desktop-clients/blob/master/bVNC/CHANGELOG-bVNC

Older versions:
https://github.com/iiordanov/remote-desktop-clients/releases

Report bugs:
https://github.com/iiordanov/remote-desktop-clients/issues

If you have questions, please don't post a negative review, rather, ask your question on the forum so everybody benefits:
https://groups.google.com/forum/#!forum/bvnc-ardp-aspice-opaque-remote-desktop-clients

Check out my RDP Client as well

bVNC is a secure, open source VNC client. Its features include:
- Windows, Mac, Linux, BSD, or any other OS with a VNC server installed
- Master password support in the Pro version
- Multi-factor (two-factor) SSH authentication in the Pro version
- Multi-touch control over the remote mouse. One finger tap left-clicks, two-finger tap right-clicks, and three-finger tap middle-clicks
- Right and middle-dragging if you don't lift the first finger that tapped
- Scrolling with a two-finger drag
- Pinch-zoom
- Force Landscape, Immersive Mode Disable, Keep Screen Awake options in Main Menu
- Dynamic resolution changes, allowing you to reconfigure your desktop while connected, and control over virtual machines from BIOS to OS
- Full rotation
- Multi-language
- Full mouse support
- Full desktop visibility even with soft keyboard extended
- SSH tunneling, AnonTLS and VeNCrypt for secure connections (does not support RealVNC encryption).
- High-grade encryption superior to RDP using SSH and VeNCrypt (x509 certificates and SSL), preventing man-in-the-middle attacks
- AutoX session discovery/creation similar to NX client
- Tight and CopyRect encodings for quick updates
- Ability to reduce the color depth over slow links
- Copy/paste integration
- Samsung multi-window
- SSH public/private (pubkey)
- Importing encrypted/unencrypted RSA keys in PEM format
- Zoomable, Fit to Screen, and One to One scaling modes
- Two Direct, one Simulated Touchpad, and one Single-handed input modes
- In single-handed input mode, long-tap to get a choice of clicks, drag modes, scroll, and zoom
- Supports most VNC servers including TightVNC, UltraVNC, TigerVNC, and RealVNC
- Supports Mac OS X built-in remote desktop server (ARD) and Mac OS X authentication
- Does NOT support RealVNC encryption (use VNC over SSH or VeNCrypt instead)
- Stowable on-screen extra
- Right-click with Back button
- Use D-pad for arrows, rotate D-pad
- FlexT9 and hardware keyboard support
- View-only mode
- On-device help on creating a new connection in the Menu when setting up connections
- On-device help on available input modes in the Menu when connected
- Recommended with Hackers keyboard from Google Play

- Instructions for Windows:
Plain VNC:
http://iiordanov.blogspot.ca/2012/04/how-to-install-and-connect-to-tightvnc.html

Secure VNC over VeNCrypt:
https://groups.google.com/forum/#!topic/bvnc-ardp-aspice-opaque-android-bb10-clients/lINJkYJbN-U

Secure VNC over SSH:
http://iiordanov.blogspot.ca/2012/04/tunneling-vnc-over-ssh-to-windows.html

- Instructions for Linux:

Plain VNC (Remote Desktop on Ubuntu):
NOTE: To use Vino (default Ubuntu VNC Server), first run:
gsettings set org.gnome.Vino require-encryption false

http://www.howtoforge.com/configure-remote-access-to-your-ubuntu-desktop

AutoX Secure VNC over SSH:
http://iiordanov.blogspot.ca/2012/10/looking-for-nx-client-for-android-or.html

- Instructions for Mac OS X Remote Desktop:
http://iiordanov.blogspot.ca/2012/04/how-to-connect-to-mac-os-x-using-bvnc.html

Secure VNC over SSH:
http://iiordanov.blogspot.ca/2012/04/tunneling-vnc-over-ssh-to-mac-os-x.html

Code
https://github.com/iiordanov/remote-desktop-clients

comments: I generally like this app, but preferred seeing a list without preview screenshots. I was intrigued when that change was made, but the novelty wore off and I wish I could go back. I hope the developer adds a way to let users choose which they prefer. Edit: it's not my job to chase the developer to make a suggestion. This is where I got the app, so this is where I make comments. My comment was obviously seen. I'd rather find a different app than play games.
When I was using it. I had constant phone calls from the bank that somebody tried to log in and I am blocked. When I dumped this app, no issues with bank anymore. Not to trust!

Terrific app. I installed the free version first, to check it out. It works very, very well - even establishing VNC connections over a secure channel (SSH, in my case) to hosts behind a firewall is straightforward to do, once you know your way around the app. I decided to get the pay version, not necessarily because I want to get extra features or get rid of the marketing window, but because I think that the developer deserves it. Notice that migrating from the free one to the pay version is painless, thanks to the Import/Export Settings capability available in both versions. Very highly recommended.

I need to know colour depth and view only settings before I connect, not what the screenshot was. I now have to long press, then press edit to get back to where I used to be upon opening the app, then Show, to get to where I need to be. For me, the new screenshot list is an added pain. However, I appreciate the continued development to my favourite VNC app :)

Highly recommended. Been using for almost 4 years to remote access Linux workstations/servers. Still the best VNC app I've found, and it's given me the ability to perform meaningful remote tasks from anywhere via my phone. Easy to set up and highly configurable - I was able to quickly set up multiple connections from private and public networks using the VNC over SSH option. Supports passwords as well as RSA keys (easy to import) for better security. Once connected you get full functionality on the remote machine. The screen can be zoomed and panned, there's full mouse functionality including left/right/middle click, and the keyboard has CRTL, ESC, arrow, etc. keys. I upgraded to the pro version in recognition of the obvious amount of work that has gone into the app. Have a problem? I found the developer very responsive via the forum.

title: CopApp ! Calendar Schedule
description:
For shift workers, very simple Schedule app to view which people work together and which have days off.

* Add notes to each day by tapping the day and then the "Edit" button
* Integration with calendar for reminder feature when editing days
* Highlight Days with different colors (Red, Green, Blue, Yellow, Fuchsia, Sea Green, Sky Blue, Orange, Purple, Plum)
* Highlight text options (now up to 3 strings of different colors)
* Updated with better UI for various phone layouts, and added share with friends

* Great for Pitman, Modified 12 Hour Shifts, Work Shifts, LEO, Rotating Schedules, 4/2 Schedules, Repeating Schedules, etc

Please contact support before leaving bad reviews if you encounter any issues, and we'll be glad to fix them, and please leave good reviews if you like the app.  We do this for you..!

Please tell your friends and coworkers to help spread the word, you can share CopApp from within the app as well.



The default schedules are based on 3 squads, with repeating schedules of: (1) 5 days on, 2 days off, then 5 days on, 3 days off, or (2) 4 days on, 2 days off.
* Supports modifying the schedule to make any type of repeating days (add, remove, move days around to create a rotating schedule)
* Supports highlights of individual days (for days off, court dates, etc)
* Supports highlight of string in calendar (ie: Highlight text "1" or text "1/2,1/3" in calendar) so now users are able to highlight all days when a particular squad is working
* Customize/rearrange the text for the days in the rotation (Allows app to work for any repeating schedule.)  Also added some templates that can be modified, and the ability to load them via the internet.

Download the Free Lite version here:
https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.myprojectx.copapp.free

recentChanges: Removed banner ad
comments: I loved CopApp until I had to change phones. There is no way to back up this app. So I'll your history of appointments is lost. I contacted the developer and they said "Because of security issues" Seriously? My entire phone is backed up with all my banking and money transactions. Final answer is, although I loved the app, I'm passing on the next phone for a app that will back up and save my events.

Basic paid app that could easily have more features. If you could add a widget for our home screen for the calender this would be the best app ever. Something like that could probably be created easily and help so many people.

App works well if you dont have a rotation change. You should be able to add a rotation change w future starting date w/o losing the current calendar and notes. App works fine but wouldn't recommend. Minimal functions
Best App for law enforcement or irregular schedules. I can se when I am off with my 5/3 for unlimited years.
LOVE, LOVE, LOVE IT! It's so easy and I could not get by without it!

title: Clipboard Pro
description:
Designed to be practical and easy to use.
Convenient clipboard app with overlay display.

Automatically record all copied text.
You can record the content and URL of the article you care about, copy the product name, etc. and search the web later.
Because it has memo function, it is useful for shopping and going out.

‚Ä¢ Can be quickly opend anywhere
‚Ä¢ Easily buckup memos
‚Ä¢ Easy to Use


You can check this app's functions and operations with a free trial.
Please check the functions and operations by free trial before you buy.
https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=jp.snowlife01.android.clipboard_trial


Features

‚ñ∫Overlay display
Can be displayed in the upper layer of other apps.

‚ñ∫Auto paste
Recognize that the input field is selected and paste the clip automatically.

‚ñ∫Floating button
Can be quickly opened anywhere by the movable floating button.

‚ñ∫Quick search
Search the word when copied.

‚ñ∫Import / Export
Easily backup memos.

‚ñ∫Auto delete
Automatically delete items in the ClipBoard after the specified time.


This app uses accessibility service.
On Android 10 devices, it is used to detect that a copy operation to the clipboard has been performed.
Used to recognize that an input field has been selected and automatically paste the clip.
This information is not stored or shared.

comments: I liked the concept of the app. And this app is actually useful for us. BUT there should be some improvements in the app:- 1. Options in the setting are not working. 2. There is not the option to search for copied texts. 3. I have not any use of Memo in this app. WHY is this option exists in the app ? Finally this app is best for normal usage. So I have given 4-star rating. I will give 5-star rating if Developers improve above things. We should try this app at once.

I did not use the application yet, but there is an application that I found that was able to extract the notes off the application for free with absolutely no catch. It also worked perfectly and made all of the notes into a .txt file to put onto your computer to look at later. I also found an app that paid for the exact same service later. I found the free application first, and then found the paid one later. The free one has been around longer than the paid one, I believe.

I like this enough that I purchased the paid version. I don't see any means of contacting the developers. I want to suggest that you make this app fully dark mode. I can't stand bright white and prefer to see everything dark. I thought maybe the purchase would unlock that feature. Boy am I disappointed üòû

Worked good at first, but now nothing works. Clipboard tab has tons of clips, though all are old because it hasn't saved anything new for several weeks. The "Clear Clipbard" button has no effect. The setting to autodelete after one week does nothing. The only thing that still works is the memo tab, but I can use any text app for that. (Might've ended up here by choosing the no-delete setting at first, I'm not sure. But it shouldn't matter.) I'm shopping for another app & you should do the same.

At first its a little dificult to figure out but once you do its amazing. I hope in the future the Dev team will make it so you can label your notes and have a placetop store them. I wish they would make it easier to transfer from copy to notes as well. I think if you could make it so you can categorize your cliptray as well they would be amazing. Last thing the dev team should do is make it so that the clipboard is resizeable that way i dont have to minimize it everytime to paste in url

title: Chore Checklist
description:
Chore Checklist helps you manage chores at home or other places. It records chores' completion date and calculates next due date based on your preference. The "automatic reset" feature always gives you a fresh start of each recurring chores. It resets daily chores after midnight(or any hour you specify in "Settings"). For weekly, monthly or other recurring chores, it resets the progress based on conditions(see "Automatic Reset" section in Help for more detail).

It comes with a pre-loaded check list which has routines, such as "Daily Routine", "Weekly Routine", "Monthly Routine" and etc. You can edit them or add new routine/chores. You can set start/end date, reminder, progress, and notes for each chore.

You will need to install this app on your phone(not SD card) in order to add a widget to home screen.

The app also allows you to create multiple lists. In "Due Date View", the user can combine multiple lists into one view sorted by due date.  

The full version doesn't have Ads. There are also statistics reports to record chore completion history. With separate purchase of Chore Checklist Cloud Connector, the full version users can sync/backup to the cloud and share their lists between devices and users. We also provide free online editor at www.dotnetideas.com for easy list editing. 

***Upgrade from Lite to Full app:
When you upgrade from lite to full, you can use the "Backup and Restore" feature to migrate your data.
To backup your lists, open the lite app and click on "Menu"->"Backup and Restore"->"Backup" in Routine View. Then click on "Backup" to use the default folder or "Select Folder" to choose different location.
Then open the full version, click on "Menu"->"Backup and Restore"->"Restore". It will open default backup location. Choose the folder which contains backup files and click on "Restore". If you have chosen different backup location, then navigate to that location and click on "Restore".

comments: This app is my go-to-app when it comes to setting up cleaning schedules, DIY projects, gardening planners...the sky is the limit. Have been using it for I don't know how long and it keeps getting better. Need a break from all the schedules & planners; just turn on the vacation mode. If you haven't guessed it by now: I think this app is absolutely fabulous!

The app is excellent in every way, but I'd like to be able to watch my chores grouped by location only (in case, for example, today I'd rather work on one room of the house, to know everything that is pending or can be done in advance or can be assigned to someone else), and better if then I can sort them by date or alphabetically.

Spent ages writing my chore lists. Realised my device was short on space so to transfer all over to another device I happily paid for the full version and cloud connector. After I had set up and synced the list to the second device I went to uninstall from the first one and it uninstalled from the second device also. I reinstalled the the app and connector again on the second device and logged in, but sadly the list is gone :( All that time spent wasted. So I uninstalled it all again. After first uninstall a refund was given (when I didn't want one, just remove apps from device), second time no refund. Not impressed.

I used to love the Lite version of this app, but I downloaded the full version so I can get Cloud Storage, not realizing that you need to spend MORE money for the cloud storage. I really see no difference between this version and the free version other than this version keeps sending me random chore notifications even though they don't have the notifications turned on, and my routines keep randomly disappearing one by one. I am highly disappointed.

Very good app automatically gives you the chore that needs to be done on that particular day of the week. This app is like no other app in the market place, planning my different chore on different days. Very nice :)

title: Bin Checker Pro - Check, Validate & Generate BIN
description:
Pro Features
1. No Ads
2. Small app size
3. Updates
4. Android Sdk 14 support
 
What is BIN?

Bank Identification Number (‚ÄúBIN‚Äù) or Issuer identification number (‚ÄúIIN‚Äù) is the first six digits of a bank card number or payment cards number and it is part of ISO/IEC 7812. It is commonly used in credit cards and debit cards, stored-value cards, gift cards and other similar cards.

BIN is beneficial to identify a card brand, issuing institution or bank, country of issuance, card type and category of cards. This information is very useful in commercial business for fraud prevention, especially in online store.


BREAKING DOWN Bank Identification Number - BIN

Bank identification numbers are used by other institutions, such as American Express, as well. The term "issuer identification number" (IIN) is used interchangeably with BIN. The numbering system helps identify identity theft or potential security breaches by comparing data, such as the address of the institution issuing the card and the address of the cardholder.

How It Works

The bank identification number is a numbering system developed by the American National Standards Institute and the International Organization for Standardization (ISO) to identify institutions that issue bank cards. The first digit of the BIN specifies the Major Industry Identifier (MII), such as airline, banking or travel, and the next five digits specify the issuing institution or bank. For example, the MII for a Visa credit card starts with a 4. The BIN helps merchants evaluate and assess their payment card transactions.

The BIN quickly helps a merchant identify which bank the money is being transferred from, the address and phone number of the bank, if the issuing bank is in the same country as the device used to make the transaction, and verifies the address information provided by the customer. The number allows merchants to accept multiple forms of payment and allows faster processing of transactions.

When a customer makes an online purchase, the customer enters her card details on the payment page. After submitting the first four to six digits of the card, the online retailer can detect which institution issued the customer‚Äôs card, the card brand (such as Visa or MasterCard), the card level (such as corporate or platinum), the card type (such as a debit card or a credit card), and the issuing bank country.

Authorization
The BIN identifies which issuer receives the authorization request for the transaction to verify if the card or account is valid and whether the purchase amount is available on the card. This process results in the charge being either approved or denied.

For example, a customer stands at a gas pump and swipes her bank card. Once she swipes the card, the system scans the BIN to detect the specific issuing institution that withdraws the funds. An authorization request is put on the customer's account. The request is authorized within a few seconds, and the transaction is approved. The credit card processing system would be unable to determine the origin of the customer's funds and would be unable to complete the transaction without a BIN.

About the BIN Check tool
BIN Checker tool is designed to check the existence of a Bank Identification Number (BIN) base on updated database. Currently, there are more than +365,460 unique BIN in our database.

 Kindly take note that, the database is accurate but not perfect.

The tool is provided for informational purposes only. Whilst every effort is made to provide accurate data, users must acknowledge that this website accepts no liability whatsoever with respect to its accuracy. Only your bank can confirm the correct bank account information. If you are making an important payment, which is time critical, we recommend to contact your bank first.

The number allows merchants to accept multiple forms of payment and allows faster processing of transactions.

When a customer makes an online purchase, the customer enters her card details on the payment page. After submitting the first four to six digits of the card, the online retailer can detect which institution issued the customer‚Äôs card, the card brand (such as Visa or MasterCard), the card level (such as corporate or platinum), the card type (such as a debit card or a credit card), and the issuing bank country.

Authorization
The BIN identifies which issuer receives the authorization request for the transaction to verify if the card or account is valid and whether the purchase amount is available on the card. This process results in the charge being either approved or denied.

For example, a customer stands at a gas pump and swipes her bank card. Once she swipes the card, the system scans the BIN to detect the specific issuing institution that withdraws the funds. An authorization request is put on the customer's account. The request is authorized within a few seconds, and the transaction is approved. The credit card processing system would be unable to determine the origin of the customer's funds and would be unable to complete the transaction without a BIN.

About the BIN Check tool
BIN Checker tool is designed to check the existence of a Bank Identification Number (BIN) base on updated database. Currently, there are more than +365,460 unique BIN in our database.

Kindly take note that, the database is accurate but not perfect.

The tool is provided for informational purposes only. Whilst every effort is made to provide accurate data, users must acknowledge that this website accepts no liability whatsoever with respect to its accuracy. Only your bank can confirm the correct bank account information. If you are making an important payment, which is time critical, we recommend to contact your bank first.
summary: BIN is first 6 digits on a Credit card. Check free Debit/Credit Card Details.
