recentChanges: Fixed a bug that caused DataVault to crash on devices running Android version 4.4 and below.
comments: Works well. The reason I like this app is because of the free-form field naming. I keep many notes that don't conform to the rigid field naming structure of most of the other password managers out there. It also lets me sync with my PC either locally, or using Dropbox. Very flexible, in my opinion. I've been using it for close to 10 years now.
Have used for years and am very happy. I use it on my computer and phone while syncing via Dropbox. I have recommended it to multiple friends.

Excellent app. I have used it for years, over multiple platforms (Windows, iOS and Android.) The only time I have had any trouble was with the fingerprint reader on my Pixel phone not working with some cryptic "null response" error, usually when I am in a hurry and don't have time to type in my password with my fat fingers. More (or customizable) icons would be nice. Seems like development had stalled. Regardless, is still a great product, even years after release.
Great App for managing all kinds of information, with top security. Sometimes the fingerprint reader doesn't work well with it. Also wish it had more options then just Dropbox for cloud backups.

I have used this app for years. I have experimented with competing programs but couldn‚Äôt return to Data Vault quick enough. The user interface is easy and intuitive. The platform on which this app is built is nothing shy of brilliant and expandable. Data Vault also works over sever platforms. This fact just can‚Äôt be beat. For what is worth, the app has never crashed on me. I would like to see the ability to capture an image and import said image into to program. Other than that, I am endorsing this product and recommend everyone use use it for not just password generating, but storing safely and securely whatever info one wants. Buy this product. I stand by it.

title: Twomon USB - USB Monitor
description:
If you are using Windows10 / Android 6.0 or higher PC and device
Take advantage of the faster Twomon SE with new drivers.

=============================================

‚Äª If you can not use Three finger input touch gestures on htc device,

 Change setting to OFF in Settings > Display, gestures & buttons (or Display & buttons). Then, it will work properly!

=============================================

Smart device becomes a monitor by connecting it with PC via USB! 

The Convenient Connect TwomonUSB 

TwomonUSB is now released. 

Now, use TwomonUSB which is simple and fast. 

Tablet and computer can be used as a dual monitor easily by connecting with TwomonUSB. 

TwomonUSB is stable while using since it is not affected by the network. 

TwomonUSB provides the fast video play with Average 40 frames/sec of smooth display output. 

‚Äª Before the Purchase 

Connection is available only when PC program and USB driver of smart device are installed in PC. 

Any of the following three content in this app if you can not run properly. 

One. Windows 7 + system display two or more + Number of monitors connected to the computer currently(All of the conditions applicable) 

Two. Two. If you use a USB monitor (DisplayLink driver is in use) 

Three. Installing the Windows OS environment, the Virtual Machine 

‚Äª In order to use the Twomon as the main monitor,You need to set to directly move to the desktop when you boot computer. So, you need to delete the password or set the "automatic login".


Available PC OS : Windows 7 or later / Mac OSX 10.9 or later 

If you need instructions or detailed information of the product, please visit the homepage. 

(http://www.easynlight.com/twomonusb)

recentChanges:
* added new display feature to support macOS 10.13.4 or Higher
* fixed minor bugs
comments: Easy to set up, and easy to use. Installing the software and configuring it on the PC was easy and straight forward. Using it with USB-C, which is USB 3, gives smooth playback, with very little input lag. Watching YouTube or Netflix this way is also very good. The only issue is that it does use a lot of your GPU processing power, with usage sitting at 50%+. This makes it difficult to recommend for using it as a secondary monitor to watch video on whilst gaming, as it causes your frames to drop significantly, depending on the graphical requirements of the game. Minecraft with shaders turned on drops the frames from 60+fps to 40+fps. The GPU usage doesn't scale, meaning, if you lower the resolution displayed on the tablet, the GPU usage still remains high, so I suspect that there could be some tweaking left to do with the PC server. Settings the performance in the app alongside dropping the resolution still gets the same GPU usage. This is of course if getting less than 60fps constantly is unplayable for you. So personal preference. This could be why a lot of people are having problems, as integrated graphics will struggle, especially if you have older hardware. Combine that with a USB 2 cable, then it would be a nightmare. The software on the PC side has a nice UI, and is easy to use and follow, as is the software on the tablet. All in all, this is a very nice solution for when you want to be productive on your main display, whilst having some entertainment on your tablet. *** My PC has an NVIDIA GTX 1070 Gaming GPU, combined with an 8th generation Intel Core i5 6 core CPU. *** The tablet which I am using is the Galaxy s5e with Android 11 and One UI 3.1.

I was told this was going to be a good app to use for a second monitor experience and come to find out that no matter what I did to get the app going, All I got was wasted time and loosing $8. I will not be recommending this to any one any time soon
Works like a charm via usb, and the lag is totally bearable. I'm using this on my 10'' tablet as an extra monitor for my Macbook Pro (Big Sur) for programming and it's fantastic and space-saving!

It's honestly great. You DO have to know a little bit about USB2 vs USB3 max data rates if you don't want to crash the display every 5 seconds (don't attempt to use 1080p on USB 2.0) and I saw no mention of that in the desktop app, but it functions as intended as long as your hardware can take it. I was able to turn my Nexus 7 tablet into a 1080p display and it's smooth-as-butter even at full quality. If it continues to work as intended, I'd say it's well worth the $8.99.

I read all the requirements and my Amazon Fire HD10 Tablet seems to fit however when everything is connected, the Fire HD tablet seems to not pick up that the application is up and running on my PC, the tablet also supports ADB debugging and yes it is turned on. The PC is working fine because i have also tried it with my Galaxy s9 and it works but it does not say anywhere that this app is only supported with certain brands, if this can't work i would like a refund as i can take my business elsewhere... If this could work on FireHD tablets, it would be a solid 5 star Update: 11/27/18 I have followed the request for providing a Log File. I am waiting for a response

title: Hourly chime PRO v2
description:
#Migration notice
This new application release "pretends to be alarm clock". That way it should not be affected by additional battery optimizations some device manufacturers use .
If you had purchased previous app version then please contact us to get this new update for free.

Advanced hourly chime (hourly alert, hourly beep, hourly reminder, hourly signal) for time tracking and time management.

App plays short sounds at selected time. You can download free chime sounds like cuckoo, clock wall, Big Ben etc. from Internet.

What's more in PRO version:
- select any reminder minute (0-59)
- seconds support
- TTS (TextToSpeech) - speak time or any message that you set
- sunrise and sunset alarms (with dawn and dusk support)
- unlimited chime length
- widget to turn off chimes

Settings:
- hours to set (ie. from 8AM to 10AM and from 2PM to 4PM)
- chime (sound) - any sound from phone - no need to download and pay for additional ringtones
- chime volume - individual level for each chime
- days of week (ie. Mon-Wed and Friday)
- chime in silent mode
- chime in vibrate mode
- vibration
- chime at :15, :30, :45 min
- chime in wired headset mode
- chime in Bluetooth headset mode
- chime only when screen is on
- chime during phone call

Notice
1. Don't move application to SD Card - it won't work properly.
2. Disable battery saving mode for this app.

Permissions:
VIBRATE - vibrate during chime.
MODIFY_AUDIO_SETTINGS - detect whether headset is connected.
WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE/READ_EXTERNAL_STORAGE - backup/restore settings, play sounds located on external memory.
RECEIVE_BOOT_COMPLETED - to set up chimes after phone start.
READ_PHONE_STATE - to detect incoming phone call and chime or not.
WAKE_LOCK - to wake device and play chime.
ACCESS_NETWORK_STATE, INTERNET - Google Analytics, Firebase Analytics.
ACCESS_COARSE_LOCATION - optionally used on Andorid 6+ devices to calculate sunrise/sunset time for current location. User has to grant application that permission. Otherwise applciaiton does not have access to GPS data

comments: My review of this app's previous version spoke glowingly of it and I'm of the same opinion of this V2. Only issue was the inconvenience of having to duplicate the settings. Alarm mute via swipe is convenient.

I'm very impressed. I'd been using another hourly chime app for years but I got tired of it's complicated setup and issues. This is perfect and is working exactly like I wanted in only a few minutes. Thank you!

I stumbled across this app after having trouble paying for a similar one I just wanted to be able to add my own sound to. So glad I found this one - it free a cheap one off payment that is cheaper than the sub for the other, and is WAY WAY better! Instantly got every Samsung tone ever made (seems like it anyway!) plus every song on my phone. I think the screen shots make it look more complex than it is; it just took me a short while to see what's going on with the settings. It's awesome. üòä
Great app. Works really well and very useful. Developer is responsive and provides excellent support. Recommended. Thanks.
Great App. Super responsive Dev.

title: DUCT Ductulator
description:
The simplest and quickest ductulator app there is!
Now available on windows from https://robertlewisdesign.wixsite.com/robertlewisdesign
Use promo Code DROID50 for 50% off!

Ever wished you had your classic slide ductulator with you on-site, in a meeting or at your desk? Now you can. With DUCT, the simplicity and rapid sizing of the classic slide ductulator is now in your pocket.

DUCT uses the same rectangular equivalent method as your standard paper ductulator except all rectangular dimensions are recalculated from Huebscher‚Äôs equation.

Save time and money with DUCT as there is no typing in values like other ductulator apps. Just touch and move up and down to match the properties you want - just like the real thing. All size options and other performance values are visible at once, just like an original ductulator.

Available in SI units and Imperial units.

If you plan to use DUCT for work why not claim the cost of DUCT back as a work expense?

DUCT is simple and effective for anyone to use. Perfect for architects doing small residential jobs to HVAC engineering consultants and contractors doing large commercial projects.

DUCT was designed and verified by professional mechanical HVAC engineers for air conditioning and fan ventilation applications.

DUCT features:
‚Ä¢ Simple and quick to use - just drag your finger up and down
‚Ä¢ HVAC ductwork sizing using the equal friction loss (pressure drop) Huebscher equation method and a maximum velocity 
‚Ä¢ Designed for architects, mechanical engineering consultants and HVAC contractors
‚Ä¢ See all available equivalent rectangular sizes like the original ductulator
‚Ä¢ Suitable for mechanical ventilation, exhaust, supply, cooling fan vent duct plus general air conditioning and heating duct design

comments: Perfect! I've searched for app based ductulators, because I always lose mine in the truck, spill coffee on it, let people borrow or just destroy it. This is always with me. It's perfect and simple. Exactly emulating standard slide type ductulators. Well spent money!

I've staunchly refused to use digital ductulators at all throughout my career; I've always favored the physical ones by Trane. But this app with the sliding scales and the option for imperial and scientific units makes it feel almost the same. Couldn't be happier.

Seems to work pretty well. I really like the slide effect. Really cool. It would be useful to have a fitting sizer, or a digram of fitting types and how to calculate for them. also it keeps asking me to rate the app...

Only Ductulator app that I could find that would let me find CFM off of Duct Dimensions. Little more than I would have liked to spend, but it works well and there aren't any ads so I can live with it.
Useful but it is would be better if it has option to change units (exemple m3/s and m3/h) and standard diameters (125, 250, 315, 355...)

title: Night Clock++
description:
This clock app can be used as a digital bedside clock / night clock and it also offers a flashlight üî¶ for your convenience when leaving your bed at night.

Additionally a daylight ‚òÄÔ∏è mode is offered, so that an old / unused device could still be used as a beautiful digital clock, both - day ‚òÄÔ∏è and night üåë.

Auto start when plugging in the power lead doesn't work when No Notifications is set.

Actually, I'm using your radio alarm clock app these days and the night clock in that has the preferred format, so prob won't be needing this anymore...!

title: iCal Import/Export CalDAV
description:
iCal Import/Export CalDAV 3.2
is the ultimative import/export/sync app for your android calendar with first class support for everyone.
See always what's happening, nothing is hidden from the user.

Feature overview
Import, export, sync, transfer, archive, calendar editing, deleting, changing, a very cool Widget, and much more!

Import/Export
You can import and export from various sources and to various destinations:
‚òÖWebDAV
‚òÖFtp
‚òÖWebsites
‚òÖInternal/external storage
‚òÖEmail

Create, edit or delete android calendars

Pro Features
(In free version 14 days testable after first start)

Scheduled Import/Export
Plan your imports and exports and run them in specific intervals.
You can also limit planned operations to a specific WLAN.

CalDAV Android 4.0 and above, events only
State of the art CalDAV implementation, featuring WebDAV Sync.
You can also limit the synchronization to a specific WLAN.
‚òÖiCloud
‚òÖfruux
‚òÖowncloud
‚òÖbaikal
‚òÖPosteo
‚òÖGmx
‚òÖWeb.de
‚òÖSynology
‚òÖMost SabreDAV based servers
‚òÖMany others, but they are not tested
‚òÖNo support of mailbox.org, memotoo and Yahoo
More CalDAV information: http://www.drlue.tk/ical/?page_id=284

Extra Features
‚òÖTransfer calendars
‚òÖPurge calendars
‚òÖArchive calendars

Widget
Monitor planned imports/exports and caldav directly on your homescreen, try it out!

Used permissions
NO permission is used for a purpose other than the operations choosen by the user! There are no ads, no tracking or any other data stealing.
You can find an exact explanation for all permissions here: http://www.drlue.tk/ical/?page_id=124

Privacy policy
You can find the privacy policy here: http://www.drlue.tk/ical/?page_id=652

Thanks to:
‚òÖhttp://ical4j.sourceforge.net for the parser/interpreter
‚òÖhttps://github.com/lookfirst/sardine and https://github.com/aflx/Sardine-Android for the WebDAV implementation
‚òÖhttps://github.com/brk3/android-color-picker for the color picker

You always want the most recent features?
Open betatest:
https://play.google.com/apps/testing/tk.drlue.icalimportexport

comments: I have been looking for this kind of App for a long time. I use it to merge different iCAL's into one single Google Calendar. I than use the Google Calendar on my webpage to show availability of the rental houses. This works on a scheduled hour, daily. Really worth the money.
Best app I've found to synch iCloud calendars w/android phones. I've tried many. Easy to configure. I highly recommend this app and getting the Pro version.

Like a walk in the park! Developer was extremely helpful and quick to respond! Switching from Android to iOS is a pain in the butt! But this has made it so easy, after so many tries with a bunch of different software, wish I discovered this earlier! A++

Really fantastic app which has saved me countless hours. Quick and easy to use. I had a problem with a feature recently and the developer was quick to acknowledge it even though the actual cause was a change to Android. The issue was then promptly fixed at the next update. Thanks for the great app.

I was using a different app that failed again now twice in missing events on import. Tried this app out, and it's easy to use, works perfect, nice widget, a bit expensive maybe for a phone app but it's worth the one off cost.

title: DroidEdit Pro (code editor)
description:
DroidEdit is a text and source code editor for android tablets and phones with the following features:

‚òÖ Syntax Highlighting for several languages (C, C++, C#, Java, HTML, CSS, Javascript, Python, Ruby, Lua, LaTeX, SQL, ...)
‚òÖ Several color themes
‚òÖ Infinite undo & redo
‚òÖ Search & replace
‚òÖ Auto & block indentation
‚òÖ Keep opened files and changes between sessions
‚òÖ Open files directly from dropbox or a file manager
‚òÖ Character encoding support
‚òÖ Keyboard shortcuts (List below)
‚òÖ Share documents with other services (dropbox, email, ...)
‚òÖ Preview HTML files in browser
‚òÖ Bracket matching
‚òÖ Go to line
‚òÖ Run Scripts in SL4A directly
‚òÖ Configurable Shortcuts

Pro version only features:

‚òÖ SFTP/FTP support
‚òÖ Dropbox, Drive, Box support
‚òÖ Custom themes
‚òÖ Run external commands through SSH
‚òÖ Root mode

Using different character encodings:

‚òÖ To open a document with a different character encoding than the default: long press the open file button
‚òÖ To create a new document with a different character encoding than the default: long press the new file button
‚òÖ You can make this behavior the default in the preference screen

Long pressing the save document button allows you to save a document with a different filename

--------

DroidEdit is specially useful for new generation android tablets with external keyboards like the Asus Transformer.

Try Hacker's Keyboard for a developer friendly virtual keyboard.

You should try the ad supported DroidEdit Free before buying this app. The ad supported version has exactly the same functionality as the paid version except it doesn't have SFTP support, Dropbox support, Custom themes and root mode.

Please rate the app in the market. For bug reports, feature requests or any other subject please use the following contacts:

Mail: droideditapp (at) gmail.com
Twitter: http://twitter.com/DroidEdit
Page: http://www.droidedit.com/
User Support: http://www.droidedit.com/support/
Facebook: http://facebook.com/droidedit

comments: I started out using the free version and quickly converted to paid, have been using it since my first Android device. It's my go-to interface for entering larger passages of text, even if I end up moving it to some other app. The only small request I'd make would be to add a bottom border to the main window, any time there's text on the full screen the char/word/line count covers some of the content.

Good! I like that I can use with DropBox, there's no Ads, it has decent search, and it makes lines of code easier to read through color coding. I don't like that it cannot write to the external micro SD card. I thought it could do that; it's annoying and I would rate 5 stars if it did.

Really love the app it's very helpful when it comes to editing code there's been many times when I came up with an idea and couldn't do any thing without my computer and it even helps with editing things for the phone, for example mods for apps that support, usely you would have to download on your phone or just transfer a file from you computer just to edit the code in a file but this is a lot of help. My only problem is that when im editing a file with a lot of code it won't work.
one of the best editor i keep coming back to this Strong feedback: just opened a 2000+ html loc and was shoxked it didnot opened the file tried many times, it hanged without ever opening the document
Used to be great.. Needs an Update Badly! Constantly warning that this app was built for an older OS now.

title: Dropsync PRO Key
description:
This is the license key to unlock Pro features in Dropsync app. Once the key app is downloaded and installed, Pro features will be unlocked. Please keep the free Dropsync app installed.

New users are recommended to upgrade via in-app purchase in the free Dropsync app. This separate key app is for users who bought it in the past and for those who prefer the key app to in-app purchase. In-app purchase also allows users to buy Dropsync Ultimate for which there is no key app.

PRO FEATURES

‚Ä¢‚ÄÇSync multiple pairs of folders
‚Ä¢‚ÄÇUpload files larger than 10 MB
‚Ä¢‚ÄÇSmart change detection (fast sync!)
‚Ä¢‚ÄÇSync your entire cloud account with a folder in your device
‚Ä¢‚ÄÇApp settings can be protected with passcode
‚Ä¢‚ÄÇNo ads displayed in the app
‚Ä¢‚ÄÇEmail support by the app developer

SUPPORT

Please check out our website (http://metactrl.com/) for more information about the app, including User's Guide (http://metactrl.com/userguide/) and FAQ (http://metactrl.com/faq/). If you run into any issues or have suggestions for improvements, don't hesitate to email us at dropsync@metactrl.com. We will do our best to assist you.

recentChanges: ‚Ä¢ Updated app for Android 10
comments: i wish i could rate this 6 stars i love it so much!!!  i recently started seeing a notification "Dropsync Watching data, network, battery..." and i don't know why and i can't swipe it away and it stays for a long time. how can i fix this? i know i can hide the notification, but the fact that it stays for a long time makes me think it's not working properly.

Same than AutoSync but unfortunately I bought the pro version... Imagine two-way syncing a big folder full of files and sub folders, and end up with conflicted copies (up to 4 in my case) of 100ish files. What a waste of time having to check every files and their copies to check which is the most up to date and delete the others copies. Thankfully, this app has been uninstalled so it won‚Äôt happen again.
Very good but impossible to set up the sync less often than everyday. You don't have the time to share your pictures, they are already gone. I would give 5 stars if I could sync every 2-3 days

The developer has programmed an arbitrary restriction into this app so that it intentionally refuses to function if there is an update pending. This is user hostile behavior - instant 1 star. Now searching for a replacement. Pity I ever paid for this.
Thank you devs for keeping legacy support for older versions of Android. Very useful tool!

comments: I always feel like there is an unbalanced deal going on when buying these plugins. ¬£3 for this is waaay cheap considering what it can do. Phenomenal value from the users point of view. You can intercept/block notifs, extract info, and use that in other tasks. It's amazing. The Dev is a fully fledged mind reader and workaholic - traits that combine to make him the best Dev on the Play store. If you have Tasker, you should get this plug-in too, no doubt. Autonotification is a beautiful thing.

Every few years When I buy a new phone (same google account of course) I have to buy this app again. I can even go back in my purchases and see it. Mildly frustrating. I don't care about the cost...it's just the hassle. It's only the auto apps that do it.

This app is awesome. I played around with the free version while in trial period and just bought the full-blown version. Very easy to setup and customize all my notifications. Great integration with Tasker!

Finally bought this app. Best developer. He is always active on reddit and email. If you need any support you can post it on tasker subreddit or contact the developer. That subreddit is very friendly and helpful. This developer Jo√£o is very passionate about his apps.He keeps surprising us with tons of new feature regularly. Just buy it. Its worth it. someone in review complained that you have to purchase this app everytime even with same google account. He is wrong. Thank you Jo√£o for this app.
Bought sceptically after a few reviews, but works on Android 10 like a charm...

title: 2021 Postal Calendar USPS Letter Carriers ColorCal
description:
ColorCal 2021
Postal Color and Alpha (A-F) Coded calendar for Postal Letter Carriers and Clerks using USPS Sunday/Rotating Scheduled Day Off (SDO) calendar
This calendar spans October 2020 (USPS 2021 Q1 ) thru January 2022 (USPS 2022 Q1)
Note taking has been integrated into this version and the previous note taking versions have been eliminated
NOTE: The SDO scheme depicted in this calendar, matches commonly available printed calendars. 
For security, there is no online calendar integration.  It simply displays your scheduled day off, holidays and paydays. NO complicated or intrusive settings.
There is no SPAM, Ads, pop-ups, nag screens, push notifications, in-app purchases or collection of personal data. It does not collect, save or ask for ANY information. The app works without connectivity.
WARNING: ONLY get my app from Google PLAY OR the Amazon APP store.  Other sources may provide unsafe and/or altered (hacked) apps whose safety cannot be verified.
Requires Android version 4.2 - 9.0.
New release now supports Android 7.0 - 10.0
The calendar is believed to be correct. By using it you agree to hold me harmless in the event of errors or omissions

RemoteToGo is a RDP/VNC client for Android. It helps you to remote control your PC on your Phone.
It's based on open source library FreeRDP(www.freerdp.com). and designed for touch sensitive devices

It has many advance features likes:

title: yWriter
description:
yWriter allows you to write and edit your novel on the go. Unlike a word processor, yWriter displays your novel in chapters and scenes, making it much easier to keep track of everything.

And it's not just for novels - yWriter is also handy for note-taking, using the chapters as categories and scenes for separate files.

yWriter is the official Android port of the popular novel-writing software by Spacejock Software. Files created in yWriter for Android are compatible with yw6 files from the PC version, so you can transfer your work between the two.

Permissions:
Read and Write external required to save to SD Card.
Internet required for Google Drive access
Identity required for Google Drive access (I will remove this permission requirement if it turns out to be unnecessary.)
descriptionHTML:
yWriter allows you to write and edit your novel on the go. Unlike a word processor, yWriter displays your novel in chapters and scenes, making it much easier to keep track of everything.

And it's not just for novels - yWriter is also handy for note-taking, using the chapters as categories and scenes for separate files.

yWriter is the official Android port of the popular novel-writing software by Spacejock Software. Files created in yWriter for Android are compatible with yw6 files from the PC version, so you can transfer your work between the two.

Permissions:
Read and Write external required to save to SD Card.
Internet required for Google Drive access
Identity required for Google Drive access (I will remove this permission requirement if it turns out to be unnecessary.)
summary: Novel-writing software
recentChanges:
Adds support for the new YW7 file format.
Newly-created projects will be YW7 by default.
comments: I've used the PC version of this for years and it's the best thing I found for organizing your story. I was using the Android version of this on both my Chromebook and my phone also and in order to keep it synchronized between devices I always open it off of Google Drive. This used to work fine but it looks like Google has recently made some changes the requires the app to be updated in order to do this. As it stands the app is useless to me without this feature or I'd give it a better rating.

Not great, needs improvement. Especially for a paid app, this is pretty disappointing. Please add the ability to open the last used project. Having to click 6 times just to make a quick note is ridiculous. Also, let us see all the info for the characters. Right now you can't see the alternate names, goals, or pictures you added on the pc version.

Completely useless. I've been using ywriter on my laptop for years, but i can't take it anywhere with me bc of its poor battery life. So I thought I'd invest the 5‚Ç¨ to get it for my tablet. What an utter waste of money. The app tells me that I do not have access to the required Google services (which I do) and thus I cannot open my projects that I have on my laptop. Should have been a massive red flag that the app hasn't been updated since 2019 and the reviews average at a 3.1 stars.

Was working fine for years. The interface is a little clunky but it was the best budget novel writing software out there. Then all of a sudden my most recent project files start vanishing. Not deleting just vanishing after I save them. The backup file remains bit I've lost days of work because of this fault. I thought this might be a fault with the drop box integration but the interface with GDrive also appears to be broken.
I just purchased this app, but since it's not fully compatible with the latest Android, I can't use it. And no update since 2019, I'm not sure why I can't get a refund.

title: You Doodle Pro: Draw on Photos
description:
*IMPORTANT!* Please delete the free version before installing the paid version, the two apps do not play nicely and you will likely have trouble installing, etc. if you don't delete the free version first.

You Doodle Pro has no ads, no watermarks, no in-app purchases and never will.

Permissions are needed to import and export your drawings and photos, record your screen (with your permission) as well as access You Doodle clip-art over the Internet.

You Doodle is the best app on Android to create art and draw on photos and draw on pictures. Doodling on a friend, or marking up a picture or adding text has never been easier. With it's powerful text tool and simple brush tool, you can draw on photos and add text quickly and easily.

You Doodle contains the features of dozens of photo editors combined. Throw away all your other photo editors. You Doodle is all you need to draw on photos and pictures, create art, frames, use stamps and clip art, record your drawing and so much more.

Here is the full list of what You Doodle on Android can do for you:

- Draw on top of photos and pictures
- Edit photos and pictures
- Draw on blank canvas
- Many draw tools including brush, eraser, eye dropper, paint bucket, scissors, calligraphy, clone stamp, air brush, shape brush, blur, smudge, recolor, spray paint and chalk
- Record your drawing on Android Lollipop or newer (Android 5.0+)
- Add text to photos with fill, outline, glow / shadow, opacity, background and border
- Insert photos into your drawing
- Insert stamps and clip art into your drawing
- Filters and effects
- Frame / collage maker with hundreds of templates
- Import and save with ease

This is just the beginning. I plan on adding tons more stuff over time, so please watch for updates. Thank you for your support.

I'm Jeff Johnson, sole creator and coder of You Doodle and I hope you enjoy using this app. Please send me feedback through reviews or email support@youdoodle.net and I'll do my best to help.

FIX: Scissors crashes

Thanks for using You Doodle! - Jeff
comments: When I switched from iOS to Android a few months ago, YouDoodle was one of the first apps I downloaded. I used YouDoodle on iOS to make silly pictures, comics, memes, etc., but the Android version falls far below the standard set by its iOS counterpart. It's practically unusable for even simple drawings. Very disappointing!

The iOS version is my favorite drawing app, but since I've moved to Android I haven't found a suitable replacement that does everything the iOS version can. This is the next best thing, but it's still lacking in a lot of features. For instance, I can't change the transparency of layers, and there's no line mode or glow option for drawing. That holds me back a lot. Please update to catch up to the iOS version!

Disappointed! I've used this app on iOS for a while but have found it completely useless since moving to android. I paid for the "pro" version assuming it to be at least similar to the iOS version. There's barely any fonts, you can't ad shapes to a photo, and no doubt there's many other issues that I'm yet to come across. What was the best app for my needs has become the worst.

Not even close to as good as the version on the iOS, this should be rectified. The iOS version is amazing, and I've used it for years, this version is a sad shadow of it. Edit: I've seen a lot of comments by the author of this app that say it's much cheaper on android thus the lowered quality. My message to the creator is that I will pay more for that better quality in a heartbeat. Please make a 2.99+ version I'll get it.

Despite its being much better on iOS, l decided to purchase it on here, too, as it is a great app for doodling. Moreover, it only cost 89p; whereas, it cost ¬£2‚Ä¢99 on iOS. I call that fair, because some app-developers charge more for their apps on iOS than they do on here. Moreover, some charge almost twice the amount for a subscription on iOS. I shall, therefore, give you 5 stars for your fairness, as this Android version has less features.

title: Easy Offset
description:
Easy Offset is an easy to use program designed for Sheet Metal Workers that calculates cut joints, ell centerlines, and overall lengths for offsets of any angle. Just enter basic dimensions and the app will do the rest. ‚Ä®‚Ä®Save time and money: 
     ‚Ä®-faster than using a calculator ‚Ä®
     -improved accuracy
     ‚Ä®-no multipliers or trig formulas to remember 
     ‚Ä®-reduces error‚Ä®
     -minimize cutting in the field and wasted material‚Ä®
     -use any angle 
     ‚Ä®-useful for layout and detailing ‚Ä®‚Ä®
‚Ä®‚Ä®     -Compound offsets are calculated automatically.‚Ä®‚Ä®
     -Arc lengths have been added showing how much to roll fittings for a given angle.

Types of Offsets: 
     ‚Ä®-ells with any radius or angle for round pipe ‚Ä®
     -ells with radius heel and throat for rectangular duct
     ‚Ä®-ells with straight heel and throat ‚Ä®for rectangular duct
     -tap on an angle ‚Ä®for round pipe
     -rolled ninety‚Ä® degree ells
     -wye branches for round pipe and rectangular duct

Doing these calculations by hand can be time consuming and difficult. This app will make it easier.




For the HVAC industry.

comments: Tried to download app, said it was designed for an older android and to check for an update. Screen size was incorrect and could not navigate around the app.

Works great except for the bottom task bars to switch between round & rectangular duct are cut off a bit. I've used it for years on iPhone, works like a charm every time if you punch in the correct numbers
It would be 5 stars if the bottom information wasn't cut off of the screen. I can see half of the words "offset length" and the corresponding number but nothing below that
I love this app but it doesn't fit on the screen anymore. The bottom tabs are covered. Can we get a round to oval converter?
Has worked for me every time. Wish though for a update for newer phones

title: Memory Booster (Full Version)
description:
Memory Booster aims at enhancing system speed by resolving memory issues on Android devices with
‚òÖ Real-time RAM usage
‚òÖ Task Killer
‚òÖ Cache Cleaner
‚òÖ Garbage Collector
‚òÖ Auto Boost
‚òÖ Whitelist/Ignore list
‚òÖ System info

Supported languages:  English, Korean, Japanese, Traditional Chinese, Simplified Chinese, Italian, French, Russian, Spanish, German, Turkish, Polish, Arabic, Greek, Indonesian, Slovak, Albanian

Memory level status and memory usage graph

Free memory level is the main factor that affects how fast system runs. Memory Booster shows you real-time free memory level, and provides a live chart to demonstrate how memory changes.

One-tap Quick Boost
Quick Boost recovers memory by killing running tasks, cleaning cache and system garbage. It rescues your phone from running slow and behaving abnormal in no time.

Customizable Auto Boost Features
To make memory boosting easier, Auto Boost can be set at different boost levels (General, Optimum and Ultimate boost) with multiple boost strategies: auto boost at regular interval, or when memory drops down to a certain level or when device is locked.

Whitelist Manager/Ignore List
Whitelist Manager protects fatal system processes from being killed. And it allows you to add favorite apps or remove unnecessary apps from the list.

Task Killer (ROOT beta embedded) 
Task Killer shows all the running apps except those whitelisted, with detailed memory and CPU usage information of each running app. By (long) pressing the app name you will get more details and more options to deal with the app. Root killing is embedded in Task killer; so if your device is rooted, you can try root killing by pressing app name and select ‚ÄúForce Stop‚Äù.

Homescreen widgets, shortcuts and status bar icon (optional) 
Homescreen widgets, shortcuts and status bar icon provide memory info and boosting options outside the main app. With these, monitoring and handling memory issue becomes easy and handy.

And more‚Ä¶
Other functions like low memory notification, startup boost, boost log, system information, etc. give additional information about memory and system, thus to help you deal with memory conditions more effectively.

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/memoryboosterlite

Features only available in Full version:

Boost Level Manager
Boost Level Manager offers three different memory boosting levels (general, optimum, and ultimate), so you can choose upon your personal memory needs

Auto Boost Interval
Auto Boost Interval offers time interval options by which Memory Booster will follow and boost memory at the chosen interval. 

Auto Boost Threshold
Auto Boost Threshold allows you to set a minimum free memory level, at which Memory Booster starts boosting memory till free memory exceeds this level. 

Auto Boost on Device Lock
Device Lock Boost recovers memory when screen goes off. 
---------------
Beta test group:
https://plus.google.com/114989806981853991738/posts#communities/100752957417649040229
Recommended by Appgovideo.com (http://www.appgovideo.com/)

developerAddress: Department of Computer Science, City University of Hong Kong
recentChanges: Fix bug on OS 7.x devices
comments: After many years of using, it doesn't disappoint me. Surprisingly this old version has more useful option comparing to the 2021 version. I like the quick boost after screen lock, clean interface and ease of use.
Great to squeeze just a little more memory to run with. This OS is Linux and swap is too small. Phone crashes at least 6 times a day.

Been long time user who was very pleased with this apps performance(previously 5 stars). However, last update seems to have rendered it useless. Will try to wait for next update before making a decision

Dusted off my trusted Xperia Z Ultra running Android 5 Lollipop to use for a spell while waiting on a new Samsung and had the time of my life managing with the 2gb ram and the older architecture... in a current app environment. Enter Memory Booster Full and its helped tremendously. I can keep most of my hair now. Excellent utility!
Simple and functional. Everything you could want in a memory booster. I really like the monitors icon in the notification section.

title: mydlink+
description:
Quickly and easily view your live Cloud Camera feeds and manage your Cloud Routers from anywhere using a Wi-Fi or 3G/4G connection. Whether you're at the office, having an evening out, or away on vacation, the mydlink Lite app gives you access to your Cloud Cameras, Cloud Routers and NVR even when you‚Äôre on-the-go.

You can also check your Cloud Router‚Äôs current upload/download bandwidth, or manage your wireless network security and status. Parental controls let you see what sites your children have visited when you were away, and you can even block or unblock network access for individual devices.

For more information, go to mydlink.com or dlink.com

Features:
- View live video from your Cloud Camera, including a full-screen view. Tablet users may purchase the mydlink+ app for multiple camera viewing.
- Supports H.264 video streaming for smooth high-quality video (specific models only.)
- Listen to audio from your camera‚Äôs microphone (audio-enabled models only)
- Save snapshots of your camera‚Äôs video to your phone
- View the online status of your Cloud Cameras and Cloud Routers
- Remotely monitor and configure your Cloud Routers
- Access and view your camera's video feed (without audio) through your NVR.
- Support remote viewing period of five minutes in relay mode. Helpful 60 second left countdown timer.
- Touch and drag to move your view around for non-PT cameras. Pinch to zoom in/out.
- Toggle camera's view modes between Night mode, Day mode, and Automatic mode.
- After initial settings on the mydlink website, you can enable/disable motion/sound detection from the app for supported cameras.
-You can talk back with 2-way audio support (for DCS-942L, DCS-5211L, DCS-5222L, DCS-2132L, DCS-2310L, DCS-7010L, DCS-6010L), and cameras will mute their microphones to avoid feedback during two-way audio communication.
- SD Card Playback
- Camera firmware upgrade feature
- Push notifications: Tap to select which device you want to receive push notifications from.
- Local mode: Allow users to explore and access nearby cameras that are connected to the same LAN network with your phone.
- Online setup: Users can follow the online setup feature to configure new cameras. This app will lead you to configure your camera from A to Z.
- White light light-emitting diode feature of DCS-2136L

Please check https://www.mydlink.com/content/productfamily for supported model list.

Note:
* For Cloud Storage support, please download the mydlink Access-NAS app.
* mydlink Lite officially supports Android 4.0 or above.
* The mydlink Lite app is dynamically linked to the FFmpeg shared video decoding library, which is compiled to contain LGPL decoders and splitters only. The repository can be cloned from git://github.com/dlinker/mydlink-Lite---Android.git using the git clone command.
*For tablet users, we recommend downloading the mydlink+ app.
* mydlink Lite is not guaranteed to support Android devices using ""dirty"" linux kernel (e.g. LG P990).

I deleted and reinstalled the app and didn't help. when will this issue be resolved? and no I'm not going to elaborate to your link when its obvious your monitoring complaints and issues here.
I was trying to use my tablet for my DLink camera dcs8010lh. this app said it could run tablets, but the camera is not compatible. very frustrating!!
Showed an update for my cameras firmware, updated it, now my camera no longer works. Reset and WPS buttons do nothing now. Wont show as a network anymore.
Worst product ever. App is slow unresponsive and always crashing. Wish I could get my money back for these trash cameras.

I heavily invested multiple of your IP camera but seems your connectivity took decades to LOAD and wow! NOT WORTH investing in long term. NOT EVEN competitive to other brand. :-( Dlink is an OBSOLETE system, don't buy it!!!! Do learn from Nokia mistake, dude!!!!!

title: Focus GTD 3
description:
Focus GTD 3 is a GTD application for Android that can synchronize with OmniFocus 3 (only) on the Mac and iOS. It supports the full GTD methodology with Tasks, Projects and Contexts.

This application is in no way related to OmniGroup.

YOUR TASKS IN YOUR POCKET

FocusGTD reminds you when tasks become due. You can configure the time and date when you want to be reminded.

SYNCS WITH OMNIFOCUS ON MAC/iOS

FocusGTD synchronizes data with OmniFocus* (version 3 or higher) on the Mac or iOS. Note that at least one copy of OmniFocus* is required in order to synchronize.

CATEGORIZE YOUR TASKS WITH TAGS

Create tags for persons, locations, places, energy level or priority and organize your tasks in any way you want.

USE OMNISYNC SERVER OR YOUR OWN

FocusGTD works with OmniSync Server* or you can also use another WebDAV shared drive.

NOTE EDITING

Tap on the note description in the task detail screen to edit notes. You can style the text with bold or italics fonts to make sections stand out.

WIDGETS

Use widgets to stay on top of important projects. You can add a home screen link that will open a quick entry panel to quickly let you add tasks to your inbox.

SHARE FROM ANY APPLICATION

You can send links to web pages or other text clips into your inbox using the standard Android share sheet.

Limitations

Note that FocusGTD3 is only compatible with OmniFocus 3.

If you have problems that your account is deleted when you reboot your phone, please check the "FocusGTD JellyBean Workaround" app (simplest by clicking on the developer name). You have to install this app alongside FocusGTD to prevent this Android bug from removing your account.

In case you have synchronization problems, please go to the Websites FAQ section which contains basic tips on how to improve the synchronization.

summary: A GTD task manager that synchronizes with Omnifocus 3 for Mac and iOS.
recentChanges:
v3.6.2
=======
* IMPROVEMENT: better date / time picker dialogs
* IMPROVEMENT: improved layout for task edit dialog
* FIX: correctly remember folder editor status when rotating the screen
* FIX: fix crash on Android 9 devices when opening the date/time picker
comments: Would like more features to work, but sync is working ok.

OmniFocus 3 compatibility on Android. I love my Droid, but OmniFocus was the one thing I really missed from iOS. There's no other system like it and it's part of all areas of focus in my life. This is pretty much the only Android solution in active development by anyone. Thank you!  PS: Like another user stated, yes, you may have to rebuild your database in order to get it to work with Focus GTD. You rebuild it and then you replace the server database with the newly rebuilt database. Otherwise the Omnifocus 2 database may continue to sync. It's really easy to do and you do not lose any of your data. Once that's done, then you're good to go üëçüèª

Ecstatic! I've been an OmniFocus user for years. Switching to Android a couple of months ago had one major drawback: no more OmniFocus on my phone... just my Mac and ipad. This solves that problem. it works great and is well worth the money. if you're an OmniFocus user this is something you need.

This is a really solid app for Omnifocus 3 users with Android devices. I primarily use OF3 on my iPad and the web, but wanted a quick option to add to and sort my inbox, track and mark complete upcoming and due, and (most importantly) sync any changes flawlessly. This app does that and the developer packs in a surprising number of additional features. I have a few feature suggestions: 1) Add Forecast view to widgets; 2) Show calendar events in Forecast view.

Great to have OmniFocus access on my Android phone. Working in a company using PC's and Android phones, I was always challenged to integrate OF into my workflows. Now with Focus GTD3 and OmniFocus web access, I can utilize OF in all my work fronts. So happy to to see the Forecast mode available, and though my Perspectives have to be utilized via my iPad, the choices available make the Android solution very workable. Thanks for the effort!

title: AutoLocation Unlock Key
description:
Unlock AutoLocation permanently.

Get AutoLocation here: http://goo.gl/riXLe
You can also get a free Trial by downloading AutoLocation and unlocking the free trial in-app.

Unlock AutoLocation permanently.

Get AutoLocation here: http://goo.gl/riXLe
developerAddress:
Rua Elias Garcia n17 4A
2700-310 Amadora
Portugal
recentChanges: - added launcher activity because Google now demands there is one. You can still hide the unlocker if you open it and select the option to hide it.
comments: Think a better description would be "unlock autolocation intermittently." It randomly disables autolocation and gives me a notification that I'm using the trial version.
Doesn't work. Never detects when I'm driving. Geofence detection works sporadically at best. Would be a great module to have if it actually worked.

Worked great until I upgraded to Oreo on the Galaxy S9. Now it stops working after a while and you need to go into the app, stop the services, and restart. Tasker has its own Geofence capability to take its place. There is no replacement for the activity events from what I can see.

I like this app and implemented it in tasker. It just suffers from some small bugs and the overall UI / implementation in tasker could be more user friendly. For example, the variable alactivity is always 0 although e.g on foot is triggered correctly. alactivityconf gives a plausible result.  (Nexus 5) unlocking it worked without no problem though.

Installed the unlock key from Playstore but the app gives two notifications saying "you are running the full version" and "tasker conditions will never activate..." and redirects me to Google Play for purchase, where I see only Uninstall. Edit: Tried the beta version as suggested by the dev, and it seems to have rectified the issue. As for the app, it's a good plug in for tasker and the location is spot on most of the time (the accuracy depends on the WiFi mainly)

title: Sub Rosa Pro
description:
**NEW** Sub Rosa Pro for Android is now a PDF signing and editing app! Our new in-app subscription purchase allows for PDF and XFA documents to be digitally signed using your smart card.

You should not need Sub Rosa Pro for Android if you have purchased one of our Android PKard Reader bundles here: https://www.thursby.com/products/pkard-reader-android
 
Your Android PKard Reader bundle includes a software license for use with Sub Rosa for Android at no additional cost available for download here: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.thursby.pkard.subrosa.basic

Are you tired of having to take your heavy laptop, tangled charger, and clunky card reader with you on trips? Do you want to send signed and encrypted emails and access PIV/CAC protected sites right from your Android phone or tablet?
 
With Sub Rosa Pro for Android you can do this and more! Sub Rosa Pro for Android includes all of the same great features as Sub Rosa for Android with added support for 3rd party readers (any USB reader that shows up as a CCID device) and derived credentials.
 
Sub Rosa Pro for Android is a strong, two-factor CAC/PIV secure authentication agent and web browser that smoothly coordinates reader and card access on your Android phone or tablet. Sub Rosa Pro provides full access to your OWA calendar. Allowing you to view, create, and respond to events from your Android phone or tablet. 
 
How does it work?

Instead of a username and password, Sub Rosa Pro for Android uses US Government CAC or PIV smart cards and PINs with authentication to a card reader accessory or derived credential. This allows you to log-in to two-factor websites and sign, encrypt, and decrypt email. This also gives you full access to calendaring, which makes managing and coordinating meetings easier than ever. 

Thursby is the market leader in secure Apple and Android Department of Defense (DoD), government and highly regulated enterprise integration, delivering the security features absent in native Android, Apple, and generic enterprise tools. Thursby is US owned and operated and General Services Administration (GSA) listed, delivering innovative Apple and Android products and services for over a quarter century.

US technical and commercial support is by real people, over the phone and by email from Arlington, Texas. Please contact us via support@thursby.com, sales@thursby.com or +1 (817) 478-5070. Please visit www.thursby.com/support for FAQs, guides, and other helpful information.

Supports industry and US Government standards including ISO 7816, NIST IR 6887, HSPD-12, OMB-11-11, FIPS 140-2 and FIPS 201 (with an approved reader). Most popular smart card types are supported including CAC, Dual Persona CAC, PIV, and PIV-I.

** NOTES **
‚Ä¢ Subscription based feature allowing PDF and XFA documents to be digitally signed using your smart card
‚Ä¢ Device must support USB host mode or On-The-Go (OTG). You can find a list of known compatible devices here: http://www.thursby.com/support/faq/compatible-phones-and-tablets
‚Ä¢ Perceived performance depends on Wi-Fi or cell bandwidth, internet ‚Äúweather‚Äù and back-end data center or cloud infrastructure
‚Ä¢ Sub Rosa Pro is an integral part of the PKard Toolkit for Android secure app development and policy management ecosystem
‚Ä¢ The Google Play app is an individual/consumer distribution, custom builds are available for organizations

recentChanges: Fixed an issue where you may not be able to send an encrypted email.
comments: Paid extra to be able to use web mail. Worked at one point but can't get on any more. It's been years. Figured I'd try again. I've tried reloading certs, clearing caches etc.... I think even with Pro they try to limit use of non-Thursby CAC readers (using a ROCKETEK USB C dongle) and force you to buy their other products. Real classy.

Update May 2021: Works ONLY with AF connect app. This app works but only through the AF connect portal app. It does everything it's supposed to when parsing certificates. It's User Interface however is completely worthless when accessing any CAC enabled sites. If AF connect allowed for a browser I would only have this app to be the middleware because the AF connect app in beta is near flawless with Outlook 365.
With this and BAI mobile credentials you can now use AF connect to do AF webmail and DTS in android! Some parts of the portal are still a work in progres, it is improving all the time.
Waste of money, never worked.I have never been able to connect to my PIVcard. I have contacted the help desk many times but they are also not able to resolve the issue. Just wasted my money.
Useless. Couldn't access my email, and even signing pdf files require a subscription. I just spent 100 dollars only to be asked to cough up more money to not even do everything you advertise to do.

title: Sketch Box Pro (Easy Drawing)
description:
DESCRIPTION

Easy to use lightweight sketching and drawing tool covering wide range of requirements including technical drawings (alternative to vector CAD systems), general sketching, Online maps support, interactive map tools. 

Most of existing on market tools for drawing are oriented either for traditional or general drawing either for technical drawing, last automatically means that tool expected to be a vector graphic tool. As alternative to this, Sketch Box provides smooth combination of two mentioned approaches, powered by traditional drawing applications tools and by futures of CAD systems.

Do you remember time when engineers use real paper and pencil for work :)? Sketch Box its something similar, always with you in your pocket, ready to help you to fix instantaneous ideas and decisions.

NEW:

- Introducing Pencils Set: you can have set of pencils with different features each.
- Pencil (Brush) Redactor:  change pencils characteristics in powerful redactor.
- Input Dimensions text.
- Optimized Multiline tool, now can build line with any basic shape continuously,
   Manual points positioning (scalar and radial coordinates)
 - Added free and radial selection tool. 
- Drawing engine optimization.
- UI improvement.

Sketch Box is projects based application. 
You can create projects from 3 sources 
- New project from scratch: has predefined Themes (Black and White, Dark, BluePrint and REM)
- Project from Online Maps snapshot
- Project from device Gallery
Keep and reuse projects anytime later, duplicate and share it.

Layers support:
- Up to 6 layers (Pro version)
- Lock Layer
- Layer Opacity control
- Duplicate Layer
- Clear Layer
- Delete Layer
- Merge to down and merge all.

What it has:
- Wide range of Basic shapes like Lines, Rectangles, Ovals, Arcs to create sketches for any tasks.
- Set of predefined Brushes for free hand drawing.
- Grid tool for precise technical sketching. 
- Dimension tool for quick dimensioning (linear, angular, radius).
- Scale tool for setting scale ratio of drawing.
- Flood filling Tool.
- Hatching tool -hatch areas just with one touch!
- Text Tool.
- Elements Color control panels, support colors history.
- Copy tool: copy parts of the drawing, and paste it multiple times anywhere (Use angular multi paste mode for drawing radial continuously repeating details, transfer copy between layers), support squire, oval and free selection. Now have option to save selection to device disk and reuse it later.
- Drawing Rotation tool. Move rotation center around drawing.
- Insert Images from device gallery, rotate, resize and control opacity of it (assemble more complex sketches from parts).
- Setup you working space according to your needs with flexible buttons panels. Move panels around canvas. Pin it.
- export current drawing to Gallery or share it.

Online MAPS SUPPORT:
- Use Google maps as background for your work.
- Share your location with your comments and marking.
- Use Interactive Compass tool to bind you sketch with North direction.
- Use Vector Tool to show azimuth directly on canvas with just one move (if Compass Tool is used, will provide azimuth considering Compass North direction). 
- Use Map Tools to:
     - Measure distances between objects on map (odometer). 
     - Measure areas simply outlined it on canvas.

Enjoy sketching with Sketch Box!!!

developerAddress: A15A01, Jalan PJU 8/1, Armanee Terrace Condo, Damansara Perdana, Petaling Jaya, Malaysia
recentChanges:
v1.4.1
- bug fix (project open issue, related to grid tool)
- Pick scale from drawing in "Scale tool" available now
comments: App works perfect and I love the fact that it's customizable to each job I have to draw in the field. They have now fixed the crashing issues and I feel it works much smoother than the other apps I have used. Thank you

Useful sketching app for diagramming. Still trying to get used to the user interface. I like the layers allowing you to build up a diagram and draw dimensions without affecting the main diagram. Would love to know where it saves my Projects on my device so that I could back them up on cloud storage and move projects between devices. All I can do is share the image (png/jpg) of the project not the project itself. That's the main reason it's dropped a star.

great app! after a few hours of tinkering around you'll think you've got it! nope try again because this app is packed with features for $3!!! however there are two features id like to see implemented, such as a copy and paste tool to make multi dimension blueprints easier. and a tool to make edges of a rectangle convex or concave... and it may be that the app already has these and I just haven't found them yet üòÇ otherwise, superb app! update: Apparently they didn't feel good taking my money lol

(I would like to start off saying I don't have much in the way of CAD type training or experience but I wanted to try my hand with something 2d first.) This seems like it would be a good app, if it would stop crashing within minutes of opening/reopening. The free version doesnt seem to have this problem although I only used it for a limited time before purchasing pro. I really hope they fix this as it seems like it would be a good app for mobile use.

I've [tried] using this app for some time and I've had to give up, the controls are incredibly fiddly and the system often crashes or deletes projects. As many have said the free version might just be the better app! Unfortunate given that it could fill a gap in the app market and has potential, but the UI and general buggyness mean it's a no from me dawg.

title: Installer Pro - Install APK
description:
Full featured installer with tiny size, user friendly design and high performance. Scan and install market and non-market apps easily from your SD card.

Features:
* Install and delete applications from SD card.
* Auto-scan all APK files from SD card. Use built-in cache mechanism to improve performance, avoid scan over and over again.
* Support batch mode for multiple APK install and delete.
* Show full application information including name, version, path, size and date.
* Instantly search applications by name.
* Share application to friends through multiple ways such as Gmail, Bluetooth, etc. 
* Search application information directly from Google Play.
* Show installation status of each APK file:
  - Installed: This APK application has been installed on your device.
  - Update: This APK application version is newer than current one on your device.
  - Not Installed: This APK application has not been installed on your device.
* Ad-free version.

Usage Guide:
This application is very straight forward. For first launch it will search all APK files which stored on your SD card and display them for you to install. For other launches it will load application information automatically from cache to save plenty of time. Click refresh button in option menu to rebuild the cache if SD card content changed when necessary.

Any comment is welcomed and appreciated, please send to support@rhmsoft.com. 

Enjoy it.

recentChanges: * Minor fixes and improvements.
comments: The BEST! Does everything it says it does and more! Hold down on a file to see more options. Worth the money! The only improvement to earn 10 stars, would be to let us choose a background color, like a dark background, in their next update. Yes?
I downloaded this app with great anticipation. I open the app but it will not let me navigate to my SD card. I guess this can only install apps from the internal phone memory.
Bogus. Bought this thinking I could " one click " install my 20+ .apk files onto my android boxes I sell, but no, might as well open File Explorer and click them one at a time there instead for free.
The software won't access the download folder in phone storage. The phone has no sd card. I'll be glad to change my review if this can be corrected.
I love this app! Thank you so much!! üëçüèªüôÇ

comments: This is super good! I am a tad disappointed in the lack of some answers as well as the voice Jarvis uses, but I haven't yet seen the full functionality of the AI yet so this may be updated later once I have explored the functionality a little better.

Garbage app. You can't customize more than one command. You can make 20 commands but each falls under the one you pick. I couldn't change it. App is very delayed and it doesn't open apps like it said it would do. Don't waste your time or the 2.99 for pro.

looked cool at first but no complex actions or any real custom voice commands, you can't open other apps, I would give it 5 stars if it did that, also a couple of them don't even work (probably just because of my phone)

Very good start for this kind of app, helpful for me when im driving and need to make a call or start music, and always ubderstands what im saying, but needs more acsess to the apps, for instance calander (and other equivalents) so i can tell it to make an appointment or event without having to type it out or to tell me when my next one is. That would be a great next step. Also it might be on my end put the alarm for pro seems buggy and for some reason it doesnt like to save the size setting.

I am unclear as to how this app works and how to use it. The last Jarvis app I had (and paid for) worked great until it was removed from Google Play. I paid about the same for the updated version of that one too but this one doesn't seem to do anything aside from the hotword works and it recognizes what I say.

title: Noisli - Focus, Concentration & Relaxation
description:
The Official app of Noisli.com - The background noise and color generator for working and relaxing. High quality ambient sounds to help you focus while working and to boost your productivity.

Noisli is mainly used to drown out annoying noises in order to better concentrate and to enhance productivity, or to create a pleasant audio environment for relaxing or sleeping.

You‚Äôre working from an open office, have loud co workers and can‚Äôt focus? You‚Äôre working or studying from home or in a library and nothing gets you motivated? You‚Äôre continuous travelling on plane or train and need a quick power nap? 
Noisli makes your life a little easier and keeps you sane during long office hours or intense study sessions.


HOW IT WORKS
Mix different sounds and create your perfect sound ambience tailored to your personal need and taste. Activate one or more sounds and adjust the volume slider to create an always different and pleasing sound environment. With Noisli you can boost your focus and enhance your productivity or just lay back, listen, and enjoy falling asleep.

SOUNDS
Rain, Thunderstorm, Wind, Forest with Birds, Leaves, Water stream, Seaside with seagulls and relaxing waves, Water, Fireplace, Summer night with owls and crickets, Fan, rumbling Train, Coffee Shop, White Noise, Pink Noise, Brown Noise.

ALWAYS WITH YOU - OFFLINE SOUNDS
The Noisli app lets you play all of the sounds offline and therefore you can always enjoy its features and benefits also while travelling on a plane or commuting on a train, or during any other activity with no need for an internet connection.

CREATE AND SAVE YOUR WONDERFUL COMBOS
Play and Mix the Sounds together and find your Favourite Combos - Save and Replay them whenever you like.

SYNC
Now you can sign up for a free Noisli account and have your wonderful Combos always in sync on all your devices. A network connection is required to synchronise.

TIMER WITH FADE OUT FUNCTION
With the Timer function you can take advantage of efficient time management methods, such as the Pomodoro Technique, to be more efficient and productive while cutting out distractions and prevent burnouts. Use the built-in countdown timer function during work, study or creativity sessions or simply use it as a sleeping timer for taking a relaxed nap or while falling asleep.

BACKGROUND AUDIO SUPPORT
You can enjoy the wonderful sounds also while using other apps or while surfing the web.


The app is also useful in many other situations, such as help during your meditation or yoga classes, helping with insomnia or to relax before going to sleep, relaxing while reading, reduce stress and relieve anxiety, soothe headaches and migraines or at the spa, during massaging sessions and for parents to help your baby fall asleep. Noisli is also used to mask Tinnitus and to help with ADD and ADHD. With Noisli you can improve your health and feel better.


PRESS & MEDIA QUOTES
The Next Web ‚Äì ‚ÄúThe perfect tool to help get you more productive in the comfort of your own home‚Äù
Time ‚Äì ‚ÄúNoisli helps you tackle busywork‚Äù
FastCompany ‚Äì ‚Äú12 Tech Tools Productivity Experts Can‚Äôt Live Without‚Äù
Cnet ‚Äì ‚ÄúRelax during your stressful workday with Noisli. It is pure simplicity‚Äù
LifeHacker ‚Äì ‚ÄúNoisli Generates Background Sounds to Keep You Creative and Relaxed‚Äù


FOLLOW US
Like it: https://facebook.com/Noisli
Follow: https://twitter.com/Noisli
Website: https://www.noisli.com

Now you can sign up for a free Noisli account and have your wonderful Combos always in sync on all your devices. A network connection is required to synchronise.

TIMER WITH FADE OUT FUNCTION
With the Timer function you can take advantage of efficient time management methods, such as the Pomodoro Technique, to be more efficient and productive while cutting out distractions and prevent burnouts. Use the built-in countdown timer function during work, study or creativity sessions or simply use it as a sleeping timer for taking a relaxed nap or while falling asleep.

BACKGROUND AUDIO SUPPORT
You can enjoy the wonderful sounds also while using other apps or while surfing the web.


The app is also useful in many other situations, such as help during your meditation or yoga classes, helping with insomnia or to relax before going to sleep, relaxing while reading, reduce stress and relieve anxiety, soothe headaches and migraines or at the spa, during massaging sessions and for parents to help your baby fall asleep. Noisli is also used to mask Tinnitus and to help with ADD and ADHD. With Noisli you can improve your health and feel better.


PRESS & MEDIA QUOTES

FOLLOW US

Website: https://www.noisli.com

comments: If this app closes in background you can go to settings (gear icon on Samsung), search for optimize battery usage, show all apps and *turn off* optimization for Noisli. I guess developers should do something about it, to hint it somehow

I've been using the desktop app until it got a timer. I decided to give Android app a go. It is fine on a phone but looks terrible on my e reader. (Nova 3 color) please add a high contrast or bw theme. Also individual levels per component.

The interface is absolutely terrible....seems like I have to relearn how to use this app everytime I open. No tutorial on how to set it up. Nothing is labeled. I wanna rip my eyebrows out everytime I use it. Maybe I'll get the hang of it in a month. I will say this...once its actually running, the sounds are nice. For a paid app, I expected this to be MUCH more streamlined.

Been using this for a long time. I was pleasantly surprised when I found out there was a mobile version of noisli. I like that I can be creative with what sounds play. This app makes me fall easier and the timer allows me the comfort of knowing my phone won't be out or battery because I didn't turn off sounds playing.
Cool concept but doesn't play in the background or with the display off which makes it pretty much useless.

title: Notepad Pro
description:
This is a notepad application which is as easy to use as a real notepad. Put your notes to the notepad which grows and shrinks automatically to fit your needs.

Just launch the notepad application and start typing. Swipe left and right to change pages.

Feature highlights:

  - Text deletion can be reverted.
  - Pages or selected text can be easily sent to any of installed apps such as Mail, Skype, Messaging, etc...
  - Any page may be protected with a password.
  - Notepad pro does not require any permissions. Everything you enter into the Notepad will stay on your device.
  - Data from the free Notepad version can be imported.
descriptionHTML:
This is a notepad application which is as easy to use as a real notepad. Put your notes to the notepad which grows and shrinks automatically to fit your needs.

Just launch the notepad application and start typing. Swipe left and right to change pages.

Feature highlights:

- Text deletion can be reverted.
- Pages or selected text can be easily sent to any of installed apps such as Mail, Skype, Messaging, etc...
- Any page may be protected with a password.
- Notepad pro does not require any permissions. Everything you enter into the Notepad will stay on your device.
- Data from the free Notepad version can be imported.
summary: Get simple, fast, convenient and powerful Notepad.
recentChanges: Improved stability on some devices
comments: Dead set simple to use, not cluttered with fancy features I'd never use. Perfect for basic note taking like shopping lists, things to do etc. One of the first apps I install on a new phone or after the occasional phone reset. Highly recommended

The password protect function doesn't even DO anything. If I lock a note, I'm still able to edit it or delete it without entering a password. Giving a note a password doesn't hide the note or anything. This is a bad rip-off

Best notes app. But since Android 11 it has had issues with swiping between pages, it now prefers to move the cursor in the text rather than swap between notes which is annoying. I hope this can be fixed with an update.

This app is so simple, so easy to use, and doesn't require any permissions, I really like it.  I had it a couple of years ago and then got caught up in more complicated note apps, which I didn't need. After a while I started to miss the ease and simpleness of this app, so I'm back to it.  It's exactly what I need and nothing more, so I immediately bought the premium version to support the Dev.  I love everything about it, from the enlarged text (old eyes) to the dark mode, which is easier for me to see.  Keep up the great work Dmitry, there is nothing out there to equal your app in my opinion.  I won't be going to  a different app again. Five stars my man, Thank You!!

I really enjoyed the free version. Except for the inability to back up my texts, which is super important when you get a new phone. It was promised that the pro version does have this function. So I bought it. It seemingly does have the back up button but it didn't work for me however I tried. Pity. I tried to contact Dmytrii but he never replied. Pity.

title: OldSchool Editor Pro : Coffee Support
description:
This is support version of OldSchool Editor with exact same features.

Try OldSchool Editor and if you like it, you can support development and help me buying a cup of coffee by purchasing this app.

OldSchool Editor is text editor has a simple, powerful,  intuitive and nostalgic interface that gives feel of working on desktop. OldSchool Editor can be used as standard editor for editing any kind of text files. 


Note : It is an editor for plain text files and not designed for opening pdf, doc, docx or any other non plain text file format.


Features of OldSchool Editor :
‚òÖ Simple and Lightweight.
‚òÖ Powerful and simple user interface designed for both phones and tablets.
‚òÖ Multiple interfaces available to increase productivity in both phones and tablets.
‚òÖ Create, browse and save text files with auto saving feature.
‚òÖ Change Interface, text size, font and color.
‚òÖ Print text files on Android 5 or above.
‚òÖ Support case conversion and text trim operation.
‚òÖ Open large files in parts with paging system.
‚òÖ Display line numbers.
‚òÖ Supports Undo and Redo operations.
‚òÖ Supports Read only mode, word wrap and word count.
‚òÖ Supports Find & Replace, line jumping and regular expression search.
‚òÖ Quickly open HTML files in browser or internal viewer.
‚òÖ Built-in color picker for getting color codes in different format such as RGB, HSL and HEX.
‚òÖ Supports keyboard shortcuts for many editor operations.
‚òÖ Supports different kind of Line ending styles ( \n , \r , \r\n ).
‚òÖ Supports US-ASCII, UTF-8, ISO-8859-1 and IBM437 encoding standards with encoding detector.


If you find any problems feel free to give suggestions and feedback at feedbackdtw@gmail.com.

Join OldSchool Editor's facebook page for interaction with developer
https://www.facebook.com/oldschooleditor/

Permissions Required :
READ_EXTERNAL_STORAGE : Reading storage
WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE : Writing files in storage
INTERNET : For internal browser
WAKE_LOCK : For Firebase analytics
ACCESS_NETWORK_STATE : For Firebase analytics


Keywords
Editor, Text editor, tools, productivity, DOS, windows, retro, old, HTML, C, Turbo, 2019, Java, developer, Retro IDE, old school, win 98, win 95, html, app, application, paid

developerAddress: 46/1 Gali No 1 East Laxmi Market Delhi 110092
recentChanges:
Version 1.5.2
===================================
-Apologies for last unstable update
-Added printing support, available on Android 5 or above
-Added case conversion and Trim text options in Edit menu
-Added cut copy paste and tab shortcuts in quick toolbar
-Added cursor placement and vertical scrollbar adjustment options in settings
-Added delete page option in page bar
-Added share all text option in tools menu
-Fixed auto saving behaviour of saving saved files
-Minor bug fixes and UI tweeks
comments: Near perfect. I'd like line and case operations but for less than a can of soda, this is a steal. This app is underrated. I have bloated wordprocessing apps available, but I'm not writing a novel on my device. This strikes a very good balance between minimal with above basic features. I'd donate more if that option was available. Great job!

I just bought you a coffee, but please - why is this annoying issue when closing, that stupid confirmation question comes up every time "Do you want to exit ?" When I click on Exit, I don't want to be asked again and have to even push more buttons to close the app. Please give us the option to have this confirmation shown or stop showing this message. Once the option is given or this annoying issue resolved, 5 stars will be given again. Thank you kindly.
Just getting started, but I like the author's philosophy and pricing.
Very good and well design A bargain for the price !!!
Just what it says - a very basic & rudimentary TEXT editor. Does what it does _very_ well.

title: Stairs-X Pro Stairs Calculator
description:
Stairs-X Pro is a powerful and user-friendly stairs calculator and stair design, useful for fast calculations and design for standard stairs and advanced stairs. After calculation you can see the staircase in 2D drawing exactly how you like it, and you have the possibility to send your calculation alongside with all drawings thru email for future printings. 

Input both IMPERIAL and METRIC units, and calculate using inch fractions.
Your stairs drawings are presented in real time in more views from side view, top view and detailed view.

Stairs-X Pro is super flexible and designed to be used for every person in the world, simple and easy to understand.
Stairs-X Pro is all you need for simple stairs, spiral staircase, wood stairs, stairs on stringer, or stairs in 90 degrees or 180 degrees turn, from wood, metal or concrete fast and easy.

All in one stairs calculator perfect tool for home use, construction and visualization in 2D, the best stair calculator. Very useful for builders, handymen, contractors, architects, etc.
Detailed drawings and accurate calculation for treads and risers, straight stairs, spiral staircase, stairs on L and U turn.

You can calculate:
- Simple stairs
- Semicircular stairs
- Stairs on stringer
- Stairs on bowstring
- Stairs on bowstring L shape
- Stairs on bowstring U shape
- Stairs on 90 degrees turn
- Stairs on 180 degrees turn 
- Stairs on stringer 90 degrees turn Z shape
- Stairs on stringer C shape
- Spiral stairs

- Zig-zag stair U shape (with tread on stringers) or (with tread between stringers)
