- Zig-zag stair C shape
- Zig-zag winder stairs L shape
- Zig-zag winder stairs U shape
- Zig-zag winder stairs Z shape
- Zig-zag winder stairs C shape

Calculate treads depth, rise height, number of steps, length of stringer and angle fast and easy.
Calculate concrete stairs, wood stairs, spiral staircase and stairs on bowstring, each one with the best techniques of calculations.
All in one stairs calculator is all what you need.

Features included:
‚Ä¢	Send email with your calculation and drawings in pdf.
‚Ä¢	Detailed drawings, from side to top view with all type of stairs.

did a good job. i was on low budget and didn't hire highly skilled professionals. but this app helped a lot
Great app. Highly recommended makes working out stairs so much easier.
Love it! Measure correctly, the app does the work!!!
Excellent app works perfect every time

title: Tape Measure Calculator Pro
description:
This calculator allows you to add, subtract, multiply and divide tape measure measurements. Answers can be displayed in decimal format, feet & inches, or just inches. Fractions can be displayed in 16ths, 32nds, or 64ths.
If you enjoy this app please give it a rating and leave a comment.
descriptionHTML:
This calculator allows you to add, subtract, multiply and divide tape measure measurements. Answers can be displayed in decimal format, feet & inches, or just inches. Fractions can be displayed in 16ths, 32nds, or 64ths.
If you enjoy this app please give it a rating and leave a comment.
summary: Calculator used for calculating common tape measure measurements.
recentChanges: - Fixed crash with history screen.
comments: Absolutely amazing. This app as saved me countless hours in just a few weeks! And it has always been 100% accurate too. I have double checked it and everything I've made with it has been perfect. Having the ability to do equations and have them returned in measurements with fractions is invaluable. I bought the paid version within minutes and never thought twice about it!

On the old app the free one anytime I would try to access the history it would say app failure and resetso I purchased the pro and yet anything that I type is not showing up in the white box it's moving the line but not showing anyI've used this app for almost two years I love it other than the problems I'm having now please fix it
I always have my phone with me when I'm working and it makes fractions a breeze. I don't have time to figure out the common denominator before I can measure and cut. This takes that all the way
Very efficient and easy to use ft./ in. calculator. Good work. Thanks!
App is a life saver for woodworking professionals. I use it multiple times a day at work.

description:
THE RECORDER

Audio Memos is a professionally made voice recorder. It has an amazingly intuitive interface, which is easy to use and full of powerful features. Use it for interviews, lectures, music sessions, briefings, dictations, sound sampling, voice recording, ... and simplify your recording tasks.

‚Ä¢ Best quality - adjustable to fit your needs.
‚Ä¢ Send your recordings by email, Dropbox, ...

comments: Awesome app with some great features. They seemed to stop supporting it for a little while, but it's back and still amazing! Definitely the best voice recording app.
loved it until today when it started cutting EVERY recording off at 2 min. All that time I spend recording important info is now lost. Argh!
Fantastic app. Best recorder on Android.
it promised to auto compress and it does not

Thank goodness they fixed the issue where the recording would randomly stop. The app didn't verify my purchase since I switches phones, which that's a bummer. Still not as good and fluid as the IOS version. But better nonetheless.

title: Ink&Paper Handwrite PDF Notes
description:
A tutorial, where the most common features of the app are shown, is online at the following link:
https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL3VL6s-M7yoeFSHGs-Z2qJdVV_WcdMuy6

With the release of the latest version the videos are a little bit out of date: at this link you will find a short manual that shows how to use the buttons in the new format:
https://inkandpaper-app.github.io/website/SHORT_MANUAL.pdf

‚Ä¢ Write on your Android device like you would on a sheet of paper. 

‚Ä¢ Six customisable types of pens with the best digital inking features are available. 

‚Ä¢ Insert in the most natural way typed texts, images, geometrical shapes in your pages. 

‚Ä¢ Select and move, zoom, rotate, stretch any object using your fingers.

‚Ä¢ Control undo and redo actions with the undo/redo bar.

‚Ä¢ Overlay objects and manage their opacity using layers.

‚Ä¢ Take full advantage of an active stylus by configuring the erase methods.

‚Ä¢ Work with close up writing mode on small screen devices.

‚Ä¢ Use gestures to select or delete objects while you are writing.

‚Ä¢ Set the background of any page by the import of JPEG, PNG and PDF documents.

‚Ä¢ Create new notepads from the most common document templates.

‚Ä¢ Save and load customised sets of colours, pens, typewriters.

‚Ä¢ Organise your notes into library folders. Cut, copy and paste notepads and pages.

‚Ä¢ Export and share documents in PDF, JPEG, PNG formats. The PDF format is entirely vector based.

‚Ä¢ Backup and restore any section of the library in ZIP format.

Before purchasing, you can download the free trial version, which lacks export and backup/restore features, at this link:
https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.inkandpaper.trial

recentChanges: Chinese language added (translation review by dhy). German language added (translation by Walter B√ºtikoer).
comments: An excellent handwriting app, especially on a tablet with an active stylus. Customizable pens & backgrounds; preset slots let you save favorites. I haven't had any questions or problems yet, but it's also very clear that the developer responds to user inquiries, and I'm happy to be able to support his work by purchasing the full app.

Deserves a five star. Simple to use. As far as i know, no cloud save but you can back up all the notebooks by yourself and upload it to a cloud drive. No drag to draw shape but it's not really important. Copy paste is easy and smooth. Thank you for this app really! I have been using it for 1 year now. I was able to write my notes, solve math problems, draw plots (manually), write online exams, teach some engineering stuff. It's the perfect substitute for the traditional pen and paper. Thank you

Great. This is really great! I love it very much I however wish 1) I could import images from my gallery. 2) Geometrical shapes would be included 3) Ruler, pair of compasses and protractor could be included
"Something has gone wrong loading page resources." Whenever I try and do anything with Ink & Paper I get this error message. I paid for this app. It was a waste of money.

This is a wonderful app. Quite fast in drawing. The GUI is a bit tricky to learn, but you'll get used to it. One suggestion is to include possibility to save the pen ssettings.Every time after using, say eraser, when return to use the pen tool, the stroke size is back to default size. Another suggestion : It will be great if the name/ function of the buttons can be shown when the button is long pressed/ stylus pen is placed.

comments: This app frantically tries to find the best connection near you. It also tells you how much lag is in your connection in milliseconds. Below 60ms is good, everything above is bad. Don't get confused, this is not a VPN but, a ping finder to search for best connection. Nothing more..

For the first week it worked like a charm, I was so impressed by it that I purchased it, soon after it stopped "working". I needed to lower my ping for CODM. It stared to slow down my CPU and eat up my RAM.
Very easy-to-use app. Just one tap and you're ready to go and play online games. It really lows your ping if you chose the right option to pick from.

The Lateral Pipe calculator is designed for Pipefitter/ welders/fabricators to eliminate the time it takes to calculate Advanced piping calculations for "Fishmouth and Lateral" Connections. 

Like us on Facebook
http://www.facebook.com/PipeFitterCalculatorApp

"Available for the Android and Iphone"

Pocket Pipe Organizer will run all of your pipe apps from one interface. CLICK LINK to Download
https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=pocket.pipe.organizer

- Input Values as Fractions

- Outputs values as fractions
- Outputs values as Decimal

- Calculates up to 64 ordinate lines for large pipe
- Straight up awesome tool.

title: SITE REPORT - Punch List, Snagging Inspection App
description:
‚ÄòSimple and the most efficient way to field quick inspection report for any site.‚Äô
** Built by professionals working in the construction industry **

Site Report punch list app makes site inspections very simple. Whether performing a safety inspection, snagging issues, creating a punch list, providing a quotation or sharing daily PDF reports, Site Report will help construction, housekeeping  businesses collate and share field inspection findings on the go.

Using  Site Report Inspection App, you can make notes, take pictures and record snags covering all the required details and share PDF report.

Easy navigation and very intuitive flow of information. It is specifically designed to be used by anyone, regardless of their technical knowledge or IT background.  

Site Report helps construction businesses worldwide improve their productivity by making site inspections and audits quicker to carry out and easier to manage, saving you hours of extra work. 

Site Report is perfect for:
- Punch List / Punchlists
- Snagging
- Site Inspections
- Site Audits
- Surveys
- Checklists
- Site Walks
- Housekeeping tours
 - PGIs (Planned general inspections)

Construction Management App Features:
- Record issues by taking photos, adding captions, making notes or creating Snag with a photo
- Assign priority to Snags, from 'OK' to 'Urgent' and in-between. Assign your text descriptions to 'priority' categories
- Organize issues under individual Site, adding site and client details specific to each project.
- Create and share a professional report instantly, without the need to head back to the office. 
- Share your reports as a PDF via email

Customize Site Report further:
- Add personal details to your reports; include user's name, company name, logo, job title.

Download Site Report today and let it do all the hard work for you and save you a trip back to the office. Site Report guarantees to save your company time and money.

title: Pipefitter
description:
Application Pipefitter allows you to calculate odd angles, elbows, tees, problematic offset pipes and mark them with measuring tape, caliper or height gauge on the work bench. You can measure everything in a simple way: from "face to face", or ‚Äùcenter to center‚Äù, and quickly get the solution in the App. Standard pipe sizes and long radius elbows (including ANSI and DIN) can be selected from the list of up to 40 inches.
The entire process consists of three steps: 
1) determining the purpose of calculation (question mark symbol)
2) entering the data 
3) displaying the result of a calculation.

The result: we have all the necessary information which are needed to create and fold your pipe. Drawings clearly show you the way of what you are looking for and what you need to do. It speeds up the process of work of pipe fitters. 
The application is being updated all the time and oriented to develop and extend, basing on suggestions of other pipe fitters.

title: MetaMoJi Note
description:
PLEASE NOTE. 

We have confirmed that the following phenomena occur on Android 10.
- Unable to select objects with a tap or the Lasso tool.
- Unable to re-edited the Text Unit and a new Text Unit is inserted.

*The above phenomena do not occur in environments up to Android 9, and operation is not guaranteed for Android 10 use.

MetaMoJi Note is a note and sketchbook app, PDF annotation tool, voice memo and digital scrapbook for your life. Capture your ideas anytime with quick voice recordings, advanced handwriting recognition and handwriting to text conversion, or annotate Office and PDF documents. Use the app as a high resolution sketchbook with a vast color wheel palette, pastel colors and advanced calligraphy pens.  

MetaMoJi Note is a virtual whiteboard for sketching, annotation, scrapbooking or digital mashup of notes and voice.  

MetaMoJi Note is the only note-taking app available across all major mobile platforms ‚Äì iOS, Android and Windows. Winner of multiple awards: Tabby Award for Best Personal Productivity App - Silver Stevie¬Æ Award for International Business - Finalist for Appy Award for Productivity - #1 Productivity App in Japan

Key Features
‚Ä¢ Write, sketch or draw notes with a variety of pens, paper layouts and graphics, including calligraphy pens and inks
‚Ä¢ Scale your document up to a whiteboard or down to a sticky note while still maintaining 100% visual integrity
‚Ä¢ Import a PDF file, mark it up as needed, and save it as another PDF file 
‚Ä¢ Share creations by email or upload to Twitter, Facebook or Tumblr
‚Ä¢ Easy file storing and sharing via Google Drive, Evernote and Dropbox
‚Ä¢ Sync all folders to the MetaMoJi Cloud, a cloud service that allows you to save and manage your documents (up to 2GB for free)
‚Ä¢ Save drawings as individual JPEG graphics in the items library for later use
‚Ä¢ Interactively browse the web from within the app and mark up sites
‚Ä¢ Built-in spell checker
‚Ä¢ Smart cropping tool vastly extends photo editing

MetaMoJi Note Lite is free to download and use. This version, MetaMoJi Note is a paid app, has the great features above, along with the following advanced capabilities:

‚Ä¢ Grab your great ideas quickly with voice memos which you can tag to your visual content ‚Äì convenient audio editing features allow you to index voice cues to any document or part of a document ‚Äì even drawings, annotated graphics or  PDF documents.
‚Ä¢ Password protect your notes to ensure your information is kept safe
‚Ä¢ Advanced pen styles including highlighters, fountain pens and brushes
‚Ä¢ Enhanced Jump functions allow for you to assign visual points to easily navigate around complex compositions while you are presenting
‚Ä¢ Shapes tool provides editable shapes
‚Ä¢ Import images, graphics and Microsoft Office files via Google Drive
‚Ä¢ Gold Service is a premium add-on that allows you to make advanced use of the MetaMoJi Cloud and the app itself. It includes: 
  - The Shared Drive capability allows co-editing of documents
  - Auto sync intervals to ensure your notes are always backed up
  - Additional storage for the MetaMoJi Cloud
  - Unlimited access to optional inks, premium items, papers and note styles
‚Ä¢ Premium feature (*): Handwriting Recognition - mazec (13 languages) - converts handwritten text to typed text on the fly or later with this conversion engine.
(*) Requires purchase of additional mazec app for this functionality.

Here are some ways to use MetaMoJi Note for your personal and business life:
‚Ä¢  Generate quick notes and to-do lists, add voice memos and tag for easy retrieval later
‚Ä¢  Capture and markup website pages
‚Ä¢  Sketch drawings for illustrating lesson plans
‚Ä¢  Mark up and sign contracts and critical business documents in PDF form 
‚Ä¢  Use as an interactive whiteboard to brainstorm and present during team meetings
‚Ä¢  PDF and photo annotation
‚Ä¢  Review/edit documents and share feedback through email

Learn more:
More about MetaMoJi Note: http://noteanytime.com/ 
Support: http://noteanytime.com/en/support.html

‚Ä¢ Advanced pen styles including highlighters, fountain pens and brushes
‚Ä¢ Enhanced Jump functions allow for you to assign visual points to easily navigate around complex compositions while you are presenting
‚Ä¢ Shapes tool provides editable shapes
‚Ä¢ Import images, graphics and Microsoft Office files via Google Drive
‚Ä¢ Gold Service is a premium add-on that allows you to make advanced use of the MetaMoJi Cloud and the app itself. It includes:
- The Shared Drive capability allows co-editing of documents
- Auto sync intervals to ensure your notes are always backed up
- Additional storage for the MetaMoJi Cloud
- Unlimited access to optional inks, premium items, papers and note styles
‚Ä¢ Premium feature (*): Handwriting Recognition - mazec (13 languages) - converts handwritten text to typed text on the fly or later with this conversion engine.
(*) Requires purchase of additional mazec app for this functionality.

Here are some ways to use MetaMoJi Note for your personal and business life:
‚Ä¢ Generate quick notes and to-do lists, add voice memos and tag for easy retrieval later
‚Ä¢ Capture and markup website pages
‚Ä¢ Sketch drawings for illustrating lesson plans
‚Ä¢ Mark up and sign contracts and critical business documents in PDF form
‚Ä¢ Use as an interactive whiteboard to brainstorm and present during team meetings
‚Ä¢ PDF and photo annotation
‚Ä¢ Review/edit documents and share feedback through email

Learn more:
More about MetaMoJi Note: http://noteanytime.com/
Support: http://noteanytime.com/en/support.html
summary: Capture Your Inspiration. Take a Note of Anything, Anywhere with MetaMoJi Note.
developerAddress:
Zentoku Roppongi Bldg. East4F
1-7-27 Roppongi Minato-ku Tokyo
106-0032 JAPAN
recentChanges: - Changed available Android OS version from 4.0 or later to 5.0 or later
comments: I think this is a pretty good application for notes and annotating. I just wish they could update the user interface and make it more modern, among other things....

It worked well for a while but it had problems with the beginning with sending to an app. Google drive never worked. Now I cannot export to any app so I cannot create a pdf to share my notes with my I will look for alternative solutions for my classes. Not worth its price.
Amazing app. i use it for teaching. it worked perfectly on my previous device. on my new device the lasso tool is not working and that is frustrating.

Paid app is working well. However, app has not been updated since 2018... a year ago. Lack of updates and new and improved features being added is a big disappointment! I expect more from apps that charge for full featured versions. I will most likely switch to a different app that is regularly updated with improvements and added features since Metamoji is starting to lag behind other similar apps.

Not much better than the lite version to justify cost, plus you can't change fonts for text boxes. Pretty much abandonware and FAQ website linked in app no longer exists. "Showcase," where you can get more stuff, is accessable only to people who pay a subscription fee, which you can't do on the lite version. In terms of functionality, Xodo can, and does, give it a run for it's money.

title: CalcNote Pro - Math Calculator
description:
CalcNote is a new generation of calculator designed for the smart phone.
Just type a expression, the answer will be displayed instantly. No need to tap equals.
It works like notepad or your word processor, you can see multiple questions and answers all at once.
It's like a spreadsheet but much easier and simpler.
If you make a mistake, you don't need to start again, you just fix the wrong expression.

Instant calculator & realtime results
CalcNote will instantly evaluate any mathematical expression and display result in real-time.
With a Notepad-style interface you write operations on each line and see results instantly.
You can combine text-lines with calculations.

Multi-line calculations & references
Every line in CalcNote is evaluated so you can write different operations on each.
It even allows referencing lines as in Spreadsheet so you can do multi-line combined calculations (i.e. $2+$3 adds up the results from line 2 and 3).

Different keypads with operations
Swipe right-left to switch between different keypads with multiple operations you can perform.
Regular mathematical operations, logarithmic, trigonometric functions (i.e. sin, cos), permutations/combinations as well as a percentage calculator and unit converter.

Save & Export
In CalcNote you can organize your calculation sheets, save them individually and even export expressions if you want to use them elsewhere (i.e. in Spreadsheet, in a scientific paper, etc.).

Customize appearance
You can customize CalcNote by changing its background/text color, showing/hiding line numbers, fonts, display format, customize the keypad layout and much more.

Please refer to online manual for more details
https://github.com/burton999dev/CalcNoteHelp/blob/master/documents/en/index.md

This is a Pro version of CalcNote.
I recommend that you try the free version before purchasing.
https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.burton999.notecal

Disclaimer
burton999 makes no warranty as to the accuracy or reliability or suitability of any calculation results or information provided through the CalcNote. burton999 is not also responsible for any damages, direct or indirect, which may occur by the calculation results or information provided through the CalcNote.

If you have any concerns, feedback, or questions email me at burton9999dev@gmail.com
I hope this app will be helpful for you.
Many thanks.

comments: This has become the only calculator app I will use on my phone. I can't say enough good things about it. The UI is clean and easy to understand, and solves so many problems with keeping track of multiple calculations on your mobile phone. It's clear that a lot of thought went into this app, and it is greatly appreciated. I use it every day.

Great app. I use it to keep a tab on my monthly expenses and it does a great job of it. Well done developer! One suggestion though to make the app even greater. Can you include an option "Find in file" in addition to the existing "Find in files". The " Find in file" option should limit search to the current open file. In other words, the "Find in file" should highlight all occurrences of the search string only in the current file.

Before this app, I don't know how I was able to calculate all my finances efficiently. Using this app help me do my finances on another level of efficiency. My only problem right now is that the keypad height sometimes goes half of the soft keyboard size. I would also like to see the possibility of locking the changing of saved file to prevent unwanted or accidental changes.

There are two essential calculator apps for Android, CalcNote Pro and Graphing Calculator by Mathlab; each has its own strengths, and I use them both almost daily. CalcNote Pro is incredibly functional as a traditional calc tape machine... super easy to create a save-able and printable transaction history of your calculations with embedded notes and comments. CalcnotePro lets you create your own variables, use smart line references, and define your own functions (Javascript). Simply awesome!
One of my favorite calculator apps. An extremely versitile innovation.

title: NiceLock (Ad-Free) -  Launcher for Good Lock
description:
---- NiceLock ---

NiceLock is a launcher application for goodlock customization modules for Samsung devices. 

Good Lock is an incredible official app by Samsung for customizing Samsung devices. It consists of modules which edit and change many things in the UI such as task changer,  notification panel, lockscreen, split screen and more. Unfortunately it is only available in a few countries. Even if you install them manually, most of them does not appear in your app drawer. That is where NiceLock comes into play, by acting as a launcher for all of your modules, allows you to access them.

NiceLock (Ad-Free) is ad-free and paid version of NiceLock.

Important Note:

‚Ä¢NiceLock does not install Good Lock modules due to Google Play Store rules, and you need to install these modules manually if you are outside Korea, the United States, UK, Singapore, Australia, and Canada. 

Features:
‚Ä¢Adding shortcuts to homescreen 

‚Ä¢Night Mode
NiceLock has a Night Mode option to be easier on your eyes and if you just prefer darker layouts.

‚Ä¢Cloud Database
When opened, NiceLock checks its own database to see if your modules have updates available.

‚Ä¢Cloud Rollout
When a new module is published, you will be able to see it on NiceLock instantly without even needing to update NiceLock! 

‚Ä¢Push Notifications
When a module update is available, NiceLock will send you push notifications.

‚Ä¢Material Design UI
NiceLock is updated with a fresh, clean Material Design UI. 


Good Lock ¬© is a trademark of Samsung.

comments: You need to have the official Samsung good lock app on your phone for this to function correctly. Works great. But I feel like Samsung has reduced the functionality of many of the previously available features before the One UI 3.1 update. That's just lame. Other than than it's working fine.
Very easy to use app. Updates are shown once they are available. It won't let you use a feature that is no supported on your Android version which is great to avoid messing up with the phone OS

I love all the features and how it improved my phone aesthetically. but I only have one concern, running too much apps will eat ur RAM. yes I can put some apps to sleep but idk which of nicelock apps can i put to sleep
Something isn't working on the Keys Cafe app for the NiceLock launcher. It suddenly started to show that the app isn't available in my country. :(
Very Useful Application as a replacement for Samsung official Good Lock

title: AutoRemote
description:
Remotely control your phone, PC and web (with IFTTT integration)! 

With AutoRemote you have full control of your phone, from wherever you are by sending push notifications to your phone and reacting to them in Tasker or AutoRemote standalone apps! 

Please don't leave negative feedback without contacting me first. I'll always do my best to help you, and I can't do that if I can't contact you.

AutoRemote is an amazingly flexible remote control system, them gives the user an unprecedented level of control. So, for example, you could control your PC or Chrome Browser from your Android device, control your Android device from hundreds of web services (like Facebook or Twitter for example), or even your Linux PC from anywhere. The possibilities are endless and you decide what and how things work remotely!

Check out everything you can do with AutoRemote here: http://joaoapps.com/autoremote/what-it-is/ 

Make sure you click the AutoRemote menu button at the top for a full list of possibilities.

Here's a must see video for anyone starting out with AutoRemote: http://goo.gl/RYCTh

This is how it works:
- Send an AutoRemote message from a web browser, your desktop, EventGhost, Chrome, Zapier, or any place where you can call an URL
- Setup an AutoRemote profile in Tasker to react to the message
- Do whatever you like with that message!

Check out the Quickstart guide (http://goo.gl/OhZsg)

Also, check out an awesome AutoRemote guide here: http://goo.gl/aNfuA

With device-to-device or PC-to-device messaging, you can control one of your devices from another device or even from your PC! And with a Tasker plugin to send messages via AutoRemote, you can have full bi-directional messaging!
Imagine requesting your phone's location and have it displayed in a map on your tablet or PC.

You can also directly Share links or text to another device via the regular Share menu in Android! Imagine you are checking out a YouTube video on your phone, and directly open it on your bigger Tablet screen for better viewing!

With AutoRemote you have advanced matching options and a flexible command system (see how it works here: http://goo.gl/PRQas). It works just like with joaomgcd's AutoBarcode app!

See many use case examples here, including AutoRemote uses for saving lives and keeping in touch with your loved ones: http://goo.gl/3mFgz

Possible uses for AutoRemote(all these uses are fully customizable. You are free to use any other words or commands):

Can't remember where you put your phone? Create a lost-my-phone" command:
You could send a "Where are you?" message to your phone, and have Tasker respond with a repetitive "I'm here! I'm here!".

Let your wife send you a spoken shopping list when you get off work:
You can use AutoRemote with other Tasker conditions, such as the Date and Time conditions. Create a "shop=:=" command and  combine it with a 5PM condition. Then, share your personal AutoRemote URL with your wife and have her send stuff she needs you to buy like "shop=:=carrots and ice cream". Then, at 5PM your phone could say that list out loud: "You need to go shopping! You need to buy carrots and ice cream"

Find my Phone:
Send a "location" command and have your phone respond with its location via AutoRemote to another Android device, or simply SMS to any phone

And many many more! Your imagination is the limit!

- Fixed notification sounds not working
- Fixed crashes on some services (Wifi, Bluetooth)

comments: After buying this extension on my phone, i was not able to install on my tablet. I emailed the developer and was assisted accordingly. The issue was play store is not updating properly, so clearing the cache and storage for play store on my phone and tablet solved the issue. I just had the app for less than a day but have created several useful task to control my tablet. Very easy to use.

It's an very useful app and it works like butter, but I'm missing a feature that I like to see. I would like to have a option for automatically copying the message that you've received. Keep on going Jo√£o Dias.

If you like fiddling with and tweaking android, plus doing basically anything you can find a sensor or way to communicate for.... Tasker is your app. Autoremote is a welcome extension that enables you to easily communicate between devices. Joao is literally a god with Android dev. Dunno how they do it, but Tasker gets great support, has a huge featureset, and thus far I have yet to be disappointed in any of the plugins they've written. My minor critique: There's probably a bit better of a way to get device registration and such done - the QR code is kind of awk since some devices don't fully support that OOB, and... the link was kind of a pain to figure out how to copy. My suggestion would be enabling a few other options, like NFC or Bluetooth to do this. Anyway, great app, can't find much wrong with it.

If you don't like this app, it's very likely it's because you've not taken the time to understand it. THIS PRODUCT IS FOR LIFE HACKERS. I've been using this to remotely lock my work PC for a long time. Coupled with the Chrome extension, EventGhost (on PC) and Autohotkey, you could tell your PC to email a file using Outlook with one simple push from phone. You could even have your phone tell you that someone woke your PC while you were away.

Very cool plug in. Its a bit like having a remote server to relay data between devices, while only having to make a one time payment. The only downside for me was latency with mobile networks. Not a good mix. It caused reliability issues and profiles were getting backed up. It would stop receiving, eventually bug out, then run old commands when corrected after a long retry process.

title: Twomon SE -  Portable Display, USB Monitor
description:
*To use Twomon SE, the PC program and the manufacturer ADB driver must be installed on the PC.

Twomon SE is very simple. Your tablet becomes a USB monitor at the moment you connect.

Do you want to take a lecture smarter in the lecture room?
Meet your tablet as a dual monitor. With Twomon SE, you do not need to hide and load several programs on your monitor.

Is there a monitor shortage while editing a video?
Meet your tablet with a dual monitor. If you have the Twomon SE, you can use additional monitor in a small space.

You can download the PC program from the website for free.

Website: http://www.easynlight.com/en/twomonse


Twomon SE supports PC and device below.

- Windows 10 version 1703 or later / WDDM version 2.0 or later
- Android 6.0 or later

Twomon SE always has a friendly tech support team.
Please feel free to contact us through our website if you have any questions. :)

Q&A: http://www.easynlight.com/en/contacttwomon

comments: I believe some people have good experience and testimony on this app. My experience is somewhat different. At first the app on my pc does not launch and the one on the tab just opens & does nothing even after connecting the USBcord. Now I get an error message on licence failed& I signed in with the google account I used to purchase. "Dude, I only have 1 Google account on the damn device"üò† I went to their contact page and it's telling me to upload log when I have screenshot?
I bought this aps yesterday, but it doesn't work on my laptop-tablet. Not user friendly. How to refund?

This used to be a well functioning app. That's why I bought it: Dual monitors via usb cable or wifi. Until ... changes were made. The app seems to have been completely overhauled and now it is no longer working. Even their website isn't running properly. No transparency, in fact, this is theft! So may this be a warning before putting your trust and money in this company.

I downloaded it to my tablet and somehow it doesn't let me use it. I purchased it with the same google account and I get a constant message of ''Failed to check google play licensing. Please make sure that the account used to make the purchase is logged in.'' But I am!! Uninstalled and re-installed it a bunch of times. I do not have another Google account linked. This is the issue. My license cannot be retrieved.
No longer works! Went from 5 stars to 1 star... fix it and it'll go back to 5. Galaxy Tab S4 - Win10 64 bit - Samsung USB Drivers installed

title: Gamma Calculator Pro
description:
Save time with this exposure calculator for Iridium-192, Selinium-75 and Cobalt-60 sources.

==> Pro version includes Barricade calculation for 2mR and 100Mr distance.

No more need to calculate the formula or use of the "old-school plastic calculator"

Simply fill in the thickness, activity(in Curies) and source-film-distance and you get the correct exposure time.

R factor for different densities and film types.
descriptionHTML:
Save time with this exposure calculator for Iridium-192, Selinium-75 and Cobalt-60 sources.

==> Pro version includes Barricade calculation for 2mR and 100Mr distance.

No more need to calculate the formula or use of the "old-school plastic calculator"

Simply fill in the thickness, activity(in Curies) and source-film-distance and you get the correct exposure time.

R factor for different densities and film types.
summary: Exposure time calculator (and more!) for NDT technicians.
recentChanges: Light/Dark Colour Theme selection in Settings.
comments: The app is incredibly useful. But is there any way you could add in Copper, Cast Iron, Concrete and Stainless Steel for different material types? In my neck of the woods, we deal with each of these different material types as well as the ones you have already. If you could get that going, this app would be my go-to. Hands down
Really great app. Simple UI, extra radiation tools and they updated to have dark mode for the use in the dark room. Good stuff.

The specific emission constant for Iridium is incorrect. In Canada we use 480mR/hr not 520 or 590 like in the settings. I have emailed asking to have it fixed with no reply. It is a big difference in value and can alter our times quite significantly. Hopefully you can change it.
I have been using this app for a few years and it really works well. Sometimes the density is a little off due to variables but it's always close
works great! does anyone know if you are able to use this app with samsung smart watches?

title: Electrician's Helper
description:
Electrician's helper provides many useful calculators and converters for electricians and anyone working with power distribution.

Both the NEC and CEC codes are covered.

With Electrician‚Äôs Helper you can...

‚óè	Calculate voltage, current and power in 3 phase delta and wye circuits.
‚óè	Find the ampacity of a conductor as per the NEC and CEC tables.
‚óè	Calculate the voltage drop in a line based on length, size, current and    				temperature.
‚óè	Find the total box fill by entering the size and number of conductors, straps and clamps.
‚óè	Find the maximum number of conductors allowed in a particular size raceway based on NEC and CEC rules.
‚óè	Determine what size raceway is needed for a bundle of conductors.
‚óè	Find the maximum bend radius of a conduit.
‚óè	Find the maximum capacitor kvar for a motor and the current reduction obtained.
‚óè	Find the motor current, heater current, breaker required, wire size, starter and conduit size for a particular 3 phase motor.
‚óè	Find the full load current of an induction, squirrel cage, and synchronous motor.
‚óè	Calculate voltage, current and kVA values for single and three phase transformers.
‚óè	Find the locked rotor current of a single or 3 phase motor.
‚óè	Do basic Ohm‚Äôs law calculations.
‚óè	Find decimal equivalents of fractions.
‚óè	Convert temperature scales.
‚óè	Look up connector configurations.

comments: I think it's a great app... My only question is why the ampacity tables are so much lower than what the NEC states is allowable?

can't manually enter number of wires while looking for maximum wires for conduit fill. you have to just tap the 'add 1' until it gets to the number you want... and when it is over a hundred clicks (like number of 12ga wire in a 2 in. EMT) that really sucks. please address that and let us be able to manually type in the number of wires we are adding instead of just having to click 'Add 1' for every wire! edit: thanks for the reply! look forward to the update!
Maximum Wires under "Conduit" section mistakenly says "Conduit Type" when choosing WIRE type.
great help
This is the best field app for electricians  I have found . I have had it for about 5 years and it is still getting updates

title: Mouse Jiggler/Wiggler/Mover
description:
TAKE BACK CONTROL OF YOUR WORKSTATION!!!
Mouse Mover is an app whose sole function is to "fake" mouse input to your computer. Useful for avoiding screen-savers/lock screens that are triggered by inactivity. This means you can stop entering your password 57 times per day!

DO NOT CONNECT your device to your workstation. Just place your mouse over the app screen on your phone. The proprietary/patented imaging technology fools the mouse into thinking it is moving - deactivating the screen saver/lock screen. (You may need to experiment with the angle of the mouse.)

If you're giving a presentation, or just watching a movie, and you don't want your lock screen constantly popping up, the Mouse Mover is the perfect app. 

Uses:
* Great for remote workers and telecommuters.
* Keep your chat software green during long lunches.
* Stop a screensaver/lock screen when you step away from your desk.
* Stop a screensaver/lock screen when attending a meeting.
* Great for presentations.
* Great for on-line training.
* Stop a screensaver/lock screen when watching a video.
* Keep your VPN up when inactive at your workstation.
* Keep workstation from going to sleep on long operations.
* Stop a screensaver/lock screen when your attention is on another console.
* Stop a screensaver/lock screen from activating during an installation or long operations.


Features:
* Optional deactivation timer - keep your screen up however long YOU want.
* Unlike USB devices, this app is not detectable by system admins.
* Includes settings page to customize the app for your mouse.
* Automatically disables  auto-lock -- but only if device is on it's back AND app is in use.


Patent Pending

comments: I've revised my review because I've found that suspending the mouse a few mm above the phone's screen makes it work (Microsoft wired red LED mouse).
App works fine. However if you are paying for an app it shouldnt have ads.
Works great for me! I also own a bunch of portable usb anti-idlers but this works just great!
If your mouse works on glass, this doesnt work.
This app does not work, should have listened to the reviews. Not everyone hords old computer junk.

title: KIT Scenarist
descriptionHTML:
KIT Scenarist will allow you to have at hand all your screenplays. You can write down ideas, work out dialogues of characters, or describe actions without leaving the hammock. Send the script to the editor by mail during a trip on the subway. And even edit projects at the same time as your co-authors from different parts of the globe.

Features:
‚Ä¢ creation of projects on the device and in the cloud service (ability to work with KIT Scenarist's cloud is an additional service);
‚Ä¢ fill basic information about the script (script name, title page, logline, and synopsis);
‚Ä¢ create lists of characters and locations and fill their descriptions;
‚Ä¢ create text notes on the project with the ability to group notes by folders within each project;
‚Ä¢ work with a ‚Äãscreenplay in corkboard mode;
‚Ä¢ viewing screenplay text and editing it in accordance with industry standards;
‚Ä¢ view the list of scenes and navigate the text of the script;
‚Ä¢ the possibility of reviewing the text of the script (highlighting, adding comments);
‚Ä¢ import scripts from the formats fdx, fountain, docx and kitsp from any installed application (mail, Dropbox, Google Drive etc.);
‚Ä¢ export notes and scripts to pdf, fdx, fountain docx and kitsp formats in any of the installed applications (mail, Dropbox, Google Drive etc.).

Mobile application KIT Scenarist is only one of the components of a fully-featured studio for working on screenplays KIT Scenarist. Look to our website, where you can meet with other useful tools for creating stories that will help raise your productivity to a new level!

kitscenarist.com
summary: Simple and powerful screenplay editor.
recentChanges:
- an updated version of the application core;
- added an image gallery module;
- implemented saving backup copies of scripts;
- added the ability to restore a script from a backup;
- fixed a problem with highlighting and scrolling cards;
- fixed the problem when the names of characters or locations were erased in the script if they were changed in the research module.
comments: It is a good app though it has loads of glitches makes it hard to work.

I do love using the mobile version and the desktop version. But here are a few things I do wish. 1) There was a better way to go from mobile to desktop. Even with me using google drive I still have to upload it via google docs in order to keep it under the same document. 2) A spell check, I have to stop writing every now and then in order to upload to grammarly in order to replace mispelled words and such. 3) An option to make the fonts larger or zoom in on the mobile version.
Can not import ktsp files...

It has everything you could ever want in a screenwriting app. However, it has glitches. When you highlight and try to replace a word it will quirk, and when you type a character's name it prompts the name history, tap the full name "John Doe" then it just puts "John." Wouldn't be a problem if it didn't create a first name as a whole new character in the resources listing. Now there's "John Doe" and "John."
It may be laggy and direct port from PC, but that's the best screen writting app so far.

title: Day by Day Organizer PRO
description:
Day by Day is a planning application designed to fully implement Google Calendar and Google Tasks as an all-in-one Android application. With its help you can plan your future schedule using any Android device and this schedule will be available for all your phones and tablets connected to Internet.

Features:
‚ñ™ presentation of events and tasks in one list
‚ñ™ synchronization with Google Calendar and Google Tasks
‚ñ™ incorporation of your contacts‚Äô birthdays into the common list
‚ñ™ easy-to-handle agenda and month view
‚ñ™ text month view, text week view, day view
‚ñ™ interactive widget on the device desktop
‚ñ™ configurable widget layout
‚ñ™ lock screen widget in Android 4.2+ Jelly Bean
‚ñ™ birthday reminder
‚ñ™ voice input
‚ñ™ search function

The paid version features:
‚ñ™ text month widget, week widget - Android 4.1+ supported 
‚ñ™ ability to use different profiles in widgets and the app
‚ñ™ invitations for events and check of guest list
‚ñ™ Tasker app is supported. E.g. you can have a task reminder to go off when you come to work. https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=net.dinglisch.android.taskerm
‚ñ™ recurrent tasks. The function is well-suited for recurrent payments. You can try it out in free version
‚ñ™ task priorities which allow the user to differentiate between urgent and less important tasks
‚ñ™ subtasks (to-do lists) in events or tasks. You cannot add more than 3 subtasks in free version, but the full one has no limits
‚ñ™ no ads
‚ñ™ users can share text information from another app with Day by Day, for example, when creating task or event

Although Google services don‚Äôt support these extra functions, we found a way to enable synchronization by means of Google, so your calendars and to-do lists are visible in our app on your Android devices.

The app allows you to create events, tie them to a certain start/end time and set due date. An event can be postponed if needed. When creating an event you are prompted to set a reminder which will keep you informed of your schedule.

Day by Day organizer brings various aspects of your life together in an attempt to simplify the tasks you have to deal with throughout the day. This calendar with to-do list is so simple that no further explanation is actually needed, just download and enjoy!

The DayByDay team wishes you more interesting events and tasks you would love to accomplish with a little help from Day by Day!



Day by Day team

comments: Great app for integrating appointments and to do lists. Just wish you could rearrange the daily to dos. I often plan on doing things in a certain order but the list can't be ordered other than high, normal, and low priorities.

I've been using it for years and it' great. One thing though, i can't seem to be able to remove holidays such as fathers day from the calendar. I removed the regional holidays from the app through settings and did the same in the google calendar etc. I think i did everything possible and followed various online tutorials but those holidays still show which is a bit annoying.
Absolutely love the app. Been using it since it came out and does wonders for my very busy schedule. Great job!
I can't eliminate an old task that was repeated... it drives me nuts.

I emailed for a refund as I was charged two times for the fully functional app, but this company will not email me back. Buyer beware! This company will not give you the time of day after they have your money. They constantly advice people to contact them via email, but they will not answer that email. I have emailed the correct email, but they act like they have not received my email requesting a refund!

title: Fire Shifts - Pro
description:
Pro version of Fire Shifts, a customizable Fire and EMS Shift Calendar. Syncs with Google Calendar to display certain symbols on your Fire Shifts Calendar.  

**Galaxy S5 **
If you have the Galaxy S5, the menu button is missing from your phone. You need to hold down for a few seconds the left button and the menu will come up.
**end Galaxy S5 **

A customizable Fire and EMS Shift Calendar.

Easily select various shift types such as 24/48 (ABC), 48/96 (AABBCC), etc.  Customize labels and colors for each of your shifts to easily highlight your personal schedule.  Visit www.fireshifts.com to see a full list of scheduling options.  

The symbols appear on your Fire Shift Calendar by putting certain words in your event title on your Google Calendar:

Trade Off = To
Trade Work = Tw
Training = T
Payday = $
Vacation = V
Holiday = *
Appointment (or appt or appoint) = a
Overtime = ot
On Call (or oncall) = oC
Kelly Day = + 
Debit Day (or debitday) = dd

Works indefinitely. No purchasing of yearly licenses, free updates, no subscriptions fees.

Feedback is appreciated: kevin@fireshifts.com

Type & Offset for requested cities are listed here:
http://www.fireshifts.com/type-offset/

Tutorial for Calendar sync here:
http://www.fireshifts.com/about/

comments: The app was working sometime ago and now the last 4 or 5 days are missing on all calendar months. Its been like this now well over 12 months and still nothing has been done to fix the issue. Until it is fixed, its a useless app.

I have loved using this app for my husband's shift pattern, it saves me having to carry a diary around with me. However just recently the last week of each month is not showing fully which is getting a bit irritating for an app I have paid for! is this likely to be sorted out soon?
Says it syncs with Google calendar but only inputs events from Google calendar to this app. Doesn't input shifts to Google calendar which is what I use. Also, does not have widget
The last week of the month is not showing in the calendar. please fix or this calendar is useless.
Handy, but stopped syncing. I've checked all permissions with the phone and calendar app, and they're all good to go. Ideas?

title: Vijeo Design'Air
description:
Vijeo Design'Air is Schneider Electric‚Äôs NEW application for tablets and smartphones! With Vijeo Design'Air, use your tablet or smartphone to remotely connect to a Magelis HMI terminal over a wireless network.

During the design phase in Vijeo Designer, set up the HMI terminal so Vijeo Design'Air can find it on the network. Secure access to the HMI with user authentication during login.

In this configuration, the HMI terminal acts as the server, while the tablet or smartphone acts as the client. The server and client communicate over WiFi , 3G, 4G, or LTE networks.

After establishing the connection, use your tablet or smartphone to remotely interact with the HMI terminal. For example, touch or swipe to start or stop a process or navigate between screens; pinch to zoom in and out of a screen for better viewing.

Requirement:
Vijeo Design'Air requires Vijeo Designer V6.1 SP2 or later on your HMI targets.

Limitations:
‚Ä¢ Target families not supported: XBTGT1000 Series, XBTGT1005 Series, XBTGC Series
‚Ä¢ Target color modes not supported: 256 Colors
‚Ä¢ Target color mode partially supported: 16 Level Grey Scale with Blink (image quality issue)

TRY our free versions:
 - Vijeo Design‚ÄôAir FREE is the full application Vijeo Design‚ÄôAir with the following limitations:
You can connect to an HMI for 2 minutes.  After 2 minutes, the connection will close and you will be taken back to the discovery screen
After you have used the application for the time limit above, you cannot restart again for 5 minutes.
 
- With Vijeo Design‚ÄôAir DEMO, use your tablet or smartphone to simulate a connection to a Magelis HMI terminal. 
The application does not require any wireless connection, the connection is totally simulated.

You will be also interested by Vijeo Design‚ÄôAir Plus, which enables you to create a tablet/smartphone project specifically for the tablet/smartphone display size.

For any support, please contact Schneider Electric.

title: HD Financial Calculator Gold
description:
HD Gold financial calculator emulates HP 12c financial calculator for Android mobile phones. It fully implements the functionality and financial formulas of HP 12c.

***** Recommended by the American Association of Individual Investors *****
http://www.aaii.com/computerized-investing/article/hd-12c-financial-calculator

HP 12C User Guide is available from the link below:
http://www.hd12c.com 

Features:

* Time value of money (loans, savings, and leasing)
* Amortization
* Bond price and yield to maturity
* Cash flow analysis NPV, IRR
* Memory for up to 20 cash flows
* SL, DB, SOYD depreciation methods
* Percentage change, percentage of total
* Cumulative statistical analysis
* Std. deviation, mean, weighted mean
* Linear regression
* Forecasting, correlation coefficient
* Total, ‚àëx, ‚àëx2, ‚àëy, ‚àëy2, ‚àëxy
* +, -, x, %, √∑, 1/x, ¬±, LN, ex, n!
* Date arithmetic
* Keystroke programming
* Program memory capacity: 99 steps
* More...

In addition to providing all the functionality of Hp 12c financial calculator, HD 12c financial calculator has the following extra features:

* SWIPE-able keypad provides a big keypad on small screen Android mobile phones.
* X, Y, Z, T register values are all displayed on screen.
* Customisable screen orientation
* Save/load programs to/from your mobile phone‚Äôs SD card
* Settings to enable/disable key click and vibration
* Memories are not converted to store program steps
* Configurable 10 or 12 or 14 digit display
* Help available on each of the keys
* Supports nearly all the screen sizes

If you need any help or have any questions, please feel free to email me hanlin.day@gmail.com.

Please consider the time difference between countries and allow 24 hours for support to respond to your request.

http://www.hd12c.com

Features:

* Time value of money (loans, savings, and leasing)
* Amortization
* Bond price and yield to maturity
* Cash flow analysis NPV, IRR
* Memory for up to 20 cash flows
* SL, DB, SOYD depreciation methods
* Percentage change, percentage of total
* Cumulative statistical analysis
* Std. deviation, mean, weighted mean
* Linear regression
* Forecasting, correlation coefficient
* Total, ‚àëx, ‚àëx2, ‚àëy, ‚àëy2, ‚àëxy
* +, -, x, %, √∑, 1/x, ¬±, LN, ex, n!
* Date arithmetic
* Keystroke programming
* Program memory capacity: 99 steps
* More...

In addition to providing all the functionality of Hp 12c financial calculator, HD 12c financial calculator has the following extra features:

* SWIPE-able keypad provides a big keypad on small screen Android mobile phones.
* X, Y, Z, T register values are all displayed on screen.
* Customisable screen orientation
* Save/load programs to/from your mobile phone‚Äôs SD card
* Settings to enable/disable key click and vibration
* Memories are not converted to store program steps
* Configurable 10 or 12 or 14 digit display
* Help available on each of the keys
* Supports nearly all the screen sizes

If you need any help or have any questions, please feel free to email me hanlin.day@gmail.com.

Please consider the time difference between countries and allow 24 hours for support to respond to your request.
summary: HD Financial Calculator emulates HP 12c financial calculator for Android phones

comments: The Windows 10 implementation is outstanding but surprisingly the Android version is even better as it has better graphics and much better help. This is truly a five star app.
Didnt install. It now needs access to my files & photos and external file storage. Why would a calculator need that other than the obvious reason.
One of my favorite apps ever! Works JUST LIKE the actual HP-12c financial calculator. 5 stars! üòä
Bug.  Left most digit on display cut off on S8+. Otherwise great. New release did not fix. Please fix.
Faithful reproduction. Works very well.

title: E2PDF Pro - SMS and Call Backup with Restore
description:
Now user can enjoy Backup & Restore feature for SMS and Call Log. Backup & Restore feature is available in XML while additional PDF feature is available for SMS, Call Log, Contact along with Call Log and SMS Statistics. 

 DISTINCT FEATURES OF APP  

 1- SMS Backup & Restore in XML/ SMS Backup into PDF

E2PDF Pro is very simple but highly productive app that allows you to take backup of your SMS conversation with your loved once and then never loose that again. All you have to do is to select conversation and before taking backup in PDF, whole conversation appears on your screen, you will enter output file name and with one click backup will be created. SMS backup is possible with 3 steps now. Generated backup file can be stored on local drive or in email and can be instantaneously shared.

Use of this features is vast, few of its main usage points are mentioned below.

* Chat with your loved once
* Contractors chat
* Real estate communications
* Custody Hearings
* Work Related conversation
* Customer conversation
* Backup SMS
* Upload SMS backup to Dropbox ( requires Dropbox App )
* Email your SMS messages

Many network operators charged customers upto $30 for taking prints of sms.

2-  CALL LOG (OPTIONAL DIALED, RECEIVED, MISSED CALL, DATE RANGE)  
Call Log can be efficiently backuped and Restore with E2PDF Pro. Backup is created in XML format. In addition to this, user can create Backup in PDF format which is well designed.  With PDF backup feature, you can select either to take backup of Dialed, Received, Missed call or take complete Call Log and can use it as per your requirement. 

3- CONTACTS  Backup with (OPTIONAL CONTACT NAME, CONTACT NUMBER, EMAIL ADDRESS) 
This backup feature is available in PDF format. User can take Contact backup with contact name, number and email address. In addition to this, user also had option of selecting orphan email addresses.

4-  SPECIFIC CONTACT LOG (OPTIONAL (SMS, CALL LOG))   
With Specific contact log, you can take PDF backup of Call log and SMS of that specific contact. This feature is amazing to filter out specific contact log from complete Call log and SMS


5-  CALL STATISTICS  
Call Statistics allows you get statistical information of number of Dialed, Received, Missed calls and rejected calls on daily basis. In addition you will also get information of total call duration of specified date range.

6-  SMS STATISTICS  
With SMS statistics, you will get number of SMS Sent/Received on daily basis and as well as total number of SMS Sent/Received during specified time range.

You can further apply filter by selecting custom date range.

Generated backup files (XML and PDF) are all stored in mobile internal storage. PDF is generated using stranded writers so output file is compatible with almost all known readers including Nitro PDF reader, Adobe Acobat, Xodo PDF Reader, Sumantra , Radaee ,Preview, Foxit, PDF-XChange and many more.
The output generated file can easily be shared over email, Whatsapp, Wifi-direct, Bluetooth and you can save it directly to your any cloud location.

 Free version of app is available at  
https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.tekxperiastudios.pdfexporter

QUESTIONS? CONTACT US: 

Please send us new features suggestion, bug report or at daydreamerspack@gmail.com

Day Dreamers Team don't provide any kind of data authenticity in generated file. 
If user have to use it then it will be total user own responsibility.

title: Ammo Handler
description:
Time-saving, accurate, and field portable solution for making sure you stay on the right side of transport regulations.

SIMPLE NAVIGATION KEEPS YOU MOVING FORWARD

Even your cherry LT can‚Äôt get lost working his way through this app. Forget flipping back and forth through hundreds of pages trying to sort through hazard classifications and nomenclature‚Ä¶ Straightforward, no-frills design keeps it simple and to the point.

ACCURACY YOU CAN RELY ON EVERY TIME

Instantly sort everything in your convoy according to Federal requirements with a simple swipe! Logical algorithms eliminate human error and manage risk so you don‚Äôt have to.

A DAY‚ÄôS WORK DONE IN SECONDS

Predictive search makes finding items EASY and FAST. A couple of swipes later, and your transport log is done.

Store all your logs for repeat trips to the range, easily look up munitions for quick reference, load out with the necessary hazard placards and more! 

See an inaccuracy or something didn't sort right?
We've spent a ton of time testing this product for accuracy, but if we missed something, let us know by emailing us at Support@alljackedupstudios.com and we'll correct it and push out an update ASAP!

Thanks for downloading, and don't forget to rate us so we know how we're doing!

comments: Reliable along with yellow book, but updates are needed, March 3 2020: just installed the update, and it's even better than before, my full-time job is for the DOD as an Ammunition Inspector, but I am currently deployed and just got in theatre and I my mission switched so now I am here as my primary MOS 89B, this app is more than helpful and I always tell those signing for Aummunition about it because of compatibility issues and not knowing how many trucks are needed, the update made it better
SO much faster than the Yellowbook!
Great app with good potential. Good future update would be to integrate hazard classes. So much faster than reading charts in the yellow book

I'm a ammo Handler. There is other yellow book apps out there but this by far has to be the best. I would highly recommend anybody that has to handle ammo to download this and have it on your phone. I use it every day and it easy for people that are not ammo handlers to use

title: DS file
description:
* In order to use the DS file browser's file manager enabled on Android 11(R) or higher, you must allow the "access to manage all files" permission.
* To run this application, you must own a Synology NAS and run DSM 6.2 on your Synology NAS to get full functionality *

DS file Browser 3rd Party app. with Synology NAS file station support for Android TVs and Android devices.

You can view the files stored on a Synology NAS using Synology File Station official API.
(In order to play Contents, you must have an app installed that supports that contents.)
DS file Browser is a useful tool to perform tasks such as browsing photos, watching videos or checking work documents.

In particular, it supports Android TV remote control.

- Long press the Right Button on DPAD or Menu Button to select the menu.
- Press the Right Button on DPAD to select the item menu.
- Long press the Center Button on DPAD to select files/dirs for File Management.
- Long Press the Back Button to terminate the app. 

For video files, MX Player / Pro (https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.mxtech.videoplayer.ad) allows you to stream various subtitles.
(Supports downloading and playing subtitles automatically when connecting to HTTPS using an IP address.)

- Solved the problem of subtitles not playing in MX Player when connecting to HTTPS from DS video or DS file.
- The subtitle file automatically recognizes subtitles with the same name as the video file except the extension.
- Support multiple subtitle files.

* Features 

- Synology QuickConnect ID support.
- 2-pass authentication(OTP) support.
- mDNS/DNS-SD Synology NAS discovery function support.  
- File/folder creation, move, copy and delete function support(Local/DSM).
- File Filter function support.
- Storage Access Framework(SAF) file access function support.
- Image preview function support at the file icons.
- Background service for downloading / uploading files or folders.
- Continue playback for MX Player/MX Player Pro.
- Built-in ImageViewer support.
- Built-in TextViewer support.

title: RCoid Pro - Remote Control
description:
Remote Control for Android - create your own universal remote control and take it always with you. 

Control contemporary all your equipment like tv, radio, receiver, light control, rgb led strip,  reflex camera, air handling unit and many more without long loading time. The app provides smartphones with an infrared diode like Samsung Galaxy S5, S4, S4 Mini, Note 3, Tab 3, Medion Lifetab or HTC ONE as well as the JBMedia Light-Manager Air / Pro+ with Wifi-Bridge.

In order to be able to control the JBMedia Light Manager, it must already be set up completely and be accessible in the WLAN. Then you only have to enter the IP in RCoid and you can immediately assign all scenes or actuators to the remote control.
In addition, it is also possible to forward all IR signals from the RCoid database via WLAN to the JB MediaLight Manager and to send them from this device. Since the infrared transmission power of the JB-Media is stronger than that of the mobile phone, this increases the reliability controlling the devices. And narrative are now also mobile phones without infrared compatible to RCoid.

I work on a databank for RCoid-remote controls. Try, if an existing file work with your equipment. Often remote-controls from the same or sometimes also from a different producer are compatible with other equipment.

Alternativ you can create your own IR remote control. You can decide the shape, the size, the rotation and the color of the buttons. The necessary IR-codes can you find in the internet.
i.e. http://lirc.sourceforge.net/remotes, http://irdb.globalcache.com/Home/Database, http://www.remotecentral.com/cgi-bin/codes/ or http://irdb.tk/find/
You are supported with  IR-code-generators for RC5, RC6 and LIRC-Files(without mention of a protocoll).

If you didn‚Äòt find a compatible file for your device or if you need help creating your widgets, please contact us at support@RCoid.de. We would be pleased to help you.

comments: While the UI looks quite clunky and dated by now, it is probably the best remote app I have ever used. There are a lot of profiles out of the box and creating new ones is quite easy.   These two advantages place it over the other IR apps for me. There have been no other apps that supported my soundbar as well as this one for example.  If your phone does have an IR-Blaster this is in my opinion the best app to use.

Brilliant app. Well worth paying to remove ads and get multi select for moving or copying. Have set up remotes for TVs, pvrs and home cinema using closest available from app then edit to match my remotes adding any missing controls and using IR codes off the web. Also added a remote with macros to control my 3 devices in the room. Only criticism is that there is not enough detailed help on using all the functionality and the help videos are in German
Great so far Though would like to have this radio pioneer remote for AVIC-VH0099 unit added soon
Does not control my visible it doesn't control my 18TDVR Box does not call control my rokia sound
The best IR Remote app is even better now with RC toy for phones without IR blaster. I love the customization and multiple protocols.

comments: It's unstable on my android 8, 10 and 11 but loves Android9. Floating Widgets is most important purchase feature for me. However, Floating Widgets dont have a quick minimize to icon size button, transparency takes for Floating App icons but not for Floating Widgets :bummer. App drains massive background CPU 8/10/11 why you talking about saving juice on floating widgets. However, this baby luvs Android 9 folks- fast - no juice drain - zero hangs. I recommend it4 Android9 users only or Beware!
I've kind of been thinking that ohhh, it's the use accessibility feature that is duplicating said "storage space". And just now, doubleblind.
Beware that to use all features you will have pay to extra. I have already paid for the app. I should not have to pay extra to use it. Very unhappy. UNINSTALLED.

Awesome app with stellar and mobile-friendly feature. Worth give it a short. Highly recommendable app. I have already shared with my friends and made them to download this app. But miffed part is that I was not able to remove the widget of application unless I had done reboot of my phone. Pls ensure that widget can be removed easily from home screen itself by single tapping and without any impediments to get 5‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê.

Lost a star because it's not a true floating app. Definitely not the app if you're looking to open discord on top of your game like ROM:ELGLOBAL since you will time out kind of defeats a floating app. It lost another star because it's a paid application and when you open it up it asks you to subscribe yearly for more features, there is also no opt out button but the back button will work but you will get the same yearly subscription pop up every time you start the app. I could deal with the last popup but since this is not a true floating app it's a deal breaker.

title: DrawExpress Diagram
description:
DrawExpress is a fast gesture-recognition diagram application.  With DrawExpress, you can draw diagrams and flowcharts in a simple and intuitive way. It's just as easy as using a pen and paper! Whether you work in software design, finance, business, law, or need it for school, DrawExpress is the ultimate solution to your diagramming needs. Try out the free DrawExpress Lite version before your purchase to see if DrawExpress is right for you! 

Visit www.drawexpress.com for more details.

What can you can draw with DrawExpress?

Software UML and Network Designs:
- Use case Diagram
- Sequence Diagram
- Class Diagram
- State Diagram
- ER Diagram
- Data Flow Diagram
- Network Diagram
- ArchiMate

Business Processes and Mind Maps:
- Flowchart
- BPMN
- Organization Chart
- Process Flow
- Mind map
- Feature List
- Decision Tree
- Visual Notes

It's easier than it sounds and actions speak louder than words. Watch our tutorial video on www.drawexpress.com to see how easy it is to use our diagramming tool.
Also check out the tutorial slides on our website www.drawexpress.com.

NOTE: DrawExpress can be exported to PNG, SVG, and DE (DrawExpress) format and share with Dropbox and Email.
NOTE: DrawExpress  for Apple appstore is available at https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/drawexpress-diagram/id687490743

summary: The smart way to draw diagrams on the go
recentChanges: - fix file permission issue on Android 10 devices
comments: If there was only room on my phone for a handful of apps this would definitely be one of them. The ability to get a diagram down when an idea occurs to me without needing to look for a serviette or scrap of paper is amazing. Sure, the app may have some shortcomings but it is infinitely more useful than any alternatives.

This app is almost perfect except for one little annoyance: I can see the app would open and load any .de file wherever on my phone's storage. However, after editing it, instead of saving the changes back to the file directly, the app insists on importing edited content to its own app storage. Please make the in-place saving possible for the future releases. Thanks!
please change the standard sizes of shapes to ones that their center (vertical axis and horizontal axis) aligned to grid

This is an excellent application for diagramming. The the updated look cost a star though. It is not clear how to select colors and what color is selected and the help text is inaccurate. The project selection is sort of unresponsive. Since on a phone, the project menu covers most of the screen you don't see that something changed. The predefined symbols also went away after the upgrade but has since returned, maybe due to a restart of the phone. All in all the best diagramming app I've tried.

I have been using the app to create an electrical wiring diagram for a home renovation project. You can take a picture or screenshot and import it into a drawing. Drawing little circles on the ends of wires and the terminals where you want them connected allows you to draw electrical connections and then move the objects to arrange the appearance of the wires. It's easy and efficient.
